comments: Its a great competitive game with similar and different stuff compared to PUBG, and even does some things a bit better. But please nerf the vehicles hitbox radius and how many people can get into a car all at once. I've been killed 6 times now by someone or some people using only a vehicle and running other people over. Nerf the vehicles and I'll rate 5 star.

This game is cool adictive best controls and cool cars, jeeps and also gliders.. but one thing to say: Update needed Every sunday they can get epic paints for guns and clothes,pants or in daily missions thats all. Oh wait how to use spray button to paint vechile job?

The game really ok. I love the feature where you can talk to your team online. However, since I've updated my ROS, it became super loggy and now I can't even open it to play. I tried to re-install the game but still, it won't open anymore. What happen? Please fix it immediately.

I love the game over all. There is one thing that ticks me off the cars. people get them then chase u and knock u down. Once u r knocked down they get out of the car and kill u. IT'S RIDICULOUS. The fact that you cant shoot through the fences makes it so others can use them as coves while u move to them and get killed

No complaints about the game, i liked it. It's just that i lost my account today and i dont know what's the cause. last time i played it i closed the game when i finished a match by pressing the home button and left it there for a few hours. when i open the game again my account was lost. i forgot to bind my account to any social media because i thought i already binded it by sharing to facebook. is there any way you guys can help me ?

This is F ridiculous!! I experienced more glitches after the update!! The updates didnt do anything much about the glitches!! People will just appear from nowhere!! I played this game everyday and every single day i always experience glitches!! The sound is also confusing even if you try to listen.You hear sounds that coming from the back but the enemy is actually in front.

description: Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique troops are waiting for you! New Features:●	Journey to the Builder Base and discover new buildings and characters in a new mysterious world.●	Battle with all new troops, including Raged Barbarian, Sneaky Archer, Boxer Giant, Bomber, Cannon Cart, and the new Hero Battle Machine.●	Go head to head with other players in the new Versus battle mode.Classic Features:●	Join a Clan of fellow players or start your own and invite friends.●	Fight in Clan Wars as a team against other players across the globe. ●	Defend your village with a multitude of cannons, bombs, traps, mortars, and walls.●	Fight against the Goblin King in a campaign through the realm.●	Plan unique battle strategies with countless combinations of spells, troops, and Heroes!●	Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special events.●	Train unique troops with multiple levels of upgrades. PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash of Clans. A network connection is also required. Support: Chief, are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-of-clans/ or http://supr.cl/ClashForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support. Privacy Policy: http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/ Terms of Service: http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/ Parent’s Guide: http://www.supercell.net/parents
descriptionHTML:
Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!

Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique troops are waiting for you!

New Features:
● Journey to the Builder Base and discover new buildings and characters in a new mysterious world.
● Battle with all new troops, including Raged Barbarian, Sneaky Archer, Boxer Giant, Bomber, Cannon Cart, and the new Hero Battle Machine.
● Go head to head with other players in the new Versus battle mode.

Classic Features:
● Join a Clan of fellow players or start your own and invite friends.
● Fight in Clan Wars as a team against other players across the globe.
● Defend your village with a multitude of cannons, bombs, traps, mortars, and walls.
● Fight against the Goblin King in a campaign through the realm.
● Plan unique battle strategies with countless combinations of spells, troops, and Heroes!
● Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special events.
● Train unique troops with multiple levels of upgrades.

PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash of Clans.

A network connection is also required.

Support: Chief, are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-of-clans/ or http://supr.cl/ClashForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

Privacy Policy: http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service: http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/

comments: Sooooooo addicting ,I love this game so fun,  relaxing and has great music. I can't stop playing. So awesome,they should make more word searches or word crosses like these kind of games. All though  you have to pay for some parts of the game but out of all the games I have ever played this on is #1😍😂😃

Fabulous word game. The whole family is addicted. Could do with a slightly wider vocabulary in that sometimes you find a perfectly good word that is not in the grid but it's not allowed in the bonus bank. But that's just being picky. Overall, well, well worth the modest price to go ad-free. Highly recommended.

Great game, lovely graphics, but loses a star for not having valid words in its list; you can have pipe, pipes, pip but not pips.  The are lots of common words that are not accepted and I find it somewhat frustrating.  Secondly why do you no longer get coins for the words you find that are valid but not in the puzzle?

My favorite word game, but I rated it only 4 stars because they repeat some of the puzzle groups as you progress through the game. I have gone through the Ocean group of puzzles at least twice now. With all the words in the English language, there is no reason for this. Also, there are many words, most quite common, that are not accepted.

This is 1 of the word games I like to play that gives you coins for each extra word as you end each game level instead of having to build up to a certain number before you get the coins. I also love the scapes. . . They bring back memories from my youth and childhood.

I love this game! It's a real challenge and better than the normal ones because of the backgrounds and how it's a crossword. You could add an online player vs player thing too. I love the daily challenges. Maybe add something to win instead of coins? If you love a good daily challenge defiantly get the game!! 😊

description: Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang! Choose your  favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, tower rushing, team battles, all the fun of PC MOBAs and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, 2017’s brand new mobile eSports masterpiece. Shatter your opponents with the touch of your finger and claim the crown of strongest Challenger!Your phone thirsts for battle!Features: 1. Classic MOBA Maps, 5v5 Battles Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy’s tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart’s content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.6. Smart Offline AI Assistance In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang’s powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you’re offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.Contact Us You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:Customer Service Email: MobileLegendsGame@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/MobileLegendsGameYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA
descriptionHTML:
Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang! Choose your favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, tower rushing, team battles, all the fun of PC MOBAs and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!

Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, 2017’s brand new mobile eSports masterpiece. Shatter your opponents with the touch of your finger and claim the crown of strongest Challenger!

Your phone thirsts for battle!

Features:

1. Classic MOBA Maps, 5v5 Battles
Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy’s tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.

2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy
Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!

3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory
Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.

4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master
With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart’s content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!

5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches
Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.

6. Smart Offline AI Assistance
In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang’s powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you’re offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.

comments: Love that it gets more challenging
Its amazing app
Totally love this app, its very addictive and gets more challenging as you level up

This  was really  fun! Starts off easy but gets harder, not near the ads of the  other games I have played. Takes extra words, hints are reasonable,  earning money is reasonable.  So far the best of the word connects !! Really happy with this game, will add to my phone  and get rid of the other word connect games that seem to have ad, after ad not to mention the high amount for hints! There is one reason I didn't  give it a 5, because some of the ads get stuck and you can't  exit,  overall  4.8!

I love this game! As others have stated it's very addictive! It's also challenging when you get up in the amount of games you played. My only problem is that when you're asked to watch a video to collect points, the video stops playing and and you don't collect the points. This has happened to me 5 times in a row. Other than that, I do not know what people are talking about as far as a lot of ads. I don't find that at all.

Not a bad time killer - quick paced and not too taxing on the brain. I wish it had a more comprehensive dictionary so you would still get bonus points for valid words like 'cad.' No matter - still basically a four star, though almost three for the number of ads.

descriptionHTML:
Are you tired of the old fashioned word search interfaces?
Do you want to enjoy a totally new experience of word puzzle game?
★★★ Now, you can download Word Cross and play on BOARDS for FREE! ★★★

Word Cross is a creative crossword puzzle game which can inspire your passion for brain challenges. It includes all the essences of word scramble games to make you feel totally ADDICTIVE & ENTERTAINING.

➤ New & Fresh Look: If you like to play board games and puzzle games, you must love the clean and fresh BOARD UI for your first sight.

➤ Handy & Easy to Play: You can easily swipe the letters to form a specific hidden word. It’s easy to play and fun to master for everyone.

➤ Surprising Bonus: Login everyday and get daily bonus, also, you will get coins after finding out the Extra Words which don't present on the crossword board.

➤ Over 2,000 Exciting Challenges: It starts easy and becomes challenging fast. And you can test your limits of the words you know. More levels are on the go.

➤ 100% Addictive Word Game: You’ll never experience a dull moment for it! Play this crossword puzzle once and you won’t be able to put it down!

☆ HOW TO PLAY ☆
- Swipe the letters to line up words to fill up the blanks horizontally and vertically on the board
- Tap the “Shuffle” button to change the order of letters
- Tap "Ask Friends" when you get stuck and get rewards
- Tap the “Hints” button to get clues
- Get more hints with coins by purchasing or watching videos

★ FEATURES ★
• Nice & Clean BOARD for you (Stay tuned for customizable themes)
• More than 2000 Challenges
• FREE to get Daily Bonus
• Find words with bonus to collect more coins
• Simple & Easy to play, hard to beat gameplay
• Totally FREE for all players
• Suitable for both kids and adults to train word search skills
• No network required and you can enjoy word search at any time

DOWNLOAD now to begin training your brain and become a real master of word search puzzles on BOARDS!

★ CONTACT ★
support@boardgame.freshdesk.com
developerAddress: Lockhart Ctr., 301-307 Lockhart Rd., Wan Chai, Hong Kong
recentChanges: - Bugs fixed to improve overall gaming experience
summary: Play ENTERTAINING & ADDICTIVE word search game on BOARDS!
title: Word Cross

I know its the game because its when I'm about to pick up something important or jump at a crucial point. Also this ismy 3rd phone and it does it on all phones. This error needs to be fixed.

I love the game. Been loving it for years. I've been noticing alot lately though that when I watch the ad video to double up on my mystery box, it's not doubling my prize. Getting kinda frustrating and just not worth watch the ads anymore. Can you fix this? If not, I more than likely will delete the app and free up the space.

this game is slightly good but  it is lost its priority to me day by day. initially this game was awesome but now a days it seems to me boring, authority takes this game only for business purpose. after finishing level 30 i lost my patience to this game. it gave more ad. but not increase their game quality. so finally i take decision to uninstall this app to release the space of phone.

Could add more city's it sucks revisiting and not getting new characters.. also the special city boards could have some special effects instead of ... I don't know... looking like a hot dog... what's the point. A hot dog with super speed and stay low would be ideal. Love the game, but to keep playing.. maybe give us something new. The only thing I love is wordy weekends. But only to get the coins back for what I spent on the characters

Sometimes, the game glitches and it's just very annoying when I have the super boots on and I jump on top of the train and then it glitches and the police catch me!  Apart from that very good game but I think the company just needs to improve the graphics...

I can't even play, cause this is a bad day. And this makes it worse, its like seeing a bad nurse. I don't like it, it works for a bit. I don't like trash games, but it is not my fault I am calling it names. Fix it, or people get this bit. This is what I wrote, now write a note. Write a note about my problem, and stop em.

comments: Ah perfect game. Fast pace not laggy smooth graphics, and playable on any devices. But i hope i can change my region like asian.. Bcoz most of the player i encounter is mexecan or spanish.. 1 more thing i hope you add a larger map i guess for team battle i think 4km x 4km is enough.. And 30mins of total playing time.. All in all fantastic game.. A two thumbs up for you guys. Keep it up

For all this time I only played girly game like The Sims, Temple Run, etc but I decided to give this game a shot earlier today. GOD how I wish I tried it earlier! This is like the best game I've played in years, it's super playable even for someone like me (who have never played this kind of games before) and I just cant believe just how much this game has to offer! The graphic is flawless, no bugs or errors at all, the control is perfect, and it's superrr realistic. This game reminds me of Hunger Game lol. I feel emotionally exhausted while playing this game because I was always in a state of running and surviving. Very recommended!

Its amazing!!!! I wanted fort nite but even if i deleted everything i have, i still would not be able to get it. It costs sooo much room. With this game, i can have roblox,color switch, and at least 100 pictures and 10 videos, AND still have room for it. This the best shooting game i have ever had! And i have played gta and call of duty. So that says a lot. It is also very fair. U dont get a increase on anything when wearing special clothing. So new comers could be just as good as people at lvl 100. I would deffenety recemend it.

This is no doubt one the 'Best' android game ive ever played so far.       But the main drawback is the lack of map choice..  and i personally think that it would be better if there is more customisable features like hairstyles,etc. and more items to buy from the store using money and not diamonds. Another suggestion that i would like to give is that.. on top of having voice chat if teammates can chat with each other using message, it would be terrific. Thankyou for making this game!

I have donated you guys, so you could improve and make the first, legendary phone game.  I have a few free suggestions to improve the gameplay coming from me (old, experienced gamer, graphic designer)  1. Add body and corpse ragdoll effect which will improve the heavy gameplay.  2. Add more blood (like blood splatter on the wall after shooting) 3. Leave the corpses and blood to exist in the map until it ends.  4. Make the weapon attachments visible. 5. Add weapon skins. 6. Add facial accessories. 7. Add ranked mode and awards. (!) 8. Make the bullets physics-friendly and let em fall further they fly.  9. Make more overall loot.  10. Change the lvl 2 backpacks color into the lvl 3 one, and make the lvl 3 black.   After these just improve the overall graphic and gameplay quality of the existent codes and cgi

This game needs some serious work. Controls are hard, guns need rebalancing...tell me how, without getting a headshot, does an m14 beat a scar from short range? I was pelting this geezer w bullets hitting most but still get killed. 1 because the controls are stodgy and 2 because balancing is clearly an issue
description: Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.[Form guilds]Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds![Battlegrounds in its original form]Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.[Realistic and smooth graphics]Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.[Contact us]Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN
descriptionHTML:
Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.

[Form guilds]
Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds!

[Battlegrounds in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.

[Contact us]
Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN

1. Most devices will now run Free Fire even more smoothly

summary: Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game on mobile.
title: Free Fire - Battlegrounds

comments: I've been playing candy crush for close to 4 years. Today I'm on level 3139. For the very first time I got the jackpot on the daily booster wheel. Thought it was impossible to get. Have read other comments saying no jackpot ever. Well today is a first for this challenging, sometimes very frustrating game. I play every day just to keep up with the free boosters. It's a free game that is fun.

It's a very lovely game with nice graphics and I love the challenge and the difficulty, it helps you to think and make good choices but I don't understand why I will have to buy the gold bars that I earned playing the game. That's not just right. There should be options to buy additional gold bars not telling me my gold bars is filled and I need money to get it

It's really addictive,like I'm a Sugar Crush- aholic :-)  But..... I had collected 60  gold bars and I couldn't get them unless I paid 2.99. So I wasn't to impressed by that. But nevertheless it's a great game so keep up the good work. Two thumb's up for me

It keeps telling me my "gold bars are full" when I do well, but wants real cash when I try to use them. I refuse to spend real cash on an online....but addictive as hell that I am tempted to! Advise...If you have the sliqhtest of addictive personality. Stay away....

Not so keen on the  graphics, the actual sweets are OK,  but, the puppets etc are not so good. It can take ages, days in fact to win the super hard games if you don't,  like me, buy help, and the free help you have earned are used up in the first go. So it takes perseverance.  Good game.

Gripes: 1. The option to skip Sugar Crush takes a LOT longer to come out than before. Should come out almost as soon as Sugar Crush starts. Big waste of time and battery life. 2. Decreasing # of moves/time in levels that are already difficult to start with making it virtually impossible to finish them without boosters. 3. There should be shortcuts to earlier levels for those of us who want to revisit them to get more stars/better scores. Becoming increasingly necessary as the total # of levels is approaching 3000.

comments: It remains a classic, yet some parts are just too screwed up. After paying to remove the ads, the ad hoes with the play button still show up. The vase breaker was my favourite in the past. Now it is broken. 65% of the time ir reads actap like a double tap making it utterly unplayable

Irritating. At first it gives you an option of playing a video to receive additional help. Which works only for the first time. Next time onwards no way to cancel the video in case you don't want to install it. It is so frustrating. Either allows to cancel or tell the users what to do next. Worst way of promoting other apps.

It was good but then this happened. I was playing just like any other day. My phone had died while I was playing, so I charged it and left it untouched for about an hour or two. When I signed in, all off my progress was erased! Please respond and tell me what happened.

The game was great than EA got to it with there sticky fingers and put adds everywhere, it isn't the same game I enjoyed ages ago. It's just another add infested game now, even if you do pay for it l. The charm is gone
Why ask people to pay to have ads removed and still have so many features that you need to watch ads for? It just seems like a rip off to me very disappointed in this purchase

I had to update it so I did and when I wanted to play after that, it says "watch video to get extra seed slot" WHICH I ALREADY PAID FOR WITH THE COINS I COLLECTED ALL THESE TIMES. Even before the update, it has so many ads but this is much worse. Definitely not happy with the update.

comments: Good game. Advert after every mission and some bullets can go through the guy you're trying to shoot at like a hologram. Graphics aren't good at all but you have got recoil and swaying scope that I noticed as well. All in all, pretty good game. Maybe add a toggle to gold your breathe in the future so that it doesn't sway?

The MOST IMBALANCED PVP game I've EVER played. It took me 20+ shot (30+ seconds) to kill 1 man. He shot me once and I'm dead. At least group the players by ranks (or by gear rating) to make it fun. It is IMPOSSIBLE for a non-paying player to kill a paying player. The PVP mode is a slaughter zone for paying players. What a ROTTEN game.

Listen developers, you guys should be honest to us, we download to play and for fun. But when we pass few levels we have to wait for upgrades, this game offer us such weapons which are out of our earning. This game should absolutely free, no premium, low cost upgrades, no boring ads . Either everyone will uninstall after 1 - 2 months. Guarantee

This is a great game but the bottom line is the developers want you to spend money upgrading. You get along so far upgrading with coins, which can be earned. Then they want tokens, which you must buy, to go further. The deals on weapons that are offered are always just out of reach. You can earn diamonds watching videos but I would rather play a game than waste time watching stupid add so I can play a game. It was fun but no more. Deleting.

After the update on 2nd Mar-18, Spec ops not loading. Game simply terminate itself while trying to load spec ops Level 16. Everything else is working fine. I'm stuck 😓😪 Update: now I can't play even Daily Mission😩😤

It's a real fun game for shooting.  I am giving 3 stars because gears are very expensive. I have reached level 8 without buying anything because all my earnings are not enough to buy a decent gun. You want people to pay rather then buy through skill earned point. But still great game.

comments: wow ! why is this game so good!! addicting I got a problem ! to many ads! I under stands u need money but you should put purchases so u get some more money !! and also I want to have new characters and themes that will be cool course I nearly got all but I haven't! also change rating to pegi 3 I know there's the characters can be a vampire but srsly IT'S NOT SCARY what is with wthat!  sorry it's long but thanks for taking time and reading bye!😀😀😀😁😁😁

This adorable & addictive game is very fun to play at any time of the day! It is definitely a close competitor of the infamous"Candy Crush" trend. For such a simple concept, it never ceases to amaze me; especially since I can't seem to get a long enough winning streak to increase my stack count. I admit, I suck at this game... Yet I can't stop playing it! 4/5 stars for me. Loses a star for excessive ads and lagging during the game.

I really liked it at first. But now all I get are ads. it's so irritating to be playing and then ad pops up at the bottom. You're clicking on your character to jump & you click on the stupid ad than every time you die you have to watch another ad so annoying. But I could get pass the ad      after you die but not at the bottom of the screen. Makes me not want to play it anymore. And I'm only on day 3. It was a cute to relieve stress and now it just gives me stress.

Amazing! the best game ever! I'm really addicted to it. I even completed all the changes. I would be happy if there are more. but even now its good! I also recorded myself playing because I would live to show this game up to the world and give a review. Really enjoy it and think it deserves to be spread out

Very very addictive pass time. Only a lil disappointed with the adds popping out every now and than. I know its a free app and adds are inevitable but try reducing the number of time it should appear not after each and every round.

It's a very good game! I got my boyfriend hooked on it, but my problem with it is, sometimes when I start up the app it sits on the beginning stage of the app?? Like when am I going to be able to play again? Was just updated? So I'm going to have to delete it and start it all over and re gain my high score??

comments: Good game to pass your time. Upgrade costs and parts spawn rates are reasonable if you only use a few vehicles because it will take a long to yo max out everything. I think it will be better if league vs trophies distribution are reworked because its very easy yo reach legends. should give a higher win bonus at higher trophies i think to make it more competitive. And lastly, hackers should be deleted from leaderbord.. there are a few impossible timings on the board.

I enjoy the game greatly. It's slightly different with  the chest and stuff but it is sure nice to get bonuses every now and than. There are new adds though which I'm not super stoked about like the brake time adds but they keep them short and can be skipped quick if you have already watched them. All and all great game

I love this game. Every game I've had, I played for a week or so, and uninstalled. But this one? Ive had for almost 6 months. Been playing every single day. Finally reached legendary 32, I've unlocked everything. I love the VIP subscription and upgrades it gives you. I would like atleast one new vehicle option every month or so. Or at least a new adventure spot. Making a modded version of the rally car would be fantastic. Also, an upgrade on the formula car where it doesn't almost dead stop after it lands from a big air.

If you don't want to give away free stuff from the chests, don't. But stop wasting my damn giving me these "free" coins for watching a video only to have the ad freeze %95 of the time. The are plenty of other free games out there, might be time for a change.

Pretty good game the Ads are insane and they want a ton of money per month to get rid of them. Seems to be the way all the games are going. For the Chinese new year could have mad a tuk tuk I think it's called a mini taxi. Or something cool for China.

Enjoyed the 1st game but, game 2 is pocket book wrecker, you can only go as far as you can pay to go. Everything is 4 times $ higher than it was in the 1st game and advancement is much slower. Just not that exciting for what it now cost, will probably uninstall soon.

comments: There is just to much to say about this brilliant, creative, and fun game! It keeps me busy while im bored and on a road trip! I saw an ad for this on instagram and decided to download it, and let me tell you I was not disappointed with the outcome. I've been seraching for games like this and I have finally come across such a fantastic game! The Fluffy charectors should be sold as toys because of their adorable look!

It's casual, relaxing and fun. Super cute. And it has 2 huge pluses: first of all it feels rewarding since you actually have a realistic possibility of getting new fluffies; second, you don't have ads shoved in your face every 5 seconds, in fact you pretty much never see them.  Really great at the moment, hope it stays this way. Lots of respect to the Devs for staying away from annoying cash grab techniques.

this game is adorable. the only thing i'm not quite sure about is the rainbow system; what does it do? how does it work? it would be great to have a page that explains the details to those of us who aren't great at working this stuff out. i'd also like to ask why there aren't plushies for these things??? they're so cute! i'd by tons of they were real. anyway, great game, and the little fluffy cubes are the sweetest things and i just want to hug them all.

This game is amazing, a load of fun and very competitive with friends, unfortunately no multiplayer on it.Would love for more Fluffies in the future with different abilities. Also Fluffies you can unlock by doing certain challenges and other stuff. You can also create a level mode where you have challenging levels to complete for coins or Fluffies, and one last thing, you all should have a head to head mode to see who can last the longest going against each other. Those are just some suggestions that I think would make the game even better than it already is.

I love Fluffy Fall so much!! It is SUPER kawaii, fun, fuzzy, and enjoyable. It takes up your time as you try to beat your highscore!! Mine is 45.  I am really hoping that it updates, because I want all the monthly gem stones to be in stone section. I think it would be cool to have my gem stone. And play as it.  Anyways, I really love the game, it is so amazing!! If you love kawaii and fun games, get Fluffy Fall!!! 😊💕

This is so fun and cute! I love the cute little furries, Awesome graphics and simple BUT FUN gameplay. One down side is It's little glitchy while doing levels and maybe some Furries from TV, Disney, books ect.like for an example: Mickey mouse, Pikachu, Totoro ect....If you can fix this I'll rate  it 5 starts

Dodge a blaze, snake around ice, go rolling past lasers and escape other crazy hazards that block your way. The road is full of pitfalls, but it’s sure to pull you in.

Play against different AI difficulties, beat different campaigns, and even play with a custom player using your own picture as a face!FACTSThe Philippine Basketball Association is the first professional basketball league in Asia and is the second oldest continuously existing in the world after the NBA.Philippines men's national team popularly known as Gilas Pilipinas is consist mostly of Philippine Basketball Associaton players and the Philippines was awarded the Most Valuable Fan (MVF) Best Country Award during the recent 2014 FIBA World Cup.FEATURES* 2 vs 2 full court hoops game* Create your own player and join your favorite team!* Funny Taglish (Tagalog/English) game commentator* Compete for the All Filipino, Governors Cup and Commisioners Cup Championship!* Collect Trophies on ALL TEAMS!* Action packed and exaggerated gameplay.* Jam the hoops with amazing slam dunks!* Get ELECTRIFIED and do high flying dunks!* No Fouls* Play as one of the current Philippine Basketball Association teams.** Barangay Ginebra** Alaska Aces** Magnolia Hotshots** San Miguel Beermen** Tropang TNT** Rain or Shine Elasto Painters** Meralco Bolts** NLEX Road Warriors** Phoenix Fuel Masters** Global Port Batang Pier** KIA Picanto** Blackwater EliteGuest Teams:* Gilas Pilipinas* 2017 All Star Luzon* 2017 All Star Visayas* 2017 All Star MindanaoPERMISSIONS* READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for selecting photos when creating a player* WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for saving edited photos for custom player* CAMERA: permissions for taking photos* READ_PHONE_STATE: permissions for user statisticsWe will continue to work and update the game with new rosters and more awesome features.Like our facebook page to get updates and join contestfb.com/pbaslamgameAnd visit our websites at:www.philippineslam.comwww.ranidagames.comFor comments and suggestions you can email us atinfo[at]ranidagames.com
descriptionHTML:
** Over 5 Million Downloads! **

Philippine Slam! brings the fun of 2v2, full-court basketball to your mobile devices. This zany and quirky arcade-style basketball features ridiculous antics, high-flying dunks, and witty commentary that will keep you at the end of your seats. It’s basketball striped down to its most fun and basic components which makes it easy to pick-up and enjoy.

Based from the players and teams of the Philippine Basketball Association, you can choose from real teams and players with real stats and abilities. Play against different AI difficulties, beat different campaigns, and even play with a custom player using your own picture as a face!

FACTS
The Philippine Basketball Association is the first professional basketball league in Asia and is the second oldest continuously existing in the world after the NBA.

Philippines men's national team popularly known as Gilas Pilipinas is consist mostly of Philippine Basketball Associaton players and the Philippines was awarded the Most Valuable Fan (MVF) Best Country Award during the recent 2014 FIBA World Cup.

FEATURES
* 2 vs 2 full court hoops game
* Create your own player and join your favorite team!
* Funny Taglish (Tagalog/English) game commentator
* Compete for the All Filipino, Governors Cup and Commisioners Cup Championship!
* Collect Trophies on ALL TEAMS!
* Action packed and exaggerated gameplay.
* Jam the hoops with amazing slam dunks!
* Get ELECTRIFIED and do high flying dunks!
* No Fouls
* Play as one of the current Philippine Basketball Association teams.

** Barangay Ginebra
** Alaska Aces
** Magnolia Hotshots
** San Miguel Beermen
** Tropang TNT
** Rain or Shine Elasto Painters
** Meralco Bolts
** NLEX Road Warriors
** Phoenix Fuel Masters
** Global Port Batang Pier
** KIA Picanto
** Blackwater Elite

Guest Teams:

* Gilas Pilipinas
* 2017 All Star Luzon
* 2017 All Star Visayas
* 2017 All Star Mindanao

PERMISSIONS
* READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for selecting photos when creating a player
* WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for saving edited photos for custom player
* CAMERA: permissions for taking photos
* READ_PHONE_STATE: permissions for user statistics

We will continue to work and update the game with new rosters and more awesome features.

Like our facebook page to get updates and join contest
fb.com/pbaslamgame

And visit our websites at:
www.philippineslam.com
www.ranidagames.com

For comments and suggestions you can email us at
info[at]ranidagames.com

description: From the producers of Racing Fever comes a brand new motor racing experience!In this game, we have blended all the adrenalin, fun and excitement a pair of tires can offer together for you. With the amazing racing experience and breathtaking graphics, you won’t be able to put your phone down.4 different camera anglesFor a more realistic experience, you may play from your racer’s viewpoint or increase your control on the race using different camera angles.Realistically modeled motorcyclesWe have modeled 16 different motorcycles down to the smallest detail for you. Take your pick, improve its performance, alter its design and start racing.A racing adventure with 4 different gang leaders and tens of levels4 different regions and 4 ruthless gang leaders! Tens of different racing types in different seasons in an amazing atmosphere await you. Defeat all 4 leaders to prove that you are the best racer!4 different control optionsWe know that no two racers are alike! We included a control option to satisfy you all. Control your bike by tilting your phone or by touching the screen. You have no excuses left to win the race!Support in 23 different languagesDon’t worry, we understand and speak the same language as you!Escape ModeIn this game, speed limits were set to be broken! Remember that when running from the cops, it is just you and your bike!Daily Bonus ModeWe didn't forget to add a mode where you can race daily to win valuable gifts!Private ModeYou get to set the time of day, weather conditions, traffic density, speed and flow and even the number of cops! You set the rules, you win the race!Please don’t forget to get in touch with us with your feedback and suggestions!
descriptionHTML:
From the producers of Racing Fever comes a brand new motor racing experience!

In this game, we have blended all the adrenalin, fun and excitement a pair of tires can offer together for you. With the amazing racing experience and breathtaking graphics, you won’t be able to put your phone down.

4 different camera angles
For a more realistic experience, you may play from your racer’s viewpoint or increase your control on the race using different camera angles.

Realistically modeled motorcycles
We have modeled 16 different motorcycles down to the smallest detail for you. Take your pick, improve its performance, alter its design and start racing.

A racing adventure with 4 different gang leaders and tens of levels
4 different regions and 4 ruthless gang leaders! Tens of different racing types in different seasons in an amazing atmosphere await you. Defeat all 4 leaders to prove that you are the best racer!

4 different control options
We know that no two racers are alike! We included a control option to satisfy you all. Control your bike by tilting your phone or by touching the screen. You have no excuses left to win the race!

Support in 23 different languages
Don’t worry, we understand and speak the same language as you!

Escape Mode
In this game, speed limits were set to be broken! Remember that when running from the cops, it is just you and your bike!

Daily Bonus Mode
We didn't forget to add a mode where you can race daily to win valuable gifts!

Private Mode
You get to set the time of day, weather conditions, traffic density, speed and flow and even the number of cops! You set the rules, you win the race!

Please don’t forget to get in touch with us with your feedback and suggestions!
developerAddress: P.O.Box 16111 RAK FTZ Ras Al Khaimah UAE
summary: A brand new motor racing experience full of fun!
title: Racing Fever: Moto

comments: I love this game! If you like chess and like to think you'll like this game no doubt! There are some ads but not so much that it makes me want to turn off my Wi-Fi. It has cute graphics and runs smooth. I just cant get enough. As far as scary no not scary a little like whoa they're gunna hit.. Oh wait phew how did they not hit? RGB keep up the good work with this game and all your other free stuff! You guys make great games for all ages!

Enjoyable game with challenging levels. Pros: levels won't tie you up so much despite difficulty. Gameplay is quick due mostly easy adjustment of delivery paths. You can also employ logic to help resolve route possibilities. Game does have ads, but they're not pesky and don't make you wait. Cons: Package drop circle toggles can get in the way of route-adjustment, especially on levels with many drop toggles. Suggested remedy: change the toggle-action to long-press rather than on short-press, allowing short-press to be reserved for route changing

Im not normally one for puzzle games but This game is great and addictive, haven't played a game quite like it. This game was done so well from the gameplay to graphics to controls, it is a really fluid experience and a great puzzle game, the new mechanics were introduced perfectly as I progressed and there was never a puzzle too easy or hard the level of difficulty increases and a good rate! Way To Go guys

The first levels are okay but after that there's a huge difficulty gap, got really frustrating. Controls are really bad. How I'm supposed to know where I'm taking the truck if my finger is on top of it?

I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

This is a phenomenal puzzle game. It provides you with an incredibly simple concept that eases the player into the game's mechanics and turns into some very devious puzzles later on. The ads are a bit intrusive, being the ones you could accidentally tap on trying to remove with larger hands (like mine), and unskippable video ads that reward you with in-game currency needed to unlock levels, but those are never necessary, and for less than 2 dollars you can remove them outright. All in all, this is a charming and brain-teasing puzzle game that's well worth your time.
description: RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive! You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.This is how you do it:1) Draw routes for your truck drivers. Make sure that every house receives the correct package.2) Press play.3) Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!Features:* 400 FREE levels* Easy gameplay suitable for all ages* Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans* Beautiful graphics* Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effectsThe game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★Available In-App purchases: KING TRUCK* The premium version of RGB Express* Removes ads* Supports game development and future updatesHINTS* The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.Please note:* Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video* TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.

This is how you do it:
1) Draw routes for your truck drivers. Make sure that every house receives the correct package.
2) Press play.
3) Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!

Features:
* 400 FREE levels
* Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
* Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
* Beautiful graphics
* Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!

★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★

Available In-App purchases:

KING TRUCK
* The premium version of RGB Express
* Removes ads
* Supports game development and future updates

HINTS
* The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
* Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
* TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).

description: Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. descriptionHTML:
Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. Set in a magical world you will have to upgrade your defenses and mighty soldiers to survive and siege enemy territories to conquer them.

The rival alliance of the evil kingdoms has pushed what remains of the human civilization to a corner of the world, isolated and forgotten, plunged into misery and trying to survive harshly.

Ready the horses, hire your warriors and prepare the spears for battle, the war horn will sound again and our titans will destroy the enemy walls and towers.

The age of dark empires have come to an end, it's time to recover what rightfully belongs to us, it's time for revolt, war and revenge!

The warriors claim your name, lord!

Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.

Features:

- Tower Defense (TD) and Strategy game style.
- +1500 defensive waves.
- 4 Heroes to unlock.
- +100 territories to conquer.
- +30 soldiers to upgrade.
- +1000 building upgrades.
- 4 different races to conquer (Goblins, Skeletons, Worgens and Orcs).
- 15 passive and 3 active skills for your general.

description: Enjoy this exciting Pinoy card game called Tongits. TongitsXtreme is played offline and is absolutely free! In this app version of the game of Tongits, you play against 2 computer players. The Artificial Intelligence (AI) engines could be average or a hustler, a conservative or an aggressive player! They will challenge your analytical skills to the point of driving you to madness, leaving you in amazement of how brilliant they are.GAME FEATURES:- User Experience feels like the real thing.- Intelligent opponents with multiple AI personalities- Multiple levels. Lower levels are easier. Get past level 7 to unlock more brilliant AIs.- You don't like cards dealt to you? No problem; just re-deal. (Only available in Level 7++).- Detailed Payment Scheme to guide you how much you are winning (or lossing).- Select your card back design- Interactive Messages to guide you throughout the game- Tokens and flags to remind player of previous round winner, last player to pick card from stack, and jackpot winner- Player's Money, Level, Rounds played, etc. backed-up even if App is updated - Swipe on the dumped card stack to see all the dumped cards- You don't have to remember how many cards are left on the deck; remaining card count is displayed on top of the deck.GOAL:Tong-its is a 3 player card game developed in the Northern Philippines. Your goal is to reduce the total value of your hand on your turn. You will win if you have done one of the ff : a) Eliminated all your cards ("Tong-its!") b) The lowest hand value at the end of the roundc) The lowest hand value in a Draw/FightTo reduce your hand value: a) Form and Post at least 1 Made b) Attach card/s to the Posted Mades Jackpot is won if you win two consecutive rounds.GAME FLOW:The round starts with the deal – 13 cards for the starting player/previous round winner and 12 cards for the other 2.If it’s your turn:-Start by picking from the Stack or the latest Dumped Card-Post the Made created if you picked the latest Dumped Card-You may or may not Post the other Made/s in your hand-Attach card/s to Posted Made/s-End your turn by Dumping a CardYou can initiate a “Draw” before picking from the Stack or Dumped Card if:-You have Posted at least 1 Made-No card was attached to your Posted Made/s from your previous turn to your current turnEnjoy!
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy this exciting Pinoy card game called Tongits. TongitsXtreme is played offline and is absolutely free!


In this app version of the game of Tongits, you play against 2 computer players. The Artificial Intelligence (AI) engines could be average or a hustler, a conservative or an aggressive player! They will challenge your analytical skills to the point of driving you to madness, leaving you in amazement of how brilliant they are.


GAME FEATURES:
- User Experience feels like the real thing.
- Intelligent opponents with multiple AI personalities
- Multiple levels. Lower levels are easier. Get past level 7 to unlock more brilliant AIs.
- You don't like cards dealt to you? No problem; just re-deal. (Only available in Level 7++).
- Detailed Payment Scheme to guide you how much you are winning (or lossing).
- Select your card back design
- Interactive Messages to guide you throughout the game
- Tokens and flags to remind player of previous round winner, last player to pick card from stack, and jackpot winner
- Player's Money, Level, Rounds played, etc. backed-up even if App is updated
- Swipe on the dumped card stack to see all the dumped cards
- You don't have to remember how many cards are left on the deck; remaining card count is displayed on top of the deck.


GOAL:
Tong-its is a 3 player card game developed in the Northern Philippines. Your goal is to reduce the total value of your hand on your turn. You will win if you have done one of the ff :
a) Eliminated all your cards ("Tong-its!")
b) The lowest hand value at the end of the round
c) The lowest hand value in a Draw/Fight

To reduce your hand value:
a) Form and Post at least 1 Made
b) Attach card/s to the Posted Mades

Jackpot is won if you win two consecutive rounds.


GAME FLOW:
The round starts with the deal – 13 cards for the starting player/previous round winner and 12 cards for the other 2.

If it’s your turn:
-Start by picking from the Stack or the latest Dumped Card
-Post the Made created if you picked the latest Dumped Card
-You may or may not Post the other Made/s in your hand
-Attach card/s to Posted Made/s
-End your turn by Dumping a Card

You can initiate a “Draw” before picking from the Stack or Dumped Card if:
-You have Posted at least 1 Made
-No card was attached to your Posted Made/s from your previous turn to your current turn

Enjoy!
summary: Enjoy this exciting Pinoy card game called Tongits. Play free, play offline!
title: TongitsXtreme

comments: I like the concept so far. I always wanted to play Sims on the go; now I can. I wonder if this game simulates life accurately. You can't have a life sim game without being able to make your avatar a member of the LGBTQA community. This is why I like Second Life. It allows me to be me (gay and proud) and doesn't judge. Will definitely add five 🌟 s if this feature is added along with In-game events that allows you to pursue your chosen lifestyle.

ANYONE WHO GIVES THIS GAME A LOW RATING NEEDS TO SIT DOWN . I love that u have more customization with face and body structure similar to the way you do on Sims 4. The graphics in general are nice. My favorite part is that it's online. I love being able to chat with other Sims users and add them n stuff. Also am glad its not in real time ... I hate having to wait hours on FreePlay to get stuff done. This game is best. Lovelovelove

I was so excited that the game is finally released untill when i want to start the game, the game starts with just the opening EA and Maxis title and then the game close it self. Is this a bug? My phone works well with other heavy games but how it cannot run The Sims Mobile?? Please fix this and i will change my rating! I use Lenovo Vibe K5.

So far so good. Its better than the Sims Freeplay. I'd love it more if it was more like the actual sims. Please change the way this game is. Make it to where we can cook, and choose our sims personality traits, have babies, die lol/legacies, go to work for 8 hrs and actually make a decent amount of simoleons, actually have freedom you know? The actual sims gameplay!!! I love the task list and how we do have to unlock new worlds and items, but it'll be more exciting to unlock stuff to me if this game was more like the original sims. If we had the opportunity to play all day non stop like the original sims, I believe everyone would enjoy the game more. Please make a change to the game and make it more like the actual sims!!!

It's not everything I wanted, that's for sure. This is a great game and I really enjoy working aspect is fun. The rest is boring. Little customization for sim, cannot interect with others like I thought and have to level up to customize house which is sad. I wish we could start with a little more, even have to unlock our personality. Whats up with that? Overall this seems like a really good game but its not the sims I was expecting

In short.. been waiting to see what this had to offer.  Not a bad game. Granted it is way Better than "sims freeplay" however I expected more from EA. It's a nice app. Gameplay is good. Graphics are better than I thought. The in app purchases are what will get you.  For me though the Sims pc is where it's still at, for me anyway nothing beats the PC Version either Sims 3 or 4 Both are very good.   But there's enough here to tickle anyone's fancy. Hats off to the devs on this mobile game version!
description: Express your creativity as you customize your Sims’ distinct appearances and unique personalities, giving them traits and having fun with fashion and hairstyles. Effortlessly build your Sims the perfect home, choosing favorite designs and décor, with more detail than ever before on mobile. Experience the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims’ lives as they accomplish career goals, pursue hobbies, develop relationships, and improve their Lifestyle. Party with friends, fall in love, and establish a legacy. What stories will you tell? CREATE UNIQUE SIMSCustomize Sims’ appearances, hairstyles, outfits, makeup, and accessories. From nose to toes, there are endless possibilities! Then put together an unforgettable wardrobe when you team up with Izzy Fabulous in the Fashion Shop. Choose personality traits for each Sim, like Active or Musical, and add more as your Sims gain life experience.BUILD THE PERFECT HOMEDesign your Sims a home where they can experience all that life has to offer. Effortlessly personalize home layouts and designs, selecting from a variety of furniture, appliances, decorations, and even themed collections. Then take them out to discover awesome venues like a fashion studio, restaurant, and nightclub. SHAPE YOUR SIMS’ LIFESTYLE Guide the stories of your Sims’ lives from careers and hobbies to relationships and families. Pick exciting careers like Fashion Designer and Doctor, and hobbies like Cooking and Guitar playing. Have friendly and romantic relationships with other Sims and take Risky Actions like trying for a kiss or inventing an experimental recipe. Start a family and create a path for future generations by passing down powerful Heirlooms. PLAY TOGETHERHost and attend parties with other Sims where you can socialize and earn rewards. Show off your amazing house, develop romantic relationships, and even decide to move in with other people’s Sims. Join special daily events like Speed Dating in the Park or the Market Square Music Festival. Plus, vote for the most popular Sims as they make their way to fame.There are endless ways to connect when you craft big and small moments for your Sims, and see where life takes them in The Sims Mobile!____________Important Consumer Information. Some images shown may contain in-app purchases. This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Allows players to communicate via the in-game party chat feature. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.User Agreement: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.comVisit http://help.ea.com for assistance or inquiriesEA may retire online features after 30 days' notice posted on www.ea.com/service-updates.

comments: I used to play this game a long time ago with my brother. I thought since after all these years so many new updates have come, the game must feel different. But it's the same. I love the tune that plays as you play it. It's so nostalgic. My brother isn't anymore with me but playing this game makes me really very happy. It's just like I am back in those old days. Specially for me, as it has so many memories, this game is the absolute best.

The game is really addictive. but repeated zombie birds are generated and diamonds are getting wasted. Please change that. One bird one time please. One bird should be at max 3 level not another set. It's wasting my internet to watch video to get diamonds for collecting birds

I love this game cause it kills our time when were bored. Yep, we, my mom also is addicted to this game hahaha, shes always getting my phone and play this game whenever im sleeping. Love it, I recommend this game to everyone💖 you'll be definitely love this game. MobiGame you slaaaay hahaha

I personally loved this game. First off,  u cant jump for high periods of time cause u to run into the bombs. Secondly, whats sup with these prices? Thats ridiculous. You cant level up with prices that high and u have to buy 💎 gems and coins just to get a level up... But tum... Very great game overall.

I was confident to delete the app from my phone cos it says that the game will be saved on my fb acc. But only the highest score remained and the potion got back to 1. I was already at 56! Deym! Ayusin nyo buhay nyo! Sayang effort ko! Aba!
Too much bombs. Like i have 16 zombies and they put 7 bombs in a row! How am i supposed to win if i cant jump that high with all those bombs in the way.
description: The zombies are revolting ! Attack the city with a horde of zombies, change pedestrians into zombies and create the largest horde.Eat your friends, and challenge them to a crazy race by destroying everything in your path.Zombie Tsunami has proudly exceeded 200 million players around the world.FEATURES- "One touch" gameplay to control the entire hord- 10 delirious bonuses, ninjas, dragons, UFOs, and many more- Many upgrades to unlock- Raise zombie birds and use their powers- More than 300 missions to devour- 11 sets to travel in- Optimized for all Android modelsREVIEWS4.5/5 TouchArcade - "Zombie Tsunami is a game you really need to own"5/5 AppSmile - "Featuring Pixar-like graphics, simple controls, and plenty of content"5/5 TouchGen.net - "If you’re looking for a fantastic game, look no further!" 4.5/5 148Apps - "It’s fun madness, emphasis on fun."5/5 iReviewT.com - "Revolutionary endless runner formula!"5/5 AppSpy.com - "Zombie Tsunami carves its own path with a great claymation style and roaming hordes of the walking, and jumping dead"Why not try our other games: EDGE, Cross Fingers, Perfect Cell, Truckers Delight.Follow us on twitter.com/MobigameVisit us at http://www.mobigame.net
descriptionHTML:
The zombies are revolting ! Attack the city with a horde of zombies, change pedestrians into zombies and create the largest horde.
Eat your friends, and challenge them to a crazy race by destroying everything in your path.

Zombie Tsunami has proudly exceeded 200 million players around the world.

FEATURES
- "One touch" gameplay to control the entire hord
- 10 delirious bonuses, ninjas, dragons, UFOs, and many more
- Many upgrades to unlock
- Raise zombie birds and use their powers
- More than 300 missions to devour
- 11 sets to travel in
- Optimized for all Android models

REVIEWS
4.5/5 TouchArcade - "Zombie Tsunami is a game you really need to own"
5/5 AppSmile - "Featuring Pixar-like graphics, simple controls, and plenty of content"
5/5 TouchGen.net - "If you’re looking for a fantastic game, look no further!"
4.5/5 148Apps - "It’s fun madness, emphasis on fun."
5/5 iReviewT.com - "Revolutionary endless runner formula!"
5/5 AppSpy.com - "Zombie Tsunami carves its own path with a great claymation style and roaming hordes of the walking, and jumping dead"

comments: The controls are more difficult than the last time I played this game, which was a year or so ago. The new customization is very cool 👌 but the fact that even the joystick (my usual preference) doesn't make it better at controlling. I don't know whether it is because of my phone or if it is in the app. Nevertheless good job, game is very addictive, keep up the good work 👌

this game is a thousand times better than agar.io in my opinion! It's so much easier to get onto the leader board. Every time I play I get onto the leader board. It's just so addicting and I can't get enough. Everyone in my family loves it too. Creating your own skin is a great option as well. My only complaint is that the 'play online' option is very laggy, and if you fix it would be much appreciated. Thanks for a great game, from sinéad, ella, lauren, mollie, shane and ollie 😊😊

So I think just about everyone has heard of this game... Buuuuuuut there are some newbies here so I'll explain. Its a multiplayer game and It's in my opinion that It is probibly #2 best game I've ever played. Great concept and I like to get creative on makeing a snake/worm thing. A+ grade. 👌👍

Playing this game is total fun. But It would be more Awesome if there will be some sounds & a pause button maybe. One more thing, somebody tell me how to BOOST the Slither because everyone is boosting except me😭😌😶🙄😓😑😫🙃

I'm highly addicted to this game. It's a thousand times better then agar.io in my opinion and it's really cool that you get to create your own skin. The only downer is that I just wish there was some music because you start to get a bit bored after a while.This game is NOT a waste of time, and everyone needs to download it to experience the awesomeness!

Competitive game to play in a spare time frame. I play daily, only problem is the occasional Lag of the servers online where anything can happen. Clearing the cashe seems to help for a short time, but Lag is a huge component that I had to remove 1 star. Other then that design your worm and try to make it to #1.... Its not easy (unless you play AI)
description: Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
descriptionHTML:
Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?

If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!

Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
developerAddress:
PO Box 76
Jenison, MI 49429
recentChanges: Build a slither: Create your own skin!
summary: Play online with people all over the world! Can YOU become the longest player?
title: slither.io

comments: Where is korobeiniki??

This game can fit almost ANY personality type, keeping you entertained for hours!  Don't worry about getting low scores, because the game starts out slow and gets faster, so you'll always be prepared for faster tiles.  There are challenges where you challenge other people in the world!  I never want to give up on this game, its really addicting!

Excellent fun and a fantastic way to introduce a new audience to some wonderful classical music as well as very talented contempory composers. My one gripe is that recently players have been given multiple oportunities to get 3 crowns or very high scores with ad powered resources. I feel this takes a lot of the challenge from the game. Anyone can get 3 crowns in 4 or 5 goes where us old guard of the game did if in 1 or 2 Still an awesome game though and well worth the download anytime.

I'm in love with this game. It's challenging, you don't have to listen to the music to follow the tiles, and it gives you the feeling to be better. I have a suggestion for a new song you can buy for diamonds. Can you add any song from the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic TV show? Thanks.

there seems to be a malfunction with sound. I've played several songs and each one has parts where there isn't any music. I'm not sure if this is a bug or just something wrong with my phone. other than that, though, this app is really entertaining.

I enjoy this game a lot and always loved how it challenged me. It was also fun when me and my friends would fight to see who's better but I dislike the update where they added boosters, it doesn't seem fair and for me it feel like it loses the title for being relaxing. I don't think that adding those futures was a great idea in my opinion and I really miss the old version a lot.
description: The hit of the world loved by 900 millions of players, Piano Tiles 2™ is having its 2nd birthday! During these 2 years, Piano Tiles 2™ with its simplicity, thrill-seeking and challenge-taking features, is always in the top ranks. Come to take the challenge!  Game feature: 1. Simple graphics, easy to play and everybody gets playing the piano! 2. Breath-taking rhythm will challenge your handspeed limit! 3. Top challenge mode gives you thrill and risk! 4. Update of numerous songs, original, classic, bangs and all the style to satisfy different taste.5. Share your record with your friends, and compare with world-wide players on the ranking list! 6. Sound of high quality makes you feel like in a concert. 7. Save your progress via Facebook account and share the progress in different devices. 8. More challenge, more bonus and a better self.  Gaming mode: Don't tap the white tiles! Tap the black tiles according to the melody and don't miss any tile! Concentrate yourself and maximize your reaction!  Support: Are you having problems? Send email to gpfeedbackpt2@gmail.com or contact us in game by going to Settings > FAQ and Support. comments: Played for quite awhile multiple 5 start heros. Highest at 75k pow. Had to delete my game reinstalled and my base was gone. Contacted customer support they said since I didn't start a transfer code? I could get my base back. DO NOT UNINSTALL UNLESS YOU WANT TO LOSE EVERYTHING. DO NOT SPEND MONEY BECAUSE AT ANYTIME YOU CAN LOSE IT.  Support was great they fixed everything.

Extremely fun, I had an old account and I was level 27. But I had to get a new phone and did data transfer in time. Now I gotta start all over... But it's still really fun. Just kinda mad that I can't get back to where I was.  Edit: I keep getting communication errors and haven't been able to do a mission all day. All my stamina, gone. I let it refill still couldn't finish a story mode even. I had a good connection too

I only rated it a three because this game needs to fit my screen. I own a Galaxy S8 and to have a title such as Naruto published by Bandai not fit the screen is something I'd think they should fix right away so new players don't have this issue and leave the game. I love the gameplay a lot and the raiding part is fun, I just don't like not having a clue ifnI'm spending ryo or the in game currency.  Please fix this issue.

It is one of the best game I've ever played on mobile. I have just one issue. In this update, the traps don't work properly as before. A person is standing on the trap position but does not get stuck/hit by that. It took alot of time to set those traps and with this new update, all goes into waste. Please fix that.

Please help me to get my data back because my due date is on 10.3.2017 i cannot log in my data using the new phone with the data transfer.please help me fast my old account is level 41.i have log in once and cannot log in it again using the same password please do this fast... Thank you for the best naruto game in mobile...I hope you can reset the game by making the game log in using the id and password which is valid until 10.3.2017.

It's very fun and addictive but there's a bug few and then. I lost my 50 shinobite while summoning just like that because it was stuck at the summon loading page and I didn't even receive any ninja cards. I hope you can fix it and also refund my 50 shinobite at the very least. 😭

descriptionHTML:
The characters from TV animes BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS and NARUTO SHIPPUDEN are finally united in NARUTO X BORUTO!

Create your very own fortress, then attack rival fortresses! Defend your base with strategic and deadly traps while you raid enemy bases with your friends for resources and honor!
Experience a brave new style of ninja battle:
a fusion of action and strategy!

--------------------------
■Game Overview
--------------------------

[Characters]
All your favorite characters are joining the battle, including Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Kakashi Hatake, and Sakura Haruno from NARUTO SHIPPUDEN,
along with Boruto Uzumaki
from BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS!

[Action]
Simple controls that let you perform blazing fast combo attacks and all types of Ninjutsu!
All the heroic action you expect from NARUTO and BORUTO, using beautiful graphics, including powerful Ninjutsu attacks such as Naruto Uzumaki's Rasengan, and Ninjutsu power-ups like Sasuke Uchiha's Sharingan!


[Strategy]
Position traps and the Shinobi that you've trained
to protect your village from other players' attacks, all while
creating your very own ultimate fortress!

[Battle Rankings]
Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses. Try to get the
highest ranking by competing with players from all over the country!

[Multi-Player]
Online multi-player missions also available!
Team up with a maximum of 4 players and defeat mighty enemies!
