description: Catboy, Gekko and Owlette are back in this brand new PJ Masks game app. Choose your favourite hero character to play with and journey across the moonlit rooftops, and through the night, collecting as many orbs as you can. But beware of those pesky villains, they’re up to mischief again!FEATURESCollectable orbsThe hero characters will be able to collect orbs to add to their final score.Gold AmuletsEach character is able to pick up gold amulets along the way to boost their final score. Make sure to keep your eyes out for them as they’re harder to find!Character Power-upsCollect the coloured amulets and trigger the heroes’ super powers: Catboy – ability to jump higherOwlette – ability to see hidden orbsGekko – ability to smash through obstaclesHazardsHelp the heroes dodgy the obstacles the villains are throwing in their way!The PJ Masks are on their way, into the night to save the day!No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of action and fun!Please note: This app is not compatible with some older Android devices
descriptionHTML:
Catboy, Gekko and Owlette are back in this brand new PJ Masks game app.

Choose your favourite hero character to play with and journey across the moonlit rooftops, and through the night, collecting as many orbs as you can. But beware of those pesky villains, they’re up to mischief again!

FEATURES

Collectable orbs
The hero characters will be able to collect orbs to add to their final score.

Gold Amulets
Each character is able to pick up gold amulets along the way to boost their final score. Make sure to keep your eyes out for them as they’re harder to find!

Character Power-ups
Collect the coloured amulets and trigger the heroes’ super powers:
Catboy – ability to jump higher
Owlette – ability to see hidden orbs
Gekko – ability to smash through obstacles

Hazards
Help the heroes dodgy the obstacles the villains are throwing in their way!

The PJ Masks are on their way, into the night to save the day!

No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of action and fun!

Please note: This app is not compatible with some older Android devices

Your English is so bad it is insulting.    You need to hire someone to proof read before you post requests for ratings.  A definite turn off to the game which is actually quite fun and challenging.    Requires strategic planning.

My absolute all time favorite game! I used to have the woodblock version and would play that one ALL the time. The only thing I didn't like about it was that I couldn't get anything higher than 300 most of the time for the score, no matter what I did. The only time I did was the first time I installed it and played, I easily reached 1,500 points, but anytime I played after I could never come anywhere close, so I decided to look for a different game with the same concept and found this one. Instantly loved it! It's got more block room (so easier to get more points), love the sound effects, I don't feel cheated or set up like the other one, and it's a good way to get your mind working if you're someone like me who likes to think it through and plans for future possible block pieces c: plus the colors and looks is a bonus!^-^

The app is fun but it needs a no ads option for purchase. Also if the game is muted the ads should be auto muted as well. Currently the play at full volume whether the game is muted or not. It's very frustrating.

My four year old likes it and I feel like it helps him on making decisions. I can actually see him thinking what going to be him next move. I like this game and I love playing with my son. Only thing I hate is that it does have to many ads 😒

Great game to pass time. Adverts are frustrating but necessary unless you want to pay to stop, BUT very annoying when they pop up as you just lifted a puzzle piece and because of advert it just drops randomly. Also being able to rotate pieces would be handy, granted not as challenging however.
description: This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!>How to play?Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.>Highlights:Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
descriptionHTML:
This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!
It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.
It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!

>How to play?
Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.
Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.

>Highlights:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.
You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
summary: Amazing block game with a simple rule.
title: Puzzle Game

description: The best action adventure game on your Android! And it's free!Exciting and fun physics based adventure game!Fly from vine to vine, but watch out for dangers lurking in the jungle. Earn bananas to get upgrades, specials and power ups.Features: - Beautiful cartoon & hand drawn like graphics - Fun physics based gameplay (swing a monkey along ropes to get forward) - Make your run through various landscapes (temple ruins, waterfalls and jungles) - Collect fruits like bananas and chilis to gain more upgrades - Unlock special powers such as a jetpack, chili speed boost and eagle ride - Cloth your monkey differently (ninja costume, gas mask) - Different kinds of ropes (vines, snakes, burning ropes etc.)Download now and experience the joy of flying along the vines through various environments!If you have any issues with the game, please contact our support at support@fingersoft.netCheck out the Benji Bananas website at http://www.benjibananas.com/Benji Bananas is developed by TribeFlame Ltd. and published by Fingersoft Ltd.
descriptionHTML:
The best action adventure game on your Android! And it's free!

Exciting and fun physics based adventure game!

Fly from vine to vine, but watch out for dangers lurking in the jungle. Earn bananas to get upgrades, specials and power ups.

Features:
- Beautiful cartoon & hand drawn like graphics
- Fun physics based gameplay (swing a monkey along ropes to get forward)
- Make your run through various landscapes (temple ruins, waterfalls and jungles)
- Collect fruits like bananas and chilis to gain more upgrades
- Unlock special powers such as a jetpack, chili speed boost and eagle ride
- Cloth your monkey differently (ninja costume, gas mask)
- Different kinds of ropes (vines, snakes, burning ropes etc.)

Download now and experience the joy of flying along the vines through various environments!

If you have any issues with the game, please contact our support at support@fingersoft.net

Check out the Benji Bananas website at http://www.benjibananas.com/

Benji Bananas is developed by TribeFlame Ltd. and published by Fingersoft Ltd.

description: Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.- Especially designed for mobile devices!Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!- Rich solo and team gameplay!Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart’s content!
descriptionHTML:
Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.

- Especially designed for mobile devices!
Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.

- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!
The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.

- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!
Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!

- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!
Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!

- Rich solo and team gameplay!
Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart’s content!
developerAddress:
19031 33rd Ave W Ste 100
Lynnwood, WA 98036

description: Zombie Smasher is the #1 addicting and entertaining game available on Google Play.Get ready to defend your home as a mob of zombies is about to invade your town! Those undead creatures are back, and it's up to you to keep them brainless. Use your finger to tap on the zombies to smash and eliminate them before they break down your door.How to Play:- Simply touch the zombies to kill them- Don't hit the kids surfers from neighborhood- Use the special power-ups wiselyGame Features:- Story Mode (60 levels and more to come), Survival Mode, Time Mode- 7 totally terrifying enemy zombie breeds (normal, dog, oilworker, timberman, ghost, baby & fat boss)- Amazing visuals & immersive CD quality audio- Intense zombie-blasting action game play fit for subway time
descriptionHTML:
Zombie Smasher is the #1 addicting and entertaining game available on Google Play.

Get ready to defend your home as a mob of zombies is about to invade your town! Those undead creatures are back, and it's up to you to keep them brainless. Use your finger to tap on the zombies to smash and eliminate them before they break down your door.

How to Play:
- Simply touch the zombies to kill them
- Don't hit the kids surfers from neighborhood
- Use the special power-ups wisely

Game Features:
- Story Mode (60 levels and more to come), Survival Mode, Time Mode
- 7 totally terrifying enemy zombie breeds (normal, dog, oilworker, timberman, ghost, baby & fat boss)
- Amazing visuals & immersive CD quality audio
- Intense zombie-blasting action game play fit for subway time
developerAddress: ROAD TOWN, TORTOLA, BRITISH VIRGIN ISLANDS

comments: Fantastic game! It's by Gameloft so it's bound to be a good phone game. It's not unfair, but you do have to have some skill. It doesn't hold your hand but it's not hard to learn the controls. Despite the fact that you're also playing against people who are on their computers as well, it's definitely not unfair. One request: maybe add more options for your killstreaks. I would love to have my drone and turret on the same killstreak for my sniper class but I'm stuck with recon instead. Still love it tho :)

It's a best game on playstore!!! I play it lot of.. and it's my favourite game.. but one problem is that when i start multiplayer match it says sercer not found or server overloaded. But it doesent matter for much. I give all 5 star for best graphics, bedt controls, and also bestest weapons. I love this game. Thank you gameloft. We expect that you will keep developing games like modern combat. I am waiting anxiously for next series. Thank you.

I had previously given this game a 1 star but for this update I'm blown away by the network rectification aspect. The game runs butter smooth even after post FUP data speeds. The game is currently saturated with lvl 140 players with all the prestige weapons, so I'd request you to bring about a balanced match making in the PvP based on their matching levels and introduce some welcome benefits for the returning players

I am facing one issue but first I want to tell you that this is the best game on play store.. It's worth to download that 1.5 gb data than 100-200 mb games.. Graphics are great. Only problem I am facing is the voice issue.. I couldn't hear the sound from last 3-4 days but I m still giving 5 stars as I hope you will solve this issue asap..

This probably the best FPS game in the Play Store. Graphics, animations, music, voice actings everything in this game are awesome. 😊  The game runs in my phone in full 60 fps on Ultra-high settings. But sometimes it crashes without any reason and when I run the game again, it starts to verify game data. My phone is not rooted and I do believe the problem is not in my phone, it's a bug in the game. 😕  Overall, it's a great game. ☺️  Peace out. 🤘

It's pretty good for what it is, but the controls suck. It's hard to aim and you risk firing instead of moving your aim. Rules of survival has a better fighting setup however it's a battle Royale not a traditional fps. A bit sad that they did it better really. Final nail in the coffin is the pay to win aspect. There's multiple classes in this game and by far, the paid classes provide incredible perks. I don't recommend this game.
description: War has evolved, and so has the best online FPS on mobile! Step onto the battlefield and answer the call with the title that raised the bar for first person shooter games with its great graphics, high-powered guns and intense online multiplayer action. Create a squad from 9 classes, add your friends for team play and test your skills in dynamic warfare against online rivals from around the world!Prefer to work alone? Then feel free to step into the thrilling solo play campaign as you shoot your way through one dire situation after another to save the world as you launch an attack against a lunatic’s apocalyptic plans.You won’t find more first person shooter fun in a free game anywhere!9 CLASSES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS> Customize and level up any of the 9 classes across solo play and team play modes. > Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support, Bounty Hunter, Sapper, X1-Morph, or Kommander.> Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points.HIGH-POWERED ONLINE MULTIPLAYER > Watch players engaged in live online FPS battles and eSports competitions with all the great graphics you expect in the new Spectator mode.> Epic guns-a-blazing team play in Squad vs. Squad matches.> Talk to other players to plan your online multiplayer strategies and coordinate an attack in the Global and Squad Chats.> Top the individual and Squads leaderboards as you master your eSports skills.> Win free rewards and cool prizes in limited-time events.UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION> Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo play missions and team play matches.> Unlock higher-tier guns and other weapons by mastering lower-tier guns.> Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the free game action.INTENSE SOLO PLAY CAMPAIGN > Engage in fast-paced story missions where the call will take you from Tokyo to Venice for a variety of first person shooter challenges.> Play the new Spec Ops missions for a real online FPS adrenaline rush.> Great graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a first person shooter game.HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS> Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want.> Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. MOGA Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.So if you’re ready for the online FPS of your dreams, dive into this unparalleled free game that takes online multiplayer to new heights. Perfect for anyone hungry for solo play first person shooter fun, or team play eSports competition._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/FBMCGPTwitter: http://gmlft.co/twmcgpInstagram: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_IGYouTube: http://gmlft.co/ytmcgpForum: http://gmlft.co/MC5FRThis app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-usePrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-noticeEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula
descriptionHTML:
War has evolved, and so has the best online FPS on mobile!

Step onto the battlefield and answer the call with the title that raised the bar for first person shooter games with its great graphics, high-powered guns and intense online multiplayer action. Create a squad from 9 classes, add your friends for team play and test your skills in dynamic warfare against online rivals from around the world!

Prefer to work alone? Then feel free to step into the thrilling solo play campaign as you shoot your way through one dire situation after another to save the world as you launch an attack against a lunatic’s apocalyptic plans.

You won’t find more first person shooter fun in a free game anywhere!

9 CLASSES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS
> Customize and level up any of the 9 classes across solo play and team play modes.
> Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support, Bounty Hunter, Sapper, X1-Morph, or Kommander.
> Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points.

HIGH-POWERED ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
> Watch players engaged in live online FPS battles and eSports competitions with all the great graphics you expect in the new Spectator mode.
> Epic guns-a-blazing team play in Squad vs. Squad matches.
> Talk to other players to plan your online multiplayer strategies and coordinate an attack in the Global and Squad Chats.
> Top the individual and Squads leaderboards as you master your eSports skills.
> Win free rewards and cool prizes in limited-time events.

UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION
> Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo play missions and team play matches.
> Unlock higher-tier guns and other weapons by mastering lower-tier guns.
> Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the free game action.

INTENSE SOLO PLAY CAMPAIGN
> Engage in fast-paced story missions where the call will take you from Tokyo to Venice for a variety of first person shooter challenges.
> Play the new Spec Ops missions for a real online FPS adrenaline rush.
> Great graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a first person shooter game.

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS
> Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want.
> Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. MOGA Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).

Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.

So if you’re ready for the online FPS of your dreams, dive into this unparalleled free game that takes online multiplayer to new heights. Perfect for anyone hungry for solo play first person shooter fun, or team play eSports competition.


_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_EN
Check out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/central

Don't forget to follow us on social media:

Instagram: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_IG

recentChanges: Overtime map – the map most asked-for by fans gets revamped, improved and brought back into the game
Improved weapon upgrading – a simplified system that helps players acquire all weapons even faster
New game mode for squads – Capture the Flag
Option to mute players on chat
New vanity items and Soldier customization options
summary: The best multiplayer FPS series raises the bar for action-shooter games again!
title: Modern Combat 5: eSports FPS

comments: I used to play this game a couple years ago, and at the time, it had satisfying gameplay and great time killing qualities. I used to love it then and I still do now, but I've recently noticed pretty annoying glitch that's driving me away from the game. For some reason, a few hours after I download the game, it doesn't allow me to enter the game anymore. When I open the game,  it will run smoothly up until the point when it reaches the loading screen and simply returns me to the home screen. I try to reopen it and the same thing happens. I'm not really sure why this happens, but until this glitch is gone, I will be forced to stay away from the game entirely as the only way to fix this glitch is to download the game again which is quite time consuming.
why does it not let me on it, stops loading then says unfortunately Fruit Ninja has stopped.. not happy get it fixed please an thanksss :)
I downloaded the game, and loved it. But now whenever I try to open it, it goes up to the loading screen, and then takes me back to my home screen.
Great game but after I completed the tutorial it kicked me out of the app. I keep trying to get back in but it kicks me out still.

Marvelous game!!! Likely you back to the right on your last update.  I just purchased the chainsaw blade, the DRAGON blade was a huge desappointment we was expecting phenomenal motions not that catoon flag . Also : all the good stuff are in mini game, the others dojos are kind very less quality, let us use minigame blades and dojos in arcade or zen even by purchase that will be nice. Thank you
This fruit ninja is great! However, I sorely miss Fruit Ninja: Puss In Boots, and I'd really like it back!
description: Welcome to the dojo, ninja. Your objective: become a master of slicing fruit! What better way to do that than play Fruit Ninja, the original hit fruit-slicing mobile game? 🍉Unsheathe your blade and start the juicy carnage with the three classic game modes that billions of players have come to know and love. Experience the thrill of setting a new high score in the fan-favourite Arcade mode as you focus on dodging bombs and slicing massive combos with the help of the special Double Score, Freeze or Frenzy bananas. Need something less intense? Simply relax and slash for stress relief in Zen Mode. Finally, cut as much as you can in the endless Classic mode – just avoid the bombs and make sure you don’t drop the fruit! Make your game even more exciting by equipping special powerups that will give your score a juicy boost. 🍓Once you’ve sharpened your skills and reflexes, put them to the test in Event mode, where you’ll enter challenging and intense clashes with characters like Truffles the pig, Mari and Rinjin for the chance to win unique swords and dojos that can be used in Classic, Zen and Arcade mode. Spice up your day and make yourself more energetic in our daily Challenge mode - can you out-slice the other ninjas for special prizes and glory? 🏆Prove to your friends and family that you’re the top ninja around. Show them how much you can cut in a shared-screen local multiplayer match, or compare your score with your friends to rise through the ranks and reach the top of the leaderboard! Big fan of Fruit Ninja: Puss in Boots? Be sure to challenge yourself with the entertaining and addictive minigames and find your favourite! 🍒What are you waiting for? Whether you're playing for some mindless fun and trying to relax and pass the time, or trying to improve your skills as a master ninja, this is the game for you. Enjoy the awesomeness and believe the hype of Fruit Ninja – chop chop! ⚔️View our privacy policy at http://halfbrick.com/pp View our terms of service at http://halfbrick.com/tosNeed help with the game? Email us at fruitninja@halfbrick.com

descriptionHTML:
Fishing Hall is a fishing leisure game in which players can exchange for material prizes and catch all kinds of fishes simulating the console game.

In the game, you can catch different fishes which may provide coupons and golds. You can exchange with the coupons for mobile phone, shopping card, telephone card and other material prizes.

The game has fish shoals and turrets of different multiples, so that players can enjoy the excitement to fish the big fishes.

Thousands of players online at the same time, with rich prizes easy to get!

That's the only reason I gave 4 🌟's. Once they add save life option I will change to 5 🌟's. Great game though. Would recommend everyone to try this game.

This is possibly the greatest game on the Store right now. There so much you can do in the game and I'm excited to see what will come. And the best part is that this game doesn't require internet to play and doesn't have a great deal of ads. My friends all have iPhones and say that this game looks sweet and ask if its in the Apple Store. I have to say no, but if you guys ever plan on making an Apple version, that'd be pretty cool on their end.

description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
developerAddress:
71-75 Shelton Street,
Covent Garden,
London,
WC2H 9JQ
recentChanges: Added the prisoner career + bug fixes, and tweaks
summary: Like your life - but instant.
title: InstLife

description: This is authentic 3D pool experience like you’ve never seen on mobile. Unlike other pool games, 3D Pool Ball offers playing pool (a.k.a pocket billiards) in 3D view as it should be played in real world.Capture the spotlight in the pubs & pool halls and build you legacy in the most realistic pool game on the planet. Compete against other real players from all around the world or enter tournaments to win trophies against skilled pool players. How about a nice game of pool?Game Features:- Impressive visuals, great animations and double fun- Play 1-on-1 and 8 player tournaments in online 8 ball and online 9 ball- Play against computer AI in offline 8 ball and offline 9 ball - Big bets. Big wins. Play like a pro.- Realistic physics in 2D view and 3D viewTips: The goal of eight ball, which is played with a full rack of fifteen balls and the cue ball, is to claim a suit, pocket all of them and then legally pocket the 8 ball.
descriptionHTML:
This is authentic 3D pool experience like you’ve never seen on mobile. Unlike other pool games, 3D Pool Ball offers playing pool (a.k.a pocket billiards) in 3D view as it should be played in real world.

Capture the spotlight in the pubs & pool halls and build you legacy in the most realistic pool game on the planet. Compete against other real players from all around the world or enter tournaments to win trophies against skilled pool players. How about a nice game of pool?

Game Features:
- Impressive visuals, great animations and double fun
- Play 1-on-1 and 8 player tournaments in online 8 ball and online 9 ball
- Play against computer AI in offline 8 ball and offline 9 ball
- Big bets. Big wins. Play like a pro.
- Realistic physics in 2D view and 3D view

Tips: The goal of eight ball, which is played with a full rack of fifteen balls and the cue ball, is to claim a suit, pocket all of them and then legally pocket the 8 ball.
developerAddress: ROAD TOWN, TORTOLA, BRITISH VIRGIN ISLANDS
recentChanges: v1.4.4.1: Fixed some bugs of game rematch and removed unnecessary permissions. Thanks.
summary: Play 8 ball pool and 9 ball pool in 3D view as it should be played in real world
title: 3D Pool Ball

comments: It's a good game but having an add after every puzzle is a bit much. Yake a bit too much time and easyy to lose interest. Maybe every 5 puzzles wo ups be better I know y'all gotta make your money but the constant ads make me want to uninstall.

Since no one reads 5 star reviews I figured I would rate as 1. Great time killer during those boring meetings or occasional bouts of constipation. Want to take a break from your mind numbing job? This is equally mind numbing....but hey, play on your bosses time. When you see a picture you can't figure out, lower your mental ability to where it makes an amoeba seem like Einstein......from there you will get every puzzle. Enjoy

Really fun game! Just a couple of itsy bitsy things that get on my nerves. The coins you win are miniscule compared with how many you need when you use the Help function (even bumping it up to 5 coins for each correct answer would be better) & the other thing...I get that you need ads to keep these games free but does there need to be an ad after EVERY SINGLE PUZZLE??

The game  is good but alot  of  adds keep poping up. but i know you guys got to make your money and that.  my kids like to play this game and they enjoy playing it but sometimes the photos don't really make sence and then they lose intrest in the game and even some times im teptered to uninstall this game sometimes when i get mad with this game.

Great game. You should definitely earn at least 5 coins by default  when you solve a puzzle instead of 2 and more when watching an ad. The game seems Americanised (I'm British)  and  I didn't recognise some of the words (webmail?). Very fun though!

So... I love the idea for this game. The pictures do not represent the words in the slightest. AT ALL! When you look at a photo, it Should be one of the first words to come to mind, or at least the 5th, but some of these pictures are just so freaking terrible. Just play it. description: Army counter terrorist attack sniper strike shoot is an action game in which you experience the most amazing adventure fighting and shooting against dangerous terrorists in battle field environment. Experience extreme of kill the enemies in the war field as a world best army commando, it is your duty to rescue your country from the evil criminals those have under taken your country as you get world class advanced guns to clean them from your country. As a best military commando you have got training from us armed force school, where you have learned about how to fight in critical condition and learned about uses of automatic weapons. Now you have selected for this mission where you have to fight alone to eliminate the enemies. Let’s do your best and become a hero in the eye of your country people to save them from terrorism.Army counter terrorist shoot is an amazing fighting game in which you experience the most epic adventure of rescuing country from the evil plan of terrorists. To be a good military troop you have to show extra ordinary quick and good aim shooting skills. There are wild enemies everywhere around you so fight with them with bravely and eliminate all to get rid of them. Keep in mind that you are alone in the field so you have to fight very carefully and have to keep sharp eye on everyone during the cross firing. So get your best advanced sniper gun and demonstrate your expert shooting aptitudes and eliminate all them. It is sniper strike shoot which allows you to perform attack on enemies in the war environment to save the country. There are multiple amazing levels and crazy missions to get much excitement, many different play modes in which you can perform different exciting ways to play. It is a challenge for you to complete this incredible strike operation because to live in the mission you have to save yourself. Battle strike shooting and fps shooter game is fun to destroy criminals with advanced weapons. There are multiple modern automatic army sniper guns to destroy the evil plan of criminals. Complete the more missions and get new weapons. Amazing and high definition 3d graphics, realistic background sound effects and smooth control are the best part of it that make your interest in the game. Let’s download it and execute your best tactical shoot attack to hunt the enemies in this game.Features:Multiple amazing levels to playFirst person shooting gameMultiple exciting challenging missionsMultiple automatic advanced weaponsImmersive realistic battlefield environmentHigh definition 3d graphicsRealistic background sound effectsEasy and smooth controlDifferent modes to play

comments: Classic UNO with a couple of modern twists and turns. I have never spent any real money in a game and I don't ever plan to, but here you also don't really need to. I've won many tournaments and got really far in the game without buying anything. You get extra coins by winning and completing daily tasks, as well as watching ads. But you're not forced to watch them. It's not just about luck. You have to play smart to win, just like any other card game. I love it.

Tokens take too long to refill. Level up gives a few coins, why not a token refill? Tournament champion gets 4 tokens. 7 tokens for a day? Cheapskates! When do you want us to play, every 5 days? So cheap in giving prizes, guessing you want us to buy eh? I'll give myself a few weeks playing this game and am out. No daily prize wheel, just a daily "less than 20 coins" reward. Sooooooo cheap!

It's just ok.  Hard to see your entire hand at times and some of the rules are different than the actual UNO game itself. When I contacted this apps tech support, they sounded as if they could care less and said they will not be making any changes to the game.  So I play until they want me to buy credits then I stop.  When they give me more free credits I play again.  I like the game UNO, just not this one so much.  Why do I still play?  Hmmm, that's a good question.

Greatest game ever~~¤mean it.  The Updated game even better.  Need to be easier to play with Friends that you JUST made ~~maybe REPLAY!!!  😬 😲 😠 😐 😭  Friends where are you? Great for tablets.   I am UNO happy . Happy New years  .Oh don't terminate the game unless you just have to, I well try finding something other to do. Nothing Good ever lasts anyway.   Thanks for reading.  UNO POWER.

Great game in the graphics department however, I agree with other consumers when they say the special abilities you can obtain by playing this game ruins it. Simple is best and this uno app is anything but. Sometimes when I log in, the tokens don't even recharge overnight and I have to wait a few more hours before I play three free rounds of uno before you have to pay for more tokens. Very hit and miss app.

Okay, this is actually a decent game HOWEVER unless you buy your way through its almost impossible to win tournaments.  They shouldn't be putting people in the "club" and level 100+ with people who are like level 10 and not in this "club" it makes it almost impossible for them to win unless they're INSANELY lucky.  People with cheats can turn you from being at uno and winning, to being in last place in seconds and it honestly just kills the enjoyment of the game
description: UNO™ & Friends: Fast Fun for Everyone!UNO™, the world's most beloved card game, introduces a new free social experience!Playing UNO™ with friends, family, and the millions of fans worldwide has never been easier! Join one of the largest mobile gaming communities and enjoy a free multiplayer experience, brand-new game modes and tournaments that let you shout ""UNO!"" on a whole new level!GAME FEATURES:√ Easy to learn, difficult to put down!√ Play in Tournaments and become an UNO champion!√ Team up for the win in 2vs2 UNO!√ Use Boosts & Companions to diversify your strategy!√ Level up your UNO Companions and unleash their powers!√ Create custom games and invite your friends to play!√ Challenge millions of UNO fans worldwide!_____________________________________________You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN. In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never. Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.This game contains advertising for Gameloft’s products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device’s ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. comments: I Love Gardenscapes and It Is Fun Way to Be Creative.  A Recent Update has Made it Definitely Better.  The Support Team Has Been Exceptional With Quick Responses and Answers!  There is Room for Improvement in the Amount of Coins Obtained in Completing Tasks, as Well as Eliminating Repetitious Tasks Requiring More Moves.

I love home scape but it can be quite spendy. Both games are fun.  Love graphics animation laughter now free gifts.  Gardens cape is even more fun doesn't get boring like home scape when pay to win is obvious.  Gardens scape takes 1 or 2 coins with easier quests.   Still favorite.  Home scapes got greedy please return again where its not pay to win.  At times we need a color no bonus and lose because home scape didn't offer the color.  Spending hundreds on home scape so thinking of my budget and returning to garden scape.  Gardens cape started it all. Please lower prices

Addictive, colourful and charming. I love it because I've spent zero real money on it and am at over level 280! I only use my in game coins when I'm desperate and I'm fine only playing a few times a day to let lives regenerate. Some levels are so frustrating but that's why you save the coins!

I've been playing this game for a while now.  My current level is 1020. I love this game. I like the idea that it's not a mindless match 3 game.  You're fixing up  the garden with Austin. I like that he sort of interacts with me. My dogs name is Elvis. I love the interaction with the neighbors.  It can be quite challenging at times but honestly, how good would this game be if it was really easy? I would think it would get boring -quick! Definitely try this game, you'll get hooked, just like me....

I have really been enjoying this game but since the update 3 weeks ago every time I try and play it, it closes on me I can not play it like that and it is very infuriating. Edit: after the most recent update today the game will not even open. Not happy.

I believe the game would be more relaxing if the timed levels were either gone or longer.  Also, 2 stars to complete almost anything is ridiculous.  Takes me a week to play a day.  And the rewards for levels should be higher.  Otherwise, the graphics are nice. The rewards are getting better, would still like 1 star to complete a task.
description: Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory. Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free! The game features:● Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!● Hundreds of unique match-3 levels● Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with● An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up● An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything● Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more● A community that comes first — be neighbors with your Facebook friends!● A super addicting game you can even play offline! Gardenscapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Gardenscapes? Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GardenscapesInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenscapes_mobile/Twitter: https://twitter.com/garden_scapes Questions? comments: Don't get me wrong. I gave this game a 3 star rating but I love this one. The reason I gave this that rating is because it's ALMOST like Warframe for the PC. And I really want to see it be pushed to the limit and become THE Warframe for mobile. Maybe gave us the ability to equip the ninjas/heroes with different weapons and such which can be unlocked by your gold system and/or your diamonds. Really would give this game a long shelf life in my opinion. P.S. I love that wukong type ninja, saw what you did there. Wink wink. Keep up the good work, guys.

It's certainly one of the best action platformer in mobile. Many combos to perform and playstyle to choose. Doing harder combos should be more rewarding. The way I see it, it deals roughly the same amount of dmg. Pushing enemies off cliffs or throwing them to spikes is a disadvantage since the player can't collect their souls and you can't really use the environment to our advantage if you wanna get their souls. Multiplayer mode would be awesome. One downside. So many video ads in this game. Retrying on the last checkpoint will force an ad. Playing a couple of times will force another ad, and guess what, pausing will also force a fking ad. If the ads can be removed from any purchase (not sure if that's how it is, since I can find no source) or just charge the players for $1. I'd be happy.
I was playing through when a Guardian hammer guy spawned and immediately killed me. It had no attacnk animation and I died when he spawned at my position

only problem is when u go to upgrade straight out of a match, it starts at swordman, not ur most recently used character, also the movement can be pretty choppy and makes falling off the map too common

What the hell was that LAST UPDATE!? you changed currency on buff items!? You removed revive!? You make farming VERY HARD AND SLOW!?  Congratulations, you just made us HATE THE GAME we enjoyed so much! Thanks!

description: In the future, a strong, outstanding species is created from the combination of humans, technology and black metal.The government names them “shadow cyborg”, and allows every sector to have their own shadow security force (S.E.F), but all of theme have to be controlled by the Headquarter placed in Century city.Everything seems so perfect, til the day Headquarter is under attacked by a Dark Clan.CORE, a senior cyborg soldier discovers the plot too late.The Lord Commander of S.E.F is hacked, he slays his soldier and replace them by new shadow cyborg generation to take over the government.After the attack, CORE joins the rebel and heads to the city seeking revenge for his comrades and destroying the Dark Clan. Overdrive is a combination hack n slash and action platformer with many weapons available: sword, buster sword, spear, twin dagger...with unique built-in combos.Starting from the Dark Forest, you will face dangerous enemies and traps. In the fight, use your skill to avoid attack and make extraordinary combos.FEATURES of Overdrive - Ninja Shadow Revenge game:- Tutorial for newbie makes sure every player can know how to play - Playable OFFLINE- Smooth game control experience- Discover poweful combos in each weapon, make game full of fun and suprising.- Upgrade, customize & equip your hero with epic weapons & armor suits and more!- Ultra-stunning scifi graphic & effect - Giant boss with unique attack.FIGHTING of Overdrive game:- The screen’ll locked when enemies appear in the screen & you need to destroy numerous waves of enemies to continue going ahead.- Using avoiding skills to survive? Killing enemies madly?- Exploting traps & platforms to kill them?- There are many strategies to handle them.ADVENTURE & STORY:- Not only combat but also challenge your self to complete each level with many dangerous platforms.  VARIOUS WEAPONS:- Using different weapons ( Sword, Buster Sword, Spear,...) with their perfect combos bring unforgetable hack and slash game experience.- Players can pick their best weapons and also upgrade weapons to unlock new stronger combos. GRAPHIC & SOUND:- Amazing scifi high quality graphic makes sure you will be suprised.- It’s 2 available modes to set suitable graphic for your phone.SO YOU GONNA BE THE HERO WHO SAVES THE WORLD? ENJOY NOW!Have any question or feedback to make the game better? Please let us know.Contact us via: Email: gms.mobilegame@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/mobilearcadegame/
descriptionHTML:
In the future, a strong, outstanding species is created from the combination of humans, technology and black metal.
The government names them “shadow cyborg”, and allows every sector to have their own shadow security force (S.E.F), but all of theme have to be controlled by the Headquarter placed in Century city.
Everything seems so perfect, til the day Headquarter is under attacked by a Dark Clan.
CORE, a senior cyborg soldier discovers the plot too late.
The Lord Commander of S.E.F is hacked, he slays his soldier and replace them by new shadow cyborg generation to take over the government.
After the attack, CORE joins the rebel and heads to the city seeking revenge for his comrades and destroying the Dark Clan.
Overdrive is a combination hack n slash and action platformer with many weapons available: sword, buster sword, spear, twin dagger...with unique built-in combos.
Starting from the Dark Forest, you will face dangerous enemies and traps. In the fight, use your skill to avoid attack and make extraordinary combos.

FEATURES of Overdrive - Ninja Shadow Revenge game:
- Tutorial for newbie makes sure every player can know how to play
- Playable OFFLINE
- Smooth game control experience
- Discover poweful combos in each weapon, make game full of fun and suprising.
- Upgrade, customize & equip your hero with epic weapons & armor suits and more!
- Ultra-stunning scifi graphic & effect
- Giant boss with unique attack.

FIGHTING of Overdrive game:
- The screen’ll locked when enemies appear in the screen & you need to destroy numerous waves of enemies to continue going ahead.
- Using avoiding skills to survive? Killing enemies madly?
- Exploting traps & platforms to kill them?
- There are many strategies to handle them.

ADVENTURE & STORY:
- Not only combat but also challenge your self to complete each level with many dangerous platforms.

VARIOUS WEAPONS:
- Using different weapons ( Sword, Buster Sword, Spear,...) with their perfect combos bring unforgetable hack and slash game experience.
- Players can pick their best weapons and also upgrade weapons to unlock new stronger combos.

GRAPHIC & SOUND:
- Amazing scifi high quality graphic makes sure you will be suprised.
- It’s 2 available modes to set suitable graphic for your phone.

SO YOU GONNA BE THE HERO WHO SAVES THE WORLD? ENJOY NOW!

Have any question or feedback to make the game better? Please let us know.
Contact us via:
Email: gms.mobilegame@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mobilearcadegame/

70 Bowman St.
South Windsor, CT 06074

comments: It's an ok app and this is my third time redownloading it, the character designs have gotten better but there only problem I have, the tickets, like really? 2 tickets? First it was 5, then 3, now only 2. Not everyone has money to waste on games, especially tickets, not only that but their overpriced, like any other add on pack/item. I wouldn't even be surprised if I deleted this and redownloaded back in a year and they only give you one ticket a day.

Love that you can now earn gems from reading.  However part of the fun of games like this is the outfits and personalization of your character. Outfits and style choices should be free to choose the best one that advances you in the story. It's not fun playing a game that forces you to fail/have a negative outcome. Big decisions/game altering choices should cost gems that makes it fun spending your savings but ultimately free outfit/style choices please

It is nice that they let the readers write their own stories.  Many of the stories written by readers are more interesting than what Episode offers... The game takes too long to load when I open it and also when it loads a story.  Then you have to sit through at least two ads just to play the story. They need to let authors be able to delete their stories.  That would probably help on the loading time. Maybe if an author wants to delete their story, they have to explain why.  Then the story could be pending deletion (and have a note for readers) until Episode decides to accept or decline.

I LOVE THIS! But, just a thing, you could like ask on every episode (that the app creators make) like 'what's your gender and preference to date' because all the creator made ones at like just girls, and I know males play as well. Not hating AT ALL,I LOVE this app SO MUCH! Just tryna help ya improve! Luv you episode! (Or make more that are inclusive of gender) MEOW LOVE U

I really like 90% of this game. However, the way the passes are done really suck. I absolutely love when the 30 days unlimited ad free pass comes up for $9.99. Without it I practically refuse to play. It doesn't seem to be available as of a few days ago. I'm glad I recently purchased. Would also be cool to have a feature where you can send passes to friends.

I love love love this game! Its really awesome to see the creativity and beauty in an interactive game. There are some things I would love to request; hairstyles. Yes there are lots and that's really awesome but if you could customize both the bangs of the hairstyle AND the back hairstyle. A more diverse set of actions and hand held items. Also, body types. I am a thin girl but it would be a whole lot more to stories if there were curvy girls and not totally buff guys. Speaking of males, male looks to me are more limited than female. Only in special stories are there more diverse male looks. Facial features such as freckles, or scars, moles, and other facial markings would be much appreciated. Gosh this is a lot but I really hope these can be added for a more realistic game play. I love the game and I hope this is seen and added in updates to come

description: Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech? Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/
descriptionHTML:
Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.

The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.

As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.

The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.
Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.

This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!

PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.

Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/
developerAddress: Unit 04,7/F,Bright Way Tower, No.33 Mong Kok Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong

description: You've seen the video - now the lives of those charmingly dumb characters are in your hands.Enjoy 52 hilarious mini-games as you attempt to collect all the charmingly dumb characters for your train station, achieve high scores and unlock the famous music video that started it all.Download the FREE game now to enjoy the new fun and remember, be safe around trains. A message from Metro.GAMEPLAY- Why is his hair on fire? Who cares, just RUN!- Quickly wipe your screen free of puke- Balance that wobbling glue eater- Flick the piranhas out of range of those precious private parts- Swat wasps before it's too late- Best not invite that psycho killer inside- Carefully remove forks from toasters- Help self-taught pilots- Get back from the edge of the platform you fools- Have patience at level crossings- No crossing the tracks! Not even for balloons!- And who knew rattlesnakes were so picky about mustard?- Doing your own electrical work? Choose the wires carefully- Mind the gap! It’s a terrible hiding place!- Scratched the drug dealer’s ride, now avoid his bat- Taking expired medicine is not recommended- Stitch it up before bleeding out! - Perform a daring rescue from a burning building- Drag appliances back on the shelf to prevent accidents- Remember to stop at level crossings- Everyone loves bacon!  Even rattlesnakes!- Rotate the wires to complete the circuit- Only cross at pedestrian crossings - Remember the sequence for a fireworks show- Swipe to avoid a prickly crash- Sprung a leak?  Sprint to the shore!- Tap to tip toe to the ice cream- Keep the wasp nest from hitting the ground - Avoid eating rotten food- Leap over forest obstacles- Screw down the glue cap- Find the psycho before he finds you!- Smash the asteroids - Hunt for treasure, but don’t get hunted yourself- Ready, aim, and fire yourself onto an opposing galleon- Walk the plank, but don’t fall over- Barricade your home to stave off zombies- Follow the recipe to brew the perfect potion- Feed the bear candy before he feeds on you- Build the perfect snowman, but watch out for pointy carrots- Pouring drinks from a rickety ladder is inadvisable- Time your jump or get stuck in a chimney- Package the chocolates or feel love’s bite- Don’t Dumb with scissors- Drive up to a scenic lookout (but make sure to brake)PLUS- Perfect your dumb-death prevention skills to unlock the full set of characters for your train station- Create your own Dumb Ways character from loads of facial features, accessories and more!Watch the original Webby and Cannes award-winning video here: www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJNR2EpS0jw

I hate that there's no way to start over. First time playing it and trying to figure things out and then dying and losing everything.  I wanted to start over and make different choices now that I know how to play the game.

Its really good. I love how any ingame purchases are actually just viable shortcuts, and if you dont want to buy them the grind to get them isnt insane. The graphics and gameplay are extremely smooth, but like everyones saying the energy system is an issue. Also I kinda stress about loosing everything when im not playing so a bit more info on how looting players would be cool. Otherwise I love it

Good start to a Dark souls themed survival game. Energy gains are way to slow. Really hampers the ability to get any rhythm or flow and slows progress to a crawl. Still cool set up fun and challenging.
Kinda wish you would make a way to get more energy instead of only being able to play for a little bit and have to wait Hella long for your energy to refill but other than that I really like it
Pls don't keep that energy bar while playing it's getting over. And when we die all that player's things get disappeared. Pls make some arrangements. In crow event no items are available for looting
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!● EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.● LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.● DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!● SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.● OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.● BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.● JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.● RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.● SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.

102 Lenina Prosp., Office 311
Volgograd, 400078

recentChanges: — The game has been fully translated into Spanish, Portuguese and Italian languages;
— Added a new special loot source: Night Caches, which may appear only at night;
— Added new plant: Mandrake, which possesses mystical properties;
— For your convenience, added Push Notifications;
— Added sound of a ringing bell to notify exiles of the start and end of nighttime;
— Added new information panels, fixed several small issues.
summary: Survive as long as you can. Craft your weapons and battle against cursed souls.
title: Grim Soul: Dark Fantasy Survival

comments: Love the app. Great time killer. Certain times of the day when playing I notice a change of cards I get dealt usually the after noon I start losing every hand forcing me to get off. I have a straight the next person always has a higher hand. Seems suspicious. I know u can't win all the time but still. Also private tables where only friends/poker buddy's can join would be a definite plus to add to the game. As some of the randoms just f around and bet all in from the start.

For a poker fan that doesn't know this game it's worth the gamble lol. The game play is good, poor player avatar customisation options as it's simply a small selection of picture options with no options for using one's social media profile pic. To that end frequently there are multiple players with the same profile pic. It struggles a bit as a social game of cards because conversation is limited by time. It has nothing to stand it out & above other poker game apps for either negative or positive reasons. If you just want to play a good game of poker with random people from around the planet though it won't disappoint. It does give the option to buy top up chips and a daily option to get chips for free from both in game buddies and a poker machine. From the entertainment point of view it ticks all the right boxes.

I've found it very disappointing when  other user's connection is bad and their counter time takes forever while they're not even active. IMO if it happens twice they should be kicked. No one likes slow poker, especially when the player isn't even playing.  Other than that everything else is pretty awesome.

It's totally pay to play. It puts you on a fast table with higher stakes to start. You burn through your initial free chips in five minutes, then you have to either wait half a day or buy more. Well I'm not waiting 4 hours just to play cards, and I'm sure as hell not spending money when it goes so fast. Not fun at all.

Hands dont seem to be computer greedy to take your chips. Nor give higher level players generated wins with getting obvious flop or river cards giving them a win on a ridiculous hand they go all in on.

I recommend not to install. You can get banned anytime even without a warning or any explanation, and when u contact support you will get auto response. Bad customer support. I got banned a second after reporting two cheaters or bots idk and they took my 12 billions.

The devs of this game are the best devs in the Google Play Store. Again, Im truely greatful and I thank you guys. :D

Hello! I've seen this game many times from the ads and I tried installing it and later found that this game was really intertaining and fun. Anyways, I am having problems with the game's connectivity to the internet. I am using 4G in playing the game and it seems that it does not connect very well, other online games connect well to the internet. I think that is the only issue I have in mind. Just hoping for more smoothness though.. But I love the game, it is worth the time playing. Thank you!!

I dont know why you chosen Retro style graphic and i hope for a change. There is a lot of IRANIAN players but PING is over 250ms and too much delay. Add iran flag. Google play sign-in is not working. Add more skins. Events are just bunch of objectives and prizes, add more artworks and stuff for events. Other things are good for now. Thanks for the revolutionary IO game. Congratulation on 10million downloads 💝

Since the game is under process - it has a lot of room to improve. The studio is generous for the rewards and daily logins. They listen to the community and it takes time to fix those bumps. Love the game and the art also - unique and tasty! A competetive game that gives you urge to hustle more. Impressive game!   Been a butthurt person before - my apologies! Hope for the best!

Simple gameplay, no punishments for going AFK, simple ranked system, a little bit of P2W with new heroes and awaken system, but still based around skill, as a 4th awaken level BarBarQ can beat a 5th awaken one. Some things that we dont have counterplay to seem like complete BS at first, but once we find counterplay, it makes for an even match

comments: I play this game regularly, and I enjoy the differing modes available. You can play happily without paying for any additional content, however at higher levels paying will help you progress. By this time you will have poured hours into it, so I do not think it is unreasonable. Save your gold until later levels (player level 15+) and you can get by without in game purchases for quite a while.

I'm rating this high because I've played it before and I absolutely love it. However, I cannot currently trying get it to load. I get the initial splash screen and it says 'Building camp...' The loading bar fills and then.... Nothing. It just hangs there forever. I've tried clearing cache and reinstalling. Any ideas? I'd love to play again.

I absolutely love this game. Turn based tactics are one of my favourite types of games. Since playing the game more I've decided that there's not enough gas for me to be able to enjoy the game like I want to. I think the car should either hold more, or gas should be easier to get. This is just a game that already has inconsistencies with reality. Otherwise I love the game

Just loved it... I am at council level 18 now... Weapon upgrade xp cost should be reduced or just remove workshop. No use of WORKSHOP with such high xp cost because its REASONABLE to upgrade your SURVIVOR than their WEAPONS.... Please for next update reduce weapon upgrade cost....

I have this game, and I play this more than watching the actual show. You can bring together a motley crew of survivors for missions and get gear to make them stronger. Build a camp, in order to multiply resources, because you will need them to improve other buildings. Also, to note, this game will not allow you to get stronger unless you improve your camp. I have survivors who cannot level up until I Improve the council. The training grounds will not be built any further unless you improve the council. Its like a city/fort building game with tactical rpg feel to it.  There is a leaderboard, that actually awards you for being at a certain tier. You can join guilds to help get better gear. I love this game!  ...The con that I have with this is that every time of logging on, deals are thrown in my face, and it is enticing too.

I've been playing this game for two years now and I can never put it down. It's such an amazing game. I'd like it even more though if the characters we originally fell in love with were available. Like Andrea, T-Dog, Lori, etc.
description: Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle. • FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead • JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - GamezeboFor more, please visit:http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomanslandhttp://twitter.com/twdnomanslandhttp://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.comhttp://www.youtube.com/nxtgmsFor player support, please visit:nextgames.helpshift.com
descriptionHTML:
Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

recentChanges: The Walking Dead Season 8 missions continue every Monday! Watch the episode, play through the memorable moments the next day in No Man’s Land and earn Rick tokens along the way.
Gather your guild and explore the new “In the Dead of Night” challenge.
The update includes many bug fixes and performance improvements.

comments: THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER!!! I totally recommend it to EVERYONE who loves addictive games and dragons. I find myself constantly playing this game all the time! I honestly feel like I can't say how much I LOVE this game with words. Again, this is the best game a player can have. Just one thing, I wish there were more ways to get gems instead of just buying 'cause I can't buy anything. So please make gems more easier to get.😊

I like it overall, but recently random ads pop up out of nowhere.  This is quite annoying, especially when you are about to do something.  You also cannot immediately skip these ads if you wish to do so.  There is a fast forward icon for some, but only after a certain amount of time.

Have been playing for a while now, great time passer. Do find it frustrating when getting orbs or dragons as prizes the you get continually get the same orbs. If gotten enough orbs to summon the same dragon 3 times while getting very few  other orbs. Or you get really close to the required number and that orb stops appearing. Hard not to spend money to save time.

Don't waste your time with this game. It started out as a really awesome game until I found out that the developers only care about getting your money and after they get your money they don't give you what you paid for and you spend a week fighting with the developers to get what you purchase. After you get to a certain level in the game you can either buy the gems so you can continue your progress or stay stuck where you are. I am uninstalling this game and I suggest that you don't waste your time with this game.
