description: Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!FEATURES- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere. There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGameLike us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCitySubscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannelCheck out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!
descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!
developerAddress:
Llacuna 166,
Planta 10
08018 Barcelona
Spain
recentChanges: Dragon City’s first social update: Play with other Dragon Masters!
- Join Alliances to chat and cooperate with other players!
- There’s a new element in the game: Primal! Come and discover their behavior in battle and be amazed by their look, a cool mix of dinosaurs, magic, and technology.

- Start opening Alliance Chests! By joining forces with the Dragons Masters in your Alliance to complete tasks, you'll be able to reach milestones and open Alliance Chests containing Primal Dragon Orbs!
summary: 💎Collect awesome dragons and become the ultimate Dragon Master! 🐲
title: Dragon City

comments: Can one also be able yo take turns??  I dont like it straight all the way to nowere. And brake should be fully efective one should STOP anytime he wants and also dont sale cars it should just be affordable by coins  Its really a gr8 game but only a little more work.

Ok..but needs work No challenge n no real upgrade kinda wasting my time. And what's up with this buying the last car, there's no horn and way to keep the player interested that is why give it only three stars now if you fix it maybe I'll give give stars😶😴😴😴

Spin my ride No more speed, I'm almost there! Gotta keep cool, now gotta take care. Last car to pass, here I go! As the line of cars are going so slow! 5 star rad! Gotta get back to the game, all. See ya....Speed thrills!

Basic. You have to over take cars... That's it. When they talk about the physics being like simulation they are lieing. Left right go stop. Poor 16bit sound that you will want to turn off. It's like a game from the 80s. Uninstall.

Incredibly boring gameplay with absolutely no objective. I got bored within minutes after realising that there's nothing to do. No improvements on the first version. Why not add a chase element or even timed checkpoints... anything even?!

Nice but there is a bug when we accelerate in high speed... when you hit the right and left side way it's not crashes but only slow speed.. improve to make this more amazing at going hehe... also make the purchase one 4.99$ make it affordable by coin farmer so free player can be able use it :) thanks dev!
description: Sick of endless racing games with third person perspective? Racing in Car is the best mobile racing game you have been looking for. You drive your car in cockpit view through the endless traffic and realistic environment. Tilt your device to drag your car wherever you want, overtake traffic, earn coins and buy new cars.Features- Easy to learn and drive- 3D realistic cockpit view- Endless game mode- Different locations and cars to choose- Simulator-like controlsTry Racing in Car now to see how far the mobile racing experience come nowadays.

comments: 3 stars because the spins are not giving what is needed for the game. It's a cute game. I enjoy playing with my daughter. However, shields do not spin enough. Sometimes I will go a whole day with no shields and the whole time I'm getting attacked. The other thing is the bonus spin. Never have I won more that 250k coins. I know you want us to pay for another spin but maybe award a higher number once in a while. All in all cute game.

Game is pretty cool but I won't spend money because what you get for your money is not worth it. They raise the prices of the chest to get cards and it's already hard to get the coins to build villages, get raided and attacked so much it takes months to get to the next villages. I hope y'all up the amount of coins on spins because it doesn't go up much at all but the cost of everything else shoots up like crazy.

I used to love this game. Even now I play this game everyday but I m getting sick and tired when I get the same card over and over. Even when I complete villages and buy chest I still get the same card. I buy all 3 type of chest but it's very hard to get gold cards. Most of the sets I need only 1 gold card to complete but it take ages to come...I m planing to uninstall it. And now I don't get any spins when my friend join in and the answer your customer support give was 'because one of my friend is a fake profile in my Facebook. How do I know if that account is fake or not? I invite alot of people to this game and how am I to identify who is real and fake...

Waste of time. The game is set up to try and get you to pay. If you don't, you get attacked a lot. Speaking of attack, your attackers are not matched to your level.  For every 8 coins you gain during regular gameplay, you lose 30 from attackers. In your frustration, you'll consider buying.  App trap...

Every time i get burn village within 1 HR ....and not get anything good point... See my point 382 and village7lvl.  ..but totally bad  to see others  points is totally low like 188 and her village 9lvl am totally disappointed on this game.... So I No need to play any more....

I would given 5 stars to this game. But from past few days I am not getting 40 spins as reward when my friends join coin master from the request which i have sent them. Its really annoying !!!!!!  I have sent so many mails to the support team but no one bothers to reply back.
description: Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top! Do you have what it takes to be the next Coin Master? Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!Spin to earn your lootSpin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Win your loot by landing on coins or gold sacks so you can build strong villages through the game and move up in levels. Win shields to guard your village from other vikings trying to attack you. Become the Coin Master with the strongest village and the most loot!Attack and Raid fellow vikings!Earning coins through the slot machine isn't the only way to get loot, you can steal it too! Attack or raid friend and foe to save enough loot to build your village. No need to break the piggy bank! Fight back and come out victorious against your enemies. Boom! Take revenge on those who have attacked your village and take whats rightfully yours! Bring your Coin Dozer and get rich again! You never know what treasures you can find in someone else's village! Collect all the Cards!It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! Collect cards to complete sets and move on to the next village. With every village you conquer your wins will be greaterPlay with friends!Trade your cards with our online community to collect them all! Join our fast growing interactive Facebook community to meet new viking friends, earn big rewards, and trade treasures! ★ Battle your way to be the next Coin Master with your friends by your side.★ Join in millions of players worldwide!★ Coin Master is free on all devices with in-app purchases.Follow Coin Master on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!Facebook: www.facebook.com/coinmasterAre you having problems? comments: Problems , with new update. It resets the game or sends it to the Google market page, if it loads it does plays single events,but use any of the top tabs,and it Chuck's you out of the game! the new update doesn't work ! Please lower prices on the gems too!!!!!!

Excellent concept with poor execution.  The balance between chassis energy total, equipment slots, and energy used by equipment is hopelessly unbalanced. What's the point in unlocking a chassis with 2 weapon slots that only has enough energy to equip 1?
Had a 5 star before the update. Now it's pay to win. I get that you want to make money from your app but making the game worse than wanting money...poor business decision. Do not download.

It's a good concept but the developers have gotten greedy. The only way to win or advance is to pay money. It was a lot more fun before the update and the requirement to pay for any part to upgrade. Stupid decision, I definitely going to uninstall!

I loved this game. Passed tense. I played it the month it came out and still do. Even tho the devs don't care about the users just the money. Which its there game they can do what they want. But they blatantly disregard what we want and like and give us stuff we have no interest in and don't fix issues.

comments: I was really surprised to find that the first nite I played, 4 hours past before I even knew it!! The gameplay is detailed jobs you choke do.  Not the Teamany many things to do and also KILL ZOMBIES. Controls are very easy., and you figure out more things thatr fun. The Music plays in background is a cool little Duddie! This is the best game ever, keep it guys. Well done just fix one, caravan park where zombies hide behind caravans and u can't see them even when u move arrows. Its not realistic honestly!

I loved it at first... thought it was one of the best zombie games in town. Until I realized that every time I logged back in to play the money I'd earned in the previous game wasn't showing and my total was actually going down by a few hundred. So LAME.

descriptionHTML:
Zombie Hunter is one of the best free zombie games ever! Get ready to survive the zombie apocalypse in the ultimate first person shooter sniper game. Take your gun, aim to the head and kill the undead with headshots to stop the deadly plague virus infection. You are the only one capable to stop living dead waves, destroy the zombie tsunami horde, survive and save humanity! Do you think you can do it? The Zombie Apocalypse has just begun. A virus pandemic is spreading over the world, and people are starting to mutate into some kind of walking dead. Humanity is in danger, and you have been called to help survivors by killing the zombie outbreak. Travel to Dead Zone, take your rifle and try your sniper skills shooting the unkilled! You will need strategy, precision and cold blood to stop the zombie assault in this action shooter game. Survival is the only way. Keep your finger on the trigger and make headshots to every living dead!

★ Download Zombie Hunter, the best free zombie shooter game, and start killing living deads right now! Become the ultimate combat killer and end the plague virus infection! ★

In Zombie Hunter you are a sniper that must save humanity from a zombie outbreak. Hundreds of civilians are waiting to be saved! Kill zombies before they can reach people. You must be quick in this 3D action survival game full of undead enemies!

SEVERAL GAME MODES
Shoot zombies hordes from a helicopter, defeat zombie bosses in special missions, play as a zombie instead as a survivor, use dogs to help you to find treasures and kill enemies, aim from a rooftop… You have many ways to play Zombie Hunter!

Infested City, Abandoned Theme Park, Dead Port, Arctic… Travel to each Dead Zone and kill your zombie enemies through tens of funny missions. Take your sniper rifle and shoot every walking dead. Aim and make a headshot in this 3D undead shooter game!

DOZENS OF WEAPONS TO UPGRADE
Do you prefer sniper rifles, assault rifles, bazookas or machine guns? Choose your favorite and upgrade them! They can be more powerful and faster, which is very useful when you are fighting a living dead army. It will be easier to make headshots in the game!

STUNNING 3D GRAPHICS
Zombies are more real than ever! You will be impressed by graphics, new gameplay and immersive soundtrack. Environments are detailed and bullet time will enchant you! Zombie Hunter is the best zombie apocalypse game with FPS and action elements!

GET POWERUPS!
You can use several power ups to help you in combat. Improve your aim, stop the time, get extra energy… You will need some of them if you want to kill all zombies with headshots! Because the more headshots you make, the more money you win!

PLAY OFFLINE OR ONLINE!
Don’t you have internet connection? No wifi around you? No worries! You can play this zombie game online or offline, which means you can enjoy every part of Zombie Hunter without being connected to the net. Isn’t it wonderful?


Mankind needs you to stop the undead plague infection! Zombies are searching for brains and you are the only one who can destroy them. Will you end the living dead z war killing them all? Take your sniper rifle and bullets, call your dog, go to the Dead Zone and prepare to fight against the forces of evil! Hunting zombies have never been so funny!

If you like First Person Shooter (FPS games), zombie survival games, sniper games and strategy war games, you will enjoy Zombie Hunter! It’s fun, challenging and has a very intense and innovative gameplay that surely you will enjoy. Join the Zombie Hunter army and start shooting every walking dead in the ultimate zombie sniper game! comments: It's fast and fun so much better than the other new ones. I love playing it. Thank u so much for all your work and the time spent making it a blast to play.  PS getting past level 80 isn't  possible so I quit. Made me so sad.if you could just make it possible to win more often I'd play it more, plus give more bombs would REALLY HELP.

It's fine up to a point. The higher the level after 300+ it becomes too difficult and it forces you to spend money, which isn't that much of an issue till you see the price of the items, refuse to spend any money as it's blatant greed.  Probably uninstall if it continues like this

On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

The scene at the end of the level is annoying and takes 5 seconds to play out. Then you have to wait for it to load back to show your stars getting in your chest and your coins. It would be better if it just proceeded to the next level saving about 30 seconds. All that to say, it's an addicting game.

I really enjoyed it up until I got to like level 118. The only way I could figure out the pass that level was to use the things at the bottom of the screen or the things the page where you choose what you want to put in there in advance. But if you don't buy extra coins then you can't either had moves or get anything that will help you along. Not to mention that 100 coins per item is a lot of money. When you charge $2 450 coins. I'm taking this game off my apps.

Although this game is addictive and sometimes fun, it seems the producers of the game are greedily taking advantage of people and getting them to pay money for things not worth it(but they feel the pressure to do so, so they do it). Some things in this game are deliberately set up to make the player fail and become desperate to play on and spend. The Champions League is a poor idea which produces terrible prizes for high ranks, and is just a replay of previous played levels which is a let down.

comments: Simply wonderful app!! My daughter's speech is delayed and I introduced this to her at 17months. By 20months, we were hearing her sounding out the letters after it's repeated in the app and she has learnt to choose the correct letter when asked by the app. She couldn't get enough of it! Now we've moved on to shapes and colours that she's working through now at 22months. It's truly amazing. Thank u for no ads. Beautiful graphics. No issues with touch or connecting. Would love British English version tho where 'Z' sounds out as 'Zed.'

I absolutely love this app! My child has learnt so much from this along with all the other apps similar as well. There are no adds which is very much appreciated with a 3 year old that will click on anything. I would recommend to anyone!!
Well I can't give 5* till I fully know,but my four yr old loves,it she's left handed, and has some problems with some words,so this helps with that,so I think its a great app so far

Thank you very much for making this app available without any advertising or in app purchases, and also allowing it to store on my sd card so as to save my phones internal resources.  It is very much appreciated.
It's a grate app, but my 2 year-old has trouble with the sensitivity of the screen, maybe add option to add ?

Amazing app for toddlers. My 2 girls LOVE it. I like how after they say each letter they sound out the letters. And for the other section where the "a is for apple" i think it should be the whole alphabet instead of just a few selection of letters. Because some times the letters repeat.. Like they're learning on just letters j or a.. Etc. Idk if you understand me or not. Oh well just my opinion but THANK YOU Also, for those of you saying it has bugs or its very glitched. CHECK YOUR CONNECTION. most of the time when that happens its because either your phone is sh** or you have bad service. Get on that WI-FI
description: Looking for a fun, free, and simple educational app to help your toddler learn phonics and trace letters of the alphabet? Look no further than ABC Kids.ABC Kids is a free phonics and alphabet teaching app that makes learning fun for children, from toddlers all the way to preschoolers and kindergartners. It features a series of tracing games to help kids recognize letter shapes, associate them with phonic sounds, and put their alphabet knowledge to use in fun matching exercises. Any toddler, kindergartener or preschool age child can learn English and the English alphabet simply by following the arrows with their finger. They can even collect stickers and toys as they complete tracing games!ABC Kids is more than just a kid-friendly educational app, it was designed with adult participation in mind, too. The interface keeps toddlers focused on alphabet reading and writing, tucking menu commands away from moving fingers. Adults can easily access settings to engage Teacher Mode, look at report cards, or toggle tracing and phonics games to better facilitate learning.Best of all, ABC Kids is full-featured and free from in-app purchases and third party advertisements. Toddlers and adults can enjoy learning together without interruption.Features:- A colorful early education app that helps children learn the English alphabet.- Includes ABC tracing games, phonics pairing, letter matching, and more.- Uppercase and lowercase letters to trace, listen to, and match.- Smart interface helps kids focus on phonics and letters without accidentally exiting the game.- No third party ads, no in-app purchases, no tricks. Just pure educational fun!Note to Parents:When creating ABC Kids, we wanted to build the best experience possible for both adults and for children. We're parents ourselves, and we know how paywalls, in-app purchases, and intrusive third party advertisements can detract from the learning experience. With ABC Kids, we put the features of a paid app into a preschool friendly package, leaving out frustrating pop-ups and microtransactions. The end result is exactly the educational experience we want for our children. We think you and your family will enjoy it, too!- Best wishes from the parents at RV AppStudios
descriptionHTML:
Looking for a fun, free, and simple educational app to help your toddler learn phonics and trace letters of the alphabet? Look no further than ABC Kids.

ABC Kids is a free phonics and alphabet teaching app that makes learning fun for children, from toddlers all the way to preschoolers and kindergartners. It features a series of tracing games to help kids recognize letter shapes, associate them with phonic sounds, and put their alphabet knowledge to use in fun matching exercises. Any toddler, kindergartener or preschool age child can learn English and the English alphabet simply by following the arrows with their finger. They can even collect stickers and toys as they complete tracing games!

ABC Kids is more than just a kid-friendly educational app, it was designed with adult participation in mind, too. The interface keeps toddlers focused on alphabet reading and writing, tucking menu commands away from moving fingers. Adults can easily access settings to engage Teacher Mode, look at report cards, or toggle tracing and phonics games to better facilitate learning.

Best of all, ABC Kids is full-featured and free from in-app purchases and third party advertisements. Toddlers and adults can enjoy learning together without interruption.

Features:
- A colorful early education app that helps children learn the English alphabet.
- Includes ABC tracing games, phonics pairing, letter matching, and more.
- Uppercase and lowercase letters to trace, listen to, and match.
- Smart interface helps kids focus on phonics and letters without accidentally exiting the game.
- No third party ads, no in-app purchases, no tricks. Just pure educational fun!

Note to Parents:
When creating ABC Kids, we wanted to build the best experience possible for both adults and for children. We're parents ourselves, and we know how paywalls, in-app purchases, and intrusive third party advertisements can detract from the learning experience. With ABC Kids, we put the features of a paid app into a preschool friendly package, leaving out frustrating pop-ups and microtransactions. The end result is exactly the educational experience we want for our children. We think you and your family will enjoy it, too!

- Best wishes from the parents at RV AppStudios

recentChanges: Ready to help your children learn while having fun? ABC Kids makes it easy to train their brains and learn the ABCs through a wide variety of mini-games, all for FREE! Colorful graphics, collectible stickers, and lots of puzzles to solve, all without in-app purchases or third party ads.
Our latest update to ABC Kids features numerous bug fixes and performance improvements designed to make it easier for children to learn while playing. Download now and let the education begin!
summary: Fun phonics & alphabet tracing game for toddlers, preschool & kindergarten kids!
title: ABC Kids - Tracing & Phonics

comments: The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Absolutely amazing game!!! I'm a huge petrol head and this ticks all boxes considering it's a phone game. Love the controls. Personally i use accelerator on right, brake on left and tilt to turn. Feels bang on. Graphics top notch. No need to spend money to progress. Literally one downfall... upgrade costs when you get higher spec cars. Apart from that... GOOD JOB!!!

Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

description: **#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.Over 200 Million Downloads! descriptionHTML:
**#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**

Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Over 200 Million Downloads!

TabbyAwards 2014 – WINNER: Best Action, Adventure, Arcade & Racing Game
Mobile Excellence Awards – WINNER: Best Mobile Game 2013
Game Connect Asia Pacific – WINNER: Game of The Year 2013, Technical Excellence, Excellence in Art
Meffy Awards – FINALIST: Best Mobile Game 2013

Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.

**This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device.**

PRAISE FOR REAL RACING 3
“Feels a full generation ahead of the competition” (IGN, 9.1/10, Editors’ Choice)
“A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)
“Sets the new standard on mobile for racing games” (Pocket Gamer, 9/10, Gold Award)

REAL CARS
Take the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.

REAL TRACKS
Burn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.

MORE CHOICES THAN EVER
Compete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.

THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE
Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

Welcome to the definitive racing experience.

descriptionHTML:
Battle Saiyan Play Goku is a 2D action-fighting game and running game for mobile platforms A legend character of our Childhood Saiyan Goku Dragon games succeed to join indispensable list of game fighters. As you know, while Goku searching the dragon, he discovers the world and he encounters with lots of difficulties.

The objective of Goku Saiyan is beating all of the enemies on your way. In this game, you have to transform into heroes saiyan. One Saiyan Warrior. Can turn into Super Superhero. To protect the Earth from enemies and He placed the god of destruction Berus in the game you have to accumulate a penny earned.

To improve blood supply, strength and skill of their saiyan. Note the magic beans in the game. We help you revitalize blood and mana Unlike comics. The enemies in the game will differ slightly. Beautiful and attractive.

Goku the protagonist keeps searching Dragon. If you do not want your enemy to find Dragon before you, get the lead out! And beat all of your enemies. You can play this game with your buddy besides playing as single. You will not realize how time passed while playing. Let’s find these Dragon !
recentChanges: A legend character of our Childhood Saiyan Goku Dragon games

comments: Fun game, but don't bother with the events if you work (the folks who can buy keys) it gives too many other "gifts" before the item you need.  1 needed item out of 4 attempts. You never have enough time to finish events. Otherwise fun.  I like the new animal pens. Need room too.

Its a good game. If you had the ability to sell certain things back it would be nice, or a way to earn more keys. I got the dog house and wasn't even close to affording a dog. Now I'm stuck with a dog house that just takes up space. Fix that and you'll get five stars

I love this game in every manner, way shape and form. It's awesome because it is a strategy that for once does not involve violence and agression. I enjoy playing it because of the social aspect of the game, being the co-ops with which you can trade and befriend other players. A lot of people complain about how long everything takes, but in my opinion everything takes just the right amount of time.

I'm so mad. All my progress was lost and I have absolutely no idea why. I was almost up to level 37!! 😡😡😡😡 I logged into facebook to see if I could resume play but NOPE straight back to level one on my device AND cloud. Not happy at ALL! Is there anything I can do??

When and if ever the bugs get worked out it will be a great game.  The chat issues are ridiculous and getting into global and the market are impossible. The spinning sun of death gets old fast. Upgrades seem to make items disappear.

Played it for years and recently lost my device. Tried syncing with the new device and couldn't do irrespective of trying N number of times. Zynga support just doesn't seem to be bothered at all. Automated emails is all you get. Wish they would help!
description: **App Store Best of 2014**Escape to the world of farming, friends and fun! Go on farm adventures to collect rare goods and craft new recipes. Raise animals and grow your farm with friends. Join a farm Co-Op to trade and share or play on your own in Anonymous Mode. You can play FarmVille anytime, anywhere… even when not connected to the internet. Best of all, the world’s most popular farming game is free to play! ** ”FarmVille is back and this time, it’s portable!” – TIME **** “”Officially not just for Facebook anymore”” – Los Angeles Times **** “” They may have built the best FarmVille game of the series”” – Kotaku **-  CRAFT a variety of baked gourmet goods like classic country apple pies- HARVEST farm fresh crops of your favorite fruits and vegetables- CUSTOMIZE your own farm for charming country living- COLLECT hidden and rare items as you discover a new coastal farm- NURTURE and raise a wide variety of adorable animals like your very own farm dog- EXPLORE a new FarmVille story filled with special farm adventures- BUILD a lush family farm by the coast so all your friends can visit- FISH with your fellow farmers and sell your catch at Pike’s Landing- GARDEN by the beautiful blue ocean as you decorate your farm with flowers and fresh produce- TRADE and chat with friends or play anonymously with people from all over the world- ESCAPE to the coast then connect to your Facebook farm to send free water- EARN daily rewards with the Mystery Chest and take a spin at the Prize Wheel”Additional information:•        The game is free to play; however, in-app purchases are available for additional content and in-game currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $199.99 USD. •        Use of this application is governed by Zynga’s Terms of Service, found at www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service. •        For information about how Zynga uses personal data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.
descriptionHTML:
**App Store Best of 2014**
Escape to the world of farming, friends and fun! Go on farm adventures to collect rare goods and craft new recipes. Raise animals and grow your farm with friends. Join a farm Co-Op to trade and share or play on your own in Anonymous Mode. You can play FarmVille anytime, anywhere… even when not connected to the internet. Best of all, the world’s most popular farming game is free to play!
** ”FarmVille is back and this time, it’s portable!” – TIME **
** “”Officially not just for Facebook anymore”” – Los Angeles Times **
** “” They may have built the best FarmVille game of the series”” – Kotaku **
- CRAFT a variety of baked gourmet goods like classic country apple pies
- HARVEST farm fresh crops of your favorite fruits and vegetables
- CUSTOMIZE your own farm for charming country living
- COLLECT hidden and rare items as you discover a new coastal farm
- NURTURE and raise a wide variety of adorable animals like your very own farm dog
- EXPLORE a new FarmVille story filled with special farm adventures
- BUILD a lush family farm by the coast so all your friends can visit
- FISH with your fellow farmers and sell your catch at Pike’s Landing
- GARDEN by the beautiful blue ocean as you decorate your farm with flowers and fresh produce
- TRADE and chat with friends or play anonymously with people from all over the world
- ESCAPE to the coast then connect to your Facebook farm to send free water
- EARN daily rewards with the Mystery Chest and take a spin at the Prize Wheel”
Additional information:
• The game is free to play; however, in-app purchases are available for additional content and in-game currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $199.99 USD.
• Use of this application is governed by Zynga’s Terms of Service, found at www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service.
• For information about how Zynga uses personal data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.

description: Run to chase after the robber and explore the endless runner worlds of Talking Tom Gold Run! You can now go for gold in the BRAND NEW CHINESE-INSPIRED DEFAULT WORLD and race to catch the fun with loads of FREE CHARACTERS and the NEW SPECIAL CHARACTER - KUNG FU HANK! He’s an unstoppable force of fun! So what are you waiting for? Get ready to celebrate the Chinese New Year with all your favorite Talking Tom and Friends characters! Whether you’re a kid, or just young at heart, this cool game will have you running, jumping, and getting an EPIC ADRENALINE RUSH IN NO TIME AT ALL! Join billions of other Talking Tom and Friends fans and test your snowboarding skills. Rush snowboards on the snow! Rule the slopes! And have endless fun playing one of the best infinite runners out there! ★ Get a rush as you run through the new Chinese-inspired neighborhood. ★ Travel through the subway tunnel to race down the slopes and ride the halfpipe on your new snowboard – it’s super cool!!!★ Meet special guest star, Kung Fu Hank, and spend the winter with your favorite characters, Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger!GET READY, SET, RUN!! Come and have fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chase after the robber who stole your gold and unlock new worlds. Do you have what it takes to run through all the worlds and win? It’s not super easy to be the best, but we believe in you! Start running and racing now. It’s time to go for gold! Run to chase the robber – he’s got your gold! Use the gold bars you get back to build and upgrade amazing homes for Talking Tom and Friends! The finished homes will then unlock new worlds just for you! So, what are you waiting for? Let’s run for fun this winter! ★★★ENJOY THE FUN OF TALKING TOM GOLD RUN★★★- ENDLESS FUN: With endless running, racing, and snowboarding, the fun never ends!!!- MISSIONS AND REWARDS: Win missions to get cool rewards! - BUILD AMAZING HOMES: Use the gold bars you collect to build homes for Talking Tom and Friends! - UNLOCK NEW RUNNING WORLDS: Explore even more fun worlds when you upgrade your home! - RUN WITH SPECIAL CHARACTERS: Run even faster and do cool tricks with the help of special characters!PLAY FOR FREE! This app contains:- The possibility to use and connect with friends via social networks;- The option to make in-app purchases;- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (build progress, in-game functionalities, etc.);- Promotions for Outfit7’s products, as well as advertising;- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress;- Videos to watch starring Outfit7’s animated characters via YouTube integration; and- Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps.This app is PRIVO certified. comments: Guys this game is the best offline game I have ever played as it is toooooo much addictive. U would not believe me, firstly u would die very easily but as u play on then it would be easy to create high score. It also makes your reflexes more faster. The creators have done a great work. And people who are saying there are lots of adds are talking rubbish.  Play it!!!!!

Want to play an ad? Download this game and you'll get to experience all the thrills of pop up ads between brief stints of playing the game you thought you downloaded instead of the ads. There is at least two ads per game. Some of the ads go landscape to further increase game play pleasure, X one out and Bam! Bonus round go straight to the app store to see the ad you X'ed out available for download. Go back and BAM try the X again YOU GO BACK TO THE SAME PLACE. Good times were had played ten games and uninstalled. ADWARE ten millions downloaded how many kept it longer than twenty minutes.

It's so fun with all the different types of patterns.im telling you its the best game you will play in your life.When I die it's actually quite good, because the last time I did had 100 to spend and when I had passed the next 4 rounds I had 10,000 to spend so you should realy get this game,and Change your life people.Plus the new thing is the star block makes you invincible for a short amount of time for example I was going when I had 93 and I went in 24 star and I Could go through 100 and 123,000 for 1 minute. Anyway great game if you liked my review go onto Episode to see that review. Hope you love the game. Oh and I forgot to tell you a list of all the patterns we have purple, green,rainbow,pink,🍔,💵,🚗 and grey.

It's a very fun game with so much to offer, the snake colors are very funny and colorful, but one thing I do not like is that there are SO many ads! When you simply try to restart a game it makes ANOTHER ad pop up for the 35 time. Please fix this issue.

Nice concept, nice controls, the problem is that is too much randomnes and less skill. It forces me in corners where I'm definitely dead or the good boxes are in corners where i can't go because of the walls and that also means im dead. Please make it less random or ar least make that if i comith to a path and because of the game i cant chage is, at least dont make the first mistake ista death.

It's to many ads like beyond the amount I've seen on any other app. You lose a life then there a 30 sec ad after every time you lose a life. When the ads over you jump right back into the game. Making it difficult to play because it doesn't give you enough time to make your next move. If they remove the ads may it would be a better game.

comments: Amazing! I love it but I absolutely HATE that you only get 1 key every 2 hours. And once you get 2 keys it stops giving you them. I love the freshman and I'm on chapter 11 but it will take me ages to finish all of them as the lack of keys you give. I think it should be 2 keys every 1 hour and the keys come non-stop. I will change my review to a 5 star if you consider and use some of these suggestions. Thank You.

I freaking love this game but I do recommend more energy or at least less time to wait for energy. Please and thank you :)  P.S. We need more diamonds some how like. Maybe you should let us watch ads for 2-5 diamond's each ad. Or do a daily login type thing. I know you guys wont but I've been playing this game a ton and for a long time. i restart everything because when you guys make new stories it makes me want to use diamonds but I don't have anymore. I restarted the game like over 10 times honestly. Thanks for a great game though.

I absolutely adore this app. I'm addicted to it. Im not that bothered that it takes two hours to get one key because it gives you time to do other things like go outside and have fun. And besides you can easily just start a different series. The first chapter of each book doesn't cost anything. I don't really like the fact that once you have got two keys it stops giving you them. I am on the sophomore book one chapter nine. It's really exciting so far. I think this app is a really good influence on kids to get them into reading. Overall I LOVE THIS APP!!!!!!!

I never thought I would find a game like this that would work so well and play so easily! The only things I would change would be adding videos to gain more gems, or getting 2 gems after each chapter. Maybe even some extra gems after finishing a story? Getting gems on previously finished stories as well. I would also add the option to replay a chapter from the menu, not only after playing the chapter. Other than that, THIS GAME IS A MUST PLAY!

Ok, so unless there is a secret version of this game that I don't have, your ads are misleading. I see ads about stories that don't exist in this app like the one where the girl is pregnant or the "blood bound" one. Please have what you say you have. Also diamonds are bloody expensive, seriously! How long is it going to take before you fix the no. 1 complaint? And one diamond per chapter? That's cheap. The stories are well written and intriguing but the cons outweigh the pros. I'm reducing my rating.

I really do love the stories this game offers. I just wish the key and diamond system was better. I feel like I've purposely passed up some great stories just to play through them quickly so I could get back to the current story I'm really hooked on. Not to mention I've put money into the game as well. But being on a budget, I'm limited with what I can do. Sadly I think that is what will eventually make me stop playing such a great game. It's just too expensive in the end.
description: One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!- Form alliances to build your army.- Master unique weapons.- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.- Examine evidence at crime scenes.- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.Enjoy,- The Pixelberry Team
descriptionHTML:
One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:


THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.
- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!

THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!

- Form alliances to build your army.
- Master unique weapons.
- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.
- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!

MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?

- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.
- Examine evidence at crime scenes.
- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!

...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!

Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.

Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.

Enjoy,

- The Pixelberry Team
developerAddress:
Pixelberry Studios
201 SAN ANTONIO CIR 205
MOUNTAIN VIEW, CA, 94040-1271, US
recentChanges: From science-fiction to supernatural romance to courtly intrigue, Choices is bringing brand new genres along with more of your favorites!
Thanks to all our players for your support! You make this all possible! And if you love Choices, let us know by leaving a FIVE-STAR REVIEW!
summary: Fall in love or go on adventures in stories where YOU control what happens!
title: Choices: Stories You Play

comments: This is an amazing rogue like. I only have one problem with the game - WHY IS THERE NO CONSOLE/PC VERSION?!? I would pay good money for a PC or console rendition of thus game. As a mobile game it's nothing much, but throw this on steam and it would rival Binding of Isaac. All in all a great, smooth and challenging game! I definitely recommend it!

I saw this game earlier back in 2017, but was reluctant to try it. Though I'm very glad I decided to try it out today, because the first several minutes were pretty awesome. The music on the title especially got me hyped to play. I'll probably be keeping this one for a while.

An excellently made game with a wide diversity of weapons, enemies, challenges, level designs. A very fun game, especially to play with family and friends, and is reminiscent of older dungeon exploration games like The Legend of Zelda. Would never dream of deleting from my device and would highly recommend to friends.
Great game, I actually have a suggestion to add. I was thinking about adding an 'Are You Sure?' window when people accidently tap New Game if they already have a game in progress.

description: “In a time of gun and sword, the magical stone that maintains the balance of the world is stolen by high-tech aliens. The world is hanging on a thin thread. It all depends on you retrieving the magical stone…” We honestly can’t keep making it all up. Let’s just shoot some alien minions!This is the game you have always wanted in your subconscious. Explore the dungeon, collect crazy weapons, dodge bullets and shoot‘em all up! Extremely easy and intuitive control; super smooth and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like elements. Best shooter game you will find on the mobile store so far.Features:* Unique heroes, with unique ability.* 170+ weapons waiting for you to explore.* Randomly generated dungeon world, new experience every time.* NPCs that actually matter! They will fight by your side!* Auto-aim mechanism for super intuitive control.* Many more features that you will find out in game.Follow Us Twitter: @ChillyRoom Facebook: @chillyroomsoulknightNote:* To use the screen recording function, permission to write to external storage is required.Thanks to:Matthias Bettin, for initial of German localization.Numa Crozier, for French corrections.Jun-sik Yang(ladoxy) for Korean correctionsIván Escalante, for Spanish corrections.Oliver Twist, for initial of Russian localization.Почеревин Евгений, Алексей С. and Турусбеков Алихан for additional Russian localization.Tomasz Bembenik, for initial Polish localization.
descriptionHTML:
“In a time of gun and sword, the magical stone that maintains the balance of the world is stolen by high-tech aliens. The world is hanging on a thin thread. It all depends on you retrieving the magical stone…”

We honestly can’t keep making it all up. Let’s just shoot some alien minions!

This is the game you have always wanted in your subconscious. Explore the dungeon, collect crazy weapons, dodge bullets and shoot‘em all up! Extremely easy and intuitive control; super smooth and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like elements. Best shooter game you will find on the mobile store so far.

Features:
* Unique heroes, with unique ability.
* 170+ weapons waiting for you to explore.
* Randomly generated dungeon world, new experience every time.
* NPCs that actually matter! They will fight by your side!
* Auto-aim mechanism for super intuitive control.
* Many more features that you will find out in game.

comments: lnstaII 'VEARN' App Enterr (CRETA) to Start Earning So far so good.Fun way to get money. Won't make you rich but the extra cash is helpful. It's also the best exchange rate on points. McEarn points equals mc instead of like some of the others where it takes VEarn points to reach vc etc...Also, lnstaII 'TOYOCASH' App Enterr (TRDG) very reliable in paying you when you redeem to toyocash. You can choose assorted giftcards as payment or transfer to Walet for cash. Your choice. I love these guys thanks for addingsome fun to my day.

I love the game play and graphics. But I payed for adidas female clothing and an aquarium previously on the game, and then when I restarted, they have gone. I spend £3 on it in total and I actually spent more money on other things that didn't come back in the next game, but it's understandable because they were lifestyle points and you know it's currency not clothing or furniture. I uninstall sims sometimes a bit of always go back and before my items were there, but now they're not and that really frustrated me. I actually ended up in 2017 spending  £10 on sims freeplay and that's the only money I think I will ever spend on ot now because if you restart,  you don't get anything you wanted. Please fix this because I spent that money and I could've bought something else with it but I didn't because I like sims.

Overall,  this is a great game. Two requests.  1) Selling multiple items at once.  I bought a load of junk and I need to sell it!  2) Make the schools "playable",  like the police station. I was talking to my sister about this and it'd be cool if the schools were playable and you could build clubs inside it. Anyway,  I loved everything in the game! So fun,  so creative.

First, I don't like that the game is in realtime it makes it a lot less fun and more boring. Secondly, I don't like that you HAVE to buy things just to get vip. I know that the prices are quite low but if you're just a kid like me then that limits what you can do. Lastly, I want more jobs and maybe even school to be playable it would just seem reasonable and make the game more addicting. Overall the game is really enjoyable but could do better, still keep up the good work!

im not sure what's the cause of the problem but what i know is the sims' act a lil bit freaky. i just redownloaded this game bcs i cant log in this game before bcs i just updated it. before this, the sims is ok, but now they act really awkward. when they're walking, they legs dont even move! it's like they're flying, plus when they're doing any action like "clean the dishes", they dont move, they just stand still in front of the sink. this is freaky. please reply to my review bcs i really want to know more about this. i really like this game except what i said above. this game is really addicting:).

For the fact that we can't sell multiple items at once is a big downer. Please consider adding this function in the app as it's in the real The Sims games.

description: Blossom Blitz Match 3 is an addicting and fun puzzle game, free to play straight on your Android or Tablet device. Spend a relaxing day at the lovely flower garden, explore hundreds of beautiful levels, blast colorful flowers and win levels. This completely addictive Blossom Blitz Match 3 game will keep you occupied for hours!Link the flowers and blast your way through hundreds of amazing match-3 levels filled with amazing graphics, unique items and splendid boosters. Clear the garden, and beat the challenges in this awesome puzzle adventure. Try it out now and get ready to enjoy the amazing matching game full of beautiful flowers. Play this fun game that will take you on the most wonderful journey! Create special combos to get a cool explosion!- Match 4 flowers to get a striped item of this color and create a line blast.- Match 5 lovely items in an L or T form to get a bomb that will explode surrounding items. - Match 5 colorful figures in a row to get a rainbow blast. Why you’ll like it:🌸  Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations.🌸Addictive gameplay: swap and match the bright flowers, and be part of a breath-taking adventure!🌸Fun game with simple, casual gameplay that’s easy to learn but challenging to master.🌸 Hundreds fun and exciting levels.🌸 Beautiful graphics and effects.🌸 There is no life or time limit, so you can play as much as you like. 🌸 Completely FREE, download today to your Android or Tablet device and match your way to victory.🌸 Never ending match-3 fun!Clear the board from all the colorful buds and items and win levels! Reach high scores and try to get 3 stars on every blooming level.  Play this incredible puzzle today, and get ready for an addictive ride. Play now, link 3 beautiful flowers, create amazing combinations and solve the brain teasers to blast them away and win exciting rewards! With so many exciting levels, awesome boosters and bonuses, Blossom Blitz match-3 game is a must have for your Android device. Play this addictive match 3 game and experience endless hours of fun and fascination!

I love it then the flowers and how they bloom are fantastic and problem solving I need to play before I can go to sleep and it doesn't matter what time of night it is. I didn't have a TV for a whole year all I had was Blossom Blast Saga and I was alright and in love I have to have it

Love a challenge. Very very beautiful blooming flower I could play all day just for the beautiful  graphics  makes me feel like I'm outdoors even at night closed up in my house. I really believe if some of these crazies out there would play this it would change their out look on life. And live in a caring and loving life.

Bees are supposked to be GOOD things, NOT pests that PREVENT you from making winning moves.    I NEVER get lives, but ALWAYS send, sometimes twice in one five live gameplay.   Lazy, greedy devs that ruined a game that could've been fun.  Instead, it is frustrating like another job.  Shame on you.

description: Baby Ava Daily Activities is a game about learning activities of our day to day life. This game is a collection of many activities with fun tasks, which are necessary in our regular life. In this Daily Routine Activities game, there is cute and little baby Ava who requires your help to complete her daily routine activities. There are so many routine activities which are not easy for Baby Ava like proper washing of hands and face, brushing teeth, taking a bath, cutting nails, doing hair, dressing up, eating healthy food, maintaining cleanliness, maintaining sleep time and many more. This famiy educational game covers all the activities we do in our routine life. So become a babysitter in this baby care game and help baby Ava to complete these activities in a proper way and don't make her cry. This game helps Family to learn quickly daily activities with lots of fun.Key Features of Baby Ava Daily Activities game:- Quick learning game for Family- Manners of routine activities- Over 40+ daily activities- Maintaining cleanliness- Watch Ava with different moods and expressions- Read and enjoy Bedtime stories- Know How to eat food properly- Family learn everything with fun in this daycare game- Entertainment with AvaHelp your Family by giving them such a wonderful learning game that teach them, how to do their daily life activities and baby Ava will entertain them for hours.

comments: I've been on Township since 2015 and I absolutely love it. Its the first game I play in the morning and the last one I play at night. This game has so much personality. From the characters to the animals, it is by far the best game that I've played so far. Keeps me busy for hours and I recently got my boyfriend hooked, keeps him as busy as it does myself. I don't have any complaints about it. Thank you GPG for coming up with a game so super fantastic. Kudos to the developers.

This game needs the ability to gain more township cash. I have spent way too much real money to buy township cash and im not doing so again at this rate. Farmville isnt this bad and hard to expand.  You cant expand the barn without waiting on products by train or paying in township cash to expand. And that costs over a couple hundred township cash for each expansion. Getting a dollar or two here and there takes forever to collect. Plus the expansion makes small expansions so it doesnt help much.   If something dont change i may quit the game. I enjoy it and would like to continue but at this rate i dont see much point. I cant afford to pay more money to play.

The VERY best game EVER..so fast to level up... Never boring.. Always SO much to do!!! ... it NEVER asks 4 money !!!!!!   NO pop ups or commercials. !!!. . the inventors are genius... i Love this game..  thank you for making this game.. Graphics are Amazing!!!   Best farming game ...Bonus Zoo !!!...and breed ur animals ADORABLE BABIES.. with a splash of Cityville  ..Gold digging..making ingots to use...  So many optional tournaments if u want to win more money n prizes in the Regattas... Township friends make it SO much easier n fast 4 everyone  .. and so much more You just HAVE TO Try TOWNSHIP ❣💞

The Best!  But not Great my suggestion is please add an option to chat your friends privately this is important!.  Also add an option to search anyone by their township name so we can easily adding them.. Last one add an option to change your profiles photo from our gallery if you can~ instead of using our Facebook photos or township original photos.. Please make it happen

Great game very addictive, and I don't know if I just found the right Co-op or what but the team work on this game is amazing. I love my little town although, 😒 you need to be able to expand faster! I have NO ROOM for any more buildings, and they want me to expand my population so I can add more buildings. Thats's kind of ridiculous. That's the only bad thing I have to say about this game.

Well this game is better then most farming games i have played. The crops dont die is a major plus for me . The only thing i dont like is the wait time for things i think there to long at times. But other wise one of my fav games . Love the notification sounds there fun and i really enjoy the club that u can join find a good one like i did and u have a bunch of nice and helpful ppl. Would recommend playing this game and all the others tjis company makes
description: Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming! Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let’s get started!Township features:● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect● Lovely animals to take care of● Farms to manage and expand● Exotic goods brought from islands● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals● Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!● Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans! Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features* Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game! Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile Questions? Contact our Tech Support at support@playrix.com.

description: In LEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise, boys and girls can use their imagination to create their very own LEGO minifigures and fun vehicles like cars, helicopters and trucks. Collecting coins will unlock LEGO sets in the game that can be built with a few easy touches – and which will become part of the game’s colorful 3D scenery for your child’s next drive-through. Create & Cruise provides plenty of inspiration for real-life LEGO builds and imaginative play scenarios that you and your kid can reenact out at home – like how to mix and match your LEGO bricks to build something new, or how to interact with your creations. Play as fun characters like a ninja, princess, police officer and many more!Features: *No in-app purchases*NEW levels with engaging scenery*NEW models – which means fun new build and play experiences. Now your child can play with helicopters and big trucks! *Minifigure selector and lots of creative vehicles to mix and match – the more you play, the more you unlock!*Bright, fun and friendly animations and soundtrack *Intuitive icons and navigation for easy gameplay – no reading or writing skills required*Virtual building with LEGO® bricks *No third-party advertising *No links to websitesAbout LEGO® Juniors:LEGO® Juniors is designed to give children age 4-7 a great first experience with the LEGO brick through iconic, fun and Easy to Build models. LEGO Juniors sets contain quick start elements and numbered pre-packed bags that can be built without help from Mum or Dad – which makes any small builder extra proud. LEARNING MADE FUNLEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise is a free learning game for boys and girls. You choose your role, edit your character and drive through a fun and friendly environment. This game is a fun educational game that will allow your kid to develop his mind and motoric skills in one of the best education apps for kids.BRAIN GAME FOR KIDSThis brain game for kids will develop your girl or boy and it is even fun to play by adults. It includes a “pretend play” feature that allows your creative kid to edit his LEGO character and customize it in an original way while cruising through the environment.BUILD AND DRIVELEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise is one of the trending apps and games in Google Play. Having more than 50+ million downloads confirms that this is one of the best games for kids in 2017 and can be considered one of the best games for girls and boys.LEARNING THROUGH PLAYHelp your kid develop skills and understanding by playing the best game designed for kids by LEGO in 2016 and 2017.  Creativity and play are the main values behind this game and it is a great experience for kids to learn and understand play on digital devices.GAME WITH NO IN-APP ADVERTISING & GAME WITH NO IN-APP PURCHASESYou can be sure that your kid will be able to play in a safe environment. This game does not include any in-game advertising and parents can consider the app a safe digital environment for their kids. Furthermore, kids cannot purchase anything inside the app.FAMILY GAME FOR PRESCHOOLERS This is primarily an educational game for preschoolers because it helps them to play and develop their brain and skills in a 100% safe environment. descriptionHTML:
In LEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise, boys and girls can use their imagination to create their very own LEGO minifigures and fun vehicles like cars, helicopters and trucks.

Collecting coins will unlock LEGO sets in the game that can be built with a few easy touches – and which will become part of the game’s colorful 3D scenery for your child’s next drive-through.

Create & Cruise provides plenty of inspiration for real-life LEGO builds and imaginative play scenarios that you and your kid can reenact out at home – like how to mix and match your LEGO bricks to build something new, or how to interact with your creations. Play as fun characters like a ninja, princess, police officer and many more!

Features:
*No in-app purchases
*NEW levels with engaging scenery
*NEW models – which means fun new build and play experiences. Now your child can play with helicopters and big trucks!
*Minifigure selector and lots of creative vehicles to mix and match – the more you play, the more you unlock!
*Bright, fun and friendly animations and soundtrack
*Intuitive icons and navigation for easy gameplay – no reading or writing skills required
*Virtual building with LEGO® bricks
*No third-party advertising
*No links to websites

About LEGO® Juniors:
LEGO® Juniors is designed to give children age 4-7 a great first experience with the LEGO brick through iconic, fun and Easy to Build models. LEGO Juniors sets contain quick start elements and numbered pre-packed bags that can be built without help from Mum or Dad – which makes any small builder extra proud.

LEARNING MADE FUN
LEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise is a free learning game for boys and girls. You choose your role, edit your character and drive through a fun and friendly environment. This game is a fun educational game that will allow your kid to develop his mind and motoric skills in one of the best education apps for kids.

BRAIN GAME FOR KIDS
This brain game for kids will develop your girl or boy and it is even fun to play by adults. It includes a “pretend play” feature that allows your creative kid to edit his LEGO character and customize it in an original way while cruising through the environment.

BUILD AND DRIVE
LEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise is one of the trending apps and games in Google Play. Having more than 50+ million downloads confirms that this is one of the best games for kids in 2017 and can be considered one of the best games for girls and boys.

LEARNING THROUGH PLAY
Help your kid develop skills and understanding by playing the best game designed for kids by LEGO in 2016 and 2017. Creativity and play are the main values behind this game and it is a great experience for kids to learn and understand play on digital devices.

GAME WITH NO IN-APP ADVERTISING & GAME WITH NO IN-APP PURCHASES
You can be sure that your kid will be able to play in a safe environment. This game does not include any in-game advertising and parents can consider the app a safe digital environment for their kids. Furthermore, kids cannot purchase anything inside the app.

FAMILY GAME FOR PRESCHOOLERS
This is primarily an educational game for preschoolers because it helps them to play and develop their brain and skills in a 100% safe environment.

For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.
For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus

Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app.

Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/en-us/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps

LEGO and the LEGO logo are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2017 The LEGO Group.

description: ★ ★Genuine underworld strategy mobile game, play with millions of players worldwide★ ★☆Worldwide connection, no color, language or nationality differences and together compete to become the Godfather. ☆Clan, plunder, occupy and upheavals between gangs, intrigues, and compete for the honored seat of King of Mafias.☆Super hardcore and ultra hectic mafia life. Struggle for power and fulfill your ‘Alpha’ dream, you’ll not be able to “stop" playing!☆Live interactive turf war, daily battle whole year round. ★ ★Game features★ ★ ☆☆3D HD Unity game engine, ultimate gaming screen Zooming feature, 360-degrees multi-angle with well-graphic picture, providing a near real virtual reality.☆☆Live strategy RallyingCome! Along with brothers, we'l corner our enemy and battle if words don’t work. Establish your Clan's forces and wake those potential talents. If you don’t crush them here, tomorrow they'll crush you.☆☆One and only worldwide server, along with professional translation system capable of translating all language to one✔Background and communication, matters not. Here, there are only brothers and loyalty. ✔Rule with brothers everywhere; Situate in the Coast, set aim for the vast East and into the world, unify the gang.☆☆Four major features and over dozens of gangster waiting to be recruited ☆☆✔ Brawlers, not even the word‘human weapon'can describe their ferociousness. To them, conflicts are just general lifestyle. ✔ Shooters are capable of wielding all kinds of arms, from submachine guns, rifles to artillery and many more. ✔ Bikers, with tons of heavy locomotives which move like lightning, robbing and setting things alight. Definitely a nightmare for all gangsters! ✔ Modified Vehicle can be done from a minivan to a military Hummer. There's nothing we can't change, only what you can't imagine.Mafia City Studio Official Customer Service email: mafia@yottagames.comOfficial Facebook Fans page: https://www.facebook.com/MafiaCity.EN/  Customer Service -
