description: Epic 2017 Mobile Masterpiece - 3D MMORPG Mobile Game, Honor Against Darkness!Leap through time and jump into a mysterious fantasy world! All sorts of real-time PvP battles and action are found in Honor Against Darkness. No matter if you wish to fight alone or team up with your allies, you’ll enjoy some of the most intense and challenging battles around!【GAME FEATURES】Brilliant 3D graphics and special effectsBuilt on Unity 3D, Honor Against Darkness displays some of the latest and graphics on mobile. You’ll be pleasantly surprised by the beauty of the various characters, pets, mounts and maps available.Real-time PvP battles at all and any timesPvP is open game on all maps. Choose 1 vs. 1, team vs. team, or guild vs guild. Fight for honor and team up with friends and guild mates to challenge the top players on the server. If you’ve got enough willpower, anything is possible in this world. Trade freely and buy or sell your equipmentFeaturing an auction house, Honor Against Darkness allows you to auction off your loot – and for Diamonds! You’ll be able to sell unused or extra gear from monster drops or quest rewards for much needed in-game currency.Level up with no limitationsWith an offline auto-battle system, you’re able to level up even while you’re busy or offline! You’ll never be left behind, so rise up the ranks and become the top Honor Against Darkness warrior!【COMMUNITY】Visit our official Facebook page and forum for the latest news and announcements: )Official Facebook -- https://www.facebook.com/HonorAgainstDarkness/Official Website -- http://had.rastargames.com
descriptionHTML:
Epic 2017 Mobile Masterpiece - 3D MMORPG Mobile Game, Honor Against Darkness!

Leap through time and jump into a mysterious fantasy world! All sorts of real-time PvP battles and action are found in Honor Against Darkness. No matter if you wish to fight alone or team up with your allies, you’ll enjoy some of the most intense and challenging battles around!

【GAME FEATURES】
Brilliant 3D graphics and special effects
Built on Unity 3D, Honor Against Darkness displays some of the latest and graphics on mobile. You’ll be pleasantly surprised by the beauty of the various characters, pets, mounts and maps available.
Real-time PvP battles at all and any times
PvP is open game on all maps. Choose 1 vs. 1, team vs. team, or guild vs guild. Fight for honor and team up with friends and guild mates to challenge the top players on the server. If you’ve got enough willpower, anything is possible in this world.
Trade freely and buy or sell your equipment
Featuring an auction house, Honor Against Darkness allows you to auction off your loot – and for Diamonds! You’ll be able to sell unused or extra gear from monster drops or quest rewards for much needed in-game currency.
Level up with no limitations
With an offline auto-battle system, you’re able to level up even while you’re busy or offline! You’ll never be left behind, so rise up the ranks and become the top Honor Against Darkness warrior!

【COMMUNITY】
Visit our official Facebook page and forum for the latest news and announcements: )
Official Facebook -- https://www.facebook.com/HonorAgainstDarkness/
Official Website -- http://had.rastargames.com

comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

Excellent game!!  Very addicting!  Can't put it down!!  :)  Only reason I am downgrading it to 3 stars is because of the horrible unfairness of what levels can attack other levels.  Like being a level 8 and being attacked by a level 28.  Needs to be fixed fast!!  One player will comme in and wipe out all of an Alliance that is much lower in power and defenseless.

One of the most unattractive games I've ever come across. Good idea to fill up the playing screen with so many icons, yeah that's not going to be a irritation for me when I'm trying to click on something. "Build an empire" they say. Well, with such bad graphics. I don't think I'll even bother building one. Horrible. That's the word for it.

The game has a lot of fun and addictive features. Its major drawback is that it's geared towards people who can spend $1000s  Don't get me wrong, it is still a great game, but if you don't plan to spend on a major scale, you will be disappointed

the customer support is the worst I've ever encountered. after a full month mailing back and forth I feel like I'm talking with idiot's. they don't care about there customers only taking your money. do not download, there are many different games out there who know how to look after there loyal players. don't waste your time or money. if your not Chinese they don't care

I enjoy the game a lot. It is pay to win in every sense of the word though. My problem is customer service is the worst. Takes 5 or 6 days to respond to help requests if they do at all. Good game, worst customer service possible.
description: Do you play war games? Enjoy free online games? Then prepare yourself! The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! King Arthur’s death has left an empty throne. Raise your dragon and build your army in the quest to lift Excalibur and become the next King of Avalon. In this dragon war, your mighty dragon is the key to ruling your kingdom. Stay alive by forging alliances with your friends and build an empire together. This is a game of kings entangled in a game of war. Who will be victorious in this clash of kings? FEATURES :War! Everywhere. You and your allies need to be prepared for a clash of clans. Build up your bases and bulk up your armies - you're not the only ones with eyes on the throne! Alliances! No man is an island. Whether you’re rallying against a GvE Barbarian leader or marching at a PvP bully, you’ll need allies you can trust. Dragons! A legendary weapon of mass destruction. How will you train yours? Chat! Easy-translation feature brings thousands of players from around the world together in realtime. Strategy! Get the edge through research and master devastating skills. Know when to be invisible and when to order an invasion! Building! Build the foundations of an Empire strong enough to survive in a dragon fire warzone! Epic Fantasy! The Camelot Legend lives. Awesome monsters and HD graphics to drool over. Now play the King of online games, King of Avalon!SUPPORTAre you having problems? https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/king-of-avalon/Privacy Policy: http://www.funplus.com/privacy_policy/Facebook fanpage:https://www.facebook.com/koadwPLEASE NOTE: King of Avalon is completely free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please select password protection for purchases in your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required. Do you have what it takes to become King?

description: Run, Sausage, run!Hot diggity dog, that’s a fine lookin’ hot dog! You never sausage a sausage! (Get it? Saw such… sausage? Anyone?)Stop punning and start running! This adventure run is a hot dog’s dream - or nightmare - depending on how well you do.Play as the tasty sausage of your choice. Weisswurst or blutwurst, bacon or chocolate… even plumber or cowboy!Run for your life through an endless path as you flex that hot-dog body and avoid getting sliced, chopped, burned or smashed in this adventure run game! Tons of juicy sausages to choose from, tons of hot dog skins to enjoy in this adventure run. Collect coins as you run for your sweet (or spicy) life to buy buns of steel and other cool powerups in this adventure run game.ABOUT USCrazy Labs is a casual games brand, under which TabTale develops and publishes fun and addictive games. Crazy Labs partners with independent development studios across the globe to create engaging mobile content for audiences of all ages. descriptionHTML:
Run, Sausage, run!
Hot diggity dog, that’s a fine lookin’ hot dog!
You never sausage a sausage! (Get it? Saw such… sausage? Anyone?)

Stop punning and start running! This adventure run is a hot dog’s dream - or nightmare - depending on how well you do.

Play as the tasty sausage of your choice. Weisswurst or blutwurst, bacon or chocolate… even plumber or cowboy!

Run for your life through an endless path as you flex that hot-dog body and avoid getting sliced, chopped, burned or smashed in this adventure run game!

Tons of juicy sausages to choose from, tons of hot dog skins to enjoy in this adventure run.

Collect coins as you run for your sweet (or spicy) life to buy buns of steel and other cool powerups in this adventure run game.

descriptionHTML:
The most cute bear of the history is coming! This is an epic game, exciting levels continuously. What is more, this bubble shooting game for free!
How to Play:
- Aim and match bubbles where you want to shoot the bubble.
- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
- Clear all the bubbles on the screen to get to a new level.
- More than seven kinds of cute bear is waiting for you to unlock,you can invite five friends to unlock the special role.
- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get.
- At the end of game,you will be awarded coins according to the score. the higher score you got, the more coin will be awarded.
- At the end of game,you can click the falling bubbles to get higher score
Features:
+ easy operation but lots of fun.
+ Gorgeous special effects and beautiful images.
+ Different roles dress
+ Many interesting props to help you pass game quickly
+ A combination of multiple bubbles
+ No wifi can also play
if you like bubble shooting game,It is worth to try. Let's play it!
summary: Classic and funny bubble shooting game. all free.

description: Prepare for epic versus-fighting action with your favorite Marvel Super Heroes & Super Villains in the ultimate cosmic showdown! Spider-Man, Iron Man, Wolverine & more await your summons to battle! Assemble a team & begin your quest to become the Ultimate Marvel Champion!WELCOME TO THE CONTEST:Captain America vs. Iron Man! Hulk vs. Wolverine! Spider-Man vs. Deadpool! The greatest battles in Marvel history are in your hands! The greedy Elder of the Universe known as The Collector has summoned you to a brawl of epic proportions against a line-up of vile villains including Thanos, Kang the Conqueror, and many more! Experience the ultimate free-to-play fighting game on your mobile device…Marvel Contest of Champions! SUIT UP WITH FRIENDS:• Team up with your friends and other Summoners to build the strongest Alliance• Strategize with your alliance, help them keep their Champions in the fight• Battle to the top in Alliance Events and take on Alliance Quest Series together in specially designed quest maps to earn exclusive Alliance rewards• Test your Alliance’s mettle by battling it out with Alliances from around the world in Alliance Wars! BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM OF CHAMPIONS:• Assemble a mighty team of heroes and villains (choosing Champions such as: Iron Man, Hulk, Wolverine, Storm, Star-Lord, Gamora, Spider-Man, Deadpool, Magneto and Winter Soldier)• Embark on quests to defeat Kang and Thanos and face the challenge of a mysterious new super powerful cosmic competitor, ultimately to prevent the total destruction of The Marvel Universe• Improve your team’s offense and defense with multiple Mastery trees COLLECT THE MIGHTIEST SUPER HEROES (AND VILLAINS!):• Collect, level up, and manage your teams of heroes and villains wisely to receive synergy bonuses based upon team affiliation and relationships taken from the pages of Marvel Comics• Pairing up Black Panther and Storm or Cyclops and Wolverine for bonuses, or making a team of Guardians of the Galaxy for a team affiliation bonus• The more powerful the Champion, the better their stats, abilities and special moves will be• New Champions are being added to The Contest all the time! QUEST AND BATTLE:• Journey through an exciting storyline in classic Marvel storytelling fashion• Fight it out with a huge array of heroes and villains in iconic locations spanning the Marvel Universe such as: Avengers Tower, Oscorp, The Kyln, Wakanda, The Savage Land, Asgard, the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier, and more!• Explore dynamic quest maps and engage in a healthy dose of action-packed fighting utilizing controls developed specifically for the mobile platform Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MarvelContestofChampionsSubscribe on YouTube: www.youtube.com/MarvelChampionsFollow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/MarvelChampionsFollow us on Instagram: www.instagram.com/marvelchampionswww.playcontestofchampions.com

comments: What a good little game. Nothing special in the graphics department but it delivers on everything it says and shows. After playing for a little while I couldn't help but feel like I was waiting for a little bald guy to want to eat me if I got an answer wrong, "cans we eats it precious". Jokes and riddles. Very good game. Well done.

Game is really good specially for kids . Makes them think. Only bad part of this game is the list in answers.. they are already displayed. This makes the game very easy. It would make an awesome game if user had to enter the answers.. hope the developers fix this!

Way TOO MANY adds. It's more a front end for advertising & the questions are way to simple to the point of being inane. Mildly entertaining if you like to feel smart but only a diversion for a matter of minutes. Personally I much rather apps where for a payment you can remove the adds but this isn't one!

I found "500 Riddles" to be somewhat misleading.  After the first few levels the riddles started to repeat. (Either the exact same riddle or the same riddle worded differently) Also grammar and punctuation errors in the riddles started to get annoying. But overall I did enjoy the program.

The game could use a few fixes. Sometimes when you touch a level it is unresponsive. The stage count is weird. When you completed all stages of a level it says 9/10. Please fix this the overall game isn't bad but these are very easy no brainer fixes.

It's fun.... But way too many adds. Still love playing it....but it's just annoying... Ok so to add to this: im on level 19 now and a LOT of the riddles are repetitive...again, still a good game and good time waster but I'd prefer new and harder riddles as the levels go up ... Just some advice to the maker of this game!

And what are the power pellets  for 🤔??oh  no I can see Amy's under wear  and when shadow and Amy fall's  from the bonus  stuff or a boss when they land they run like sonic for two seconds and Amy run bad

What really drew me into this game was the the Pac-Man promotion, I love a good crossover and I can say with total certainty that I wouldn't be playing it if I couldn't play as Pac-Man, he's such a good inclusion. It's a super addictive game, setting it aside to do something else is quite difficult, hours go be seamlessly when playing it. The graphics as well are beautiful, very vibrant and colourful.   I have a few minor gripes with the game though, it crashed on me and when I restarted the game I had briefly lost all my content, that gave me a minor scare. The game is heavily geared towards microtransactions as well, unless you're prepared to pay money, get ready for a very, very long grind trying to get the stuff you want. Having said all that I absolutely love the game, very glad I downloaded it.

The game is really solid, serving as a great precursor to Speed Battle in terms of basic gameplay. The missions and occasional events really give the game some gameplay value and the music is a really nice tune, but it will get old not too long after you start playing. I think it's a shame that the characters have no differences; it's purely aesthetic. Different abilities for the characters would have rocked, and Speed Battle improved this slightly, but not much. It's definitely worth a play or two, but don't stick around too much, you're not missing much.

Literally nothing works since the latest update!  If you're lucky, it'll actually boot up, but even then, only half the buttons work, and not the essential ones, such as PLAY!  I had to delete the game and reinstall to get it to even semi work in the first place, so of course, I lost all of my progress due to it not syncing properly with Google Play, all the characters were unlocked via hundreds of Tokens that I'd collected, I'd maxed out many of the characters, and had over 220 Red Star Rings.  Shambles.
It was good. Mostly positive things to say. I wish I could go from one round to the next faster, though, without all of that extra stuff. Also, way too many ads.
description: Play as Sonic the Hedgehog as you dash, jump and spin your way across stunning 3D environments. Swipe your way over and under challenging obstacles in this fast and frenzied endless running game.SONIC…The world famous Sonic the Hedgehog stars in his first endless running game – how far can you go?…DASH!Unleash Sonic’s incredible dash move that allows you to run at insane speed and destroy everything in your path!AMAZING ABILITIESUtilise Sonic’s powers to dodge hazards, jump over barriers and speed around loop de loops. Plus defeat enemies using Sonic’s devastating homing attack!STUNNING GRAPHICSSonic’s beautifully detailed world comes to life on mobile and tablet – never has an endless runner looked so good!MULTIPLE CHARACTERSChoose to play as one of Sonic’s friends, including Tails, Shadow and Knuckles.EPIC BOSS BATTLESFace off against two of Sonic's biggest rivals, the always scheming and cunning Dr. Eggman and the devastatingly deadly Zazz from Sonic Lost World! Use all of Sonic's agility and speed to take down these villains before it's too late!POWERUPSUnlock, win or buy ingenious power-ups to help you run further. descriptionHTML:
Play as Sonic the Hedgehog as you dash, jump and spin your way across stunning 3D environments. Swipe your way over and under challenging obstacles in this fast and frenzied endless running game.

SONIC…
The world famous Sonic the Hedgehog stars in his first endless running game – how far can you go?

…DASH!
Unleash Sonic’s incredible dash move that allows you to run at insane speed and destroy everything in your path!

AMAZING ABILITIES
Utilise Sonic’s powers to dodge hazards, jump over barriers and speed around loop de loops. Plus defeat enemies using Sonic’s devastating homing attack!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
Sonic’s beautifully detailed world comes to life on mobile and tablet – never has an endless runner looked so good!

MULTIPLE CHARACTERS
Choose to play as one of Sonic’s friends, including Tails, Shadow and Knuckles.

EPIC BOSS BATTLES
Face off against two of Sonic's biggest rivals, the always scheming and cunning Dr. Eggman and the devastatingly deadly Zazz from Sonic Lost World! Use all of Sonic's agility and speed to take down these villains before it's too late!

POWERUPS
Unlock, win or buy ingenious power-ups to help you run further. Including head starts, shields, ring magnets and unique score boosters!

KEEP ON RUNNING
Get more rewards the more you play! Level up your score multiplier by completing unique missions, or win amazing prizes including Red Star Rings & additional characters by completing Daily Challenges and playing the Daily Spin.

SOCIALLY CONNECTED
Challenge your friends on the leader boards or invite your friends through Facebook to prove who the best speed runner is…

- - - - -

title: Sonic Dash

comments: Just way too many ads. Eventually you start having to watch an ad after every second other level. Its a free game, so I get it but the levels are so quick sometimes I'm watching more than I am playing. Fun game, though. Easy controls and great graphics and sound.

This game is outstanding. Love the graphics, simple to understand. Some appear quite easy and then you suddenly get a level that looks like it should be but has you scratching your head for AGES!!! Love it. I can live with the adverts, just wish i could put the phone down.

Good fun and very addictive. I see people moaning about the adds 😧 but what can you expect from a free game? You get an add pop up after about 5 puzzles and to be honest it is only for a few seconds....just close it if you don't want to see them.

Wonderful game, excellent graphics, its a free game, I solve 2 puzzles and a video ad plays I cant get over it, ad's are repeatedly played and I can't skip, but uninstalling cos too too much of ad's... after 2nd level game is very easy didn't find much interesting..

Agree with other comments. Great graphics, fun to play, but the ADS!!!!!!!! eventually destroy the fun. Very repetitive after a while and challenge levels seem quite mixed. Have decided to delete the game mainly because of the ad onslaught. Other games have a much better ad/play psychology approach.
Great time killer and keeps the brain ticking good fun. Ads are annoying but it's free and you can pay about £1.50 to get rid of them if your that bothered 🤔

comments: The car will control itself... If you hold left it will turn left for a period but will start to try and straighten up... To test is on lvl 1 first corner accelerate and turn left (any set of controls tried all) it will start turning right seems to be when the prospective changes. Looks like it would be good if it went where you tell it to. Might be due to latest patch so will try again if it get fixed

Awesome Game... no need to spend money to get best cards you can easily earn them... Can play offline too... There is a glitch though in season 7 - save 8 second stage... even after finishing it wont give 3 stars and fails me.

I have a one plus 5T with 8 GB ram still the game hangs at the finish line and all my progress is lost. I have to restart the game to get it going. Please fix this I can sent you the screenshot is you want. I love your game and it would be great if these small thing is fixed swiftly !

Fix the detection when you touch/hit in perfect drift mode. There's been hundreds of times where ive definately not hit and yet it ends. So Infuriating, love the game but that one detail could definitely be optimized better. The drift should not end unless you actually hit and it screws up your direction. 4/5

The cars slide like they're on ice, but with no consistency at all, half of the cars are all wheel drive, which can't drift well, and there's even a nice little front wheel drive CRX, which wouldn't be able drift at all. Also the high-end cars are just the low end ones, wide bodied into smithereens, but the developers didn't bother to bring the wheels out to the fenders. If you want a decent drifting game just download CarX

Game is really good. Best drift game I've ever played on the phone. But there are small bugs in the game such as season 7 second perfect drift track (should be Turin) the race is not 3 laps. Even though I finish 3 laps it didn't finish the race and it gives the "wrong way" warning Everytime I pass from start/finish line. I hope you can fix this.

- Classic Drift Race.

comments: Awesome game! It is user friendly even on f2p players. May I just suggest one thing? I think it would be fun if you could get on and off your mount anywhere. Be it on the town or at the battle field. But so that it wont be used as a means of scape, it should have a casting time to ride the mount. Over all it is the best game there is. Love it to the moon and back! =)

This game is awesome actually but the developer keep opening new servers instead of merge the server. So many people choose to stop to play Seal because of this since less people play in most server. So please don't waste your money and time to play it. You cannot transfer your character to other servers. You need to start from begining. This make the overall experience becoming so bad.

Good game overal. But.. Admin.. Can u please explain to me.. How to use old account when i use other phone? Coz its keep make me new character. Cant use the main. I log in using samsung play. Or can i bind with other account? Pls help me. Coz i change use 2 phones.. And the other one always run off battery. Thanks

I love this game, it's so addicting. But I only gave it 4 stars because we have too many servers. I highly suggest to not add many servers and just fix the older ones because the players in older servers are getting fewer. Like, I'm in S105, and it's not been a week but there's already another server? And it's draining players. Please stop adding servers so some servers will have players too.

I really loved this game. Its content its gameplay indeed it is really my taste. However, i hope that we can transfer into other servers without restarting ones account. As well as the timing system of each events sometimes its not exact. Hope you guys work on it to make this GAME BETTER. Pleaseeeeeeeeee!!!!!!

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate 2018 Lunar New Year with Google Play
Enjoy double diamonds offer and exciting in-game holiday events available on 14 - 22 Feb 2018.

“Seal:New World” – The Rascal Rabbits are back! Classic 3D MMORPG returns!

Your favorite characters in a brand new adventure;
In this new world, you are our only hope!


● After 14 years, Seal Online From Korea is Back!
The classic returns!
Finally play Seal Online in multiplayer mode on your mobile – a whole new story with a brand new experience!


● 3 Classes Are Back: Knights, Priests and Jesters!
An improved world-view with more exciting levels to challenge.
Upgrade your character, choose skills, gear and train pets.
Alliance system, World Boss gameplays, Arena, Survival challenges, Magic Beanstalk, and more for you to explore!

● Hide the Cleavers! Rascal Rabbit is Back!
Train pets and take them with you – over 40 kinds, all cute yet deadly!
Ride your mount into battle; no need to tire your little legs anymore...

● Hundreds of Costumes; Dress to Impress
Wondering what to wear today? Change costumes according to your mood.
Loads of fashion and accessories to choose from. If you can imagine it, we’ve got it!

● Say Goodbye to Singledom – Let’s Get Married!
Tired of being single? Try out the in-game wedding system.
Earn intimacy points and propose to the object of your desire.
Hold a wedding banquet, choose your wedding dress and invite your friends to witness your special occasion!

● Fun Social Interaction
Chat with players in-game using text or voice messages.
The fairest trading system around; perfect for making new friends!

comments: Thank you for makes this game,  I hope next time u guys can imporve the game like a : 1. New Menu 2. New Decor 3. New event every month, for give us new decor or something like that.  And also dont forget if u guys make maintance, give us green money (cash) cuz' we want it.

It's a great game, I had fun playing it with friends. But there's much room for improvements in the game.   Sometimes there's a little glitch in the game where a guest is stuck, item name shown weirdly, etc. It'll also be great if the token and vouchers are easier to find, and maybe other ways of getting revenue.   I also feel like the cafes are located in Zimbabwe, where finding money is hard, but all the items are expensive, that would be great to fix too!  None the less it's an overall good game. Can't wait for the next update!

Doing the tournaments is a waste of time!   You don't earn any prizes and if you do it's one 1hr bottle at least that's what i got so useless! Why can't we cook food instead of stupid stuff that some of us don't have enough of like CL vouchers! This game has gotten boring! Think I'm going to uninstall.

Up until the last update, all was good. But with the most recent update I keep trying to open and it claims there's no internet connection. I have triple checked the settings and those all check. I've even uninstalled and reinstalled it. No luck. Shut my phone off and on again, still does nothing.

Thus far the only downside I have found is the fact that it is so dam expensive to expand. And the quests just never seem to end. Which yes in my opinion is annoying. Getting a quest every time you complete one makes it kinda hard to know what I am supposed to be doing. Hince the reason my diner is still so cramped. I was doing them in the order I got the quests and before I realized it I had no room and a bunch of stuff I can't place. I just sold 4 tables and chairs to have room. So if you could resolve these issues that'd be great

The game is good fun and relax to play. However, I give low rate because everytime our food is cook, its always lack the game. And also, 2 time happen to me that I spent alot of hour playing tournament and my club friend got the price but ai didnt get the price. So dissapointed.
description: Design your cafe world and join cooking with one of the best restaurant games! Write your own restaurant story in Cafeland today, Chef! Master your cooking and design your 5 star cafe to be the top chef in the world! Run your own restaurant and get carried away in a cooking fever! Home cooked meals and fresh coffee are waiting for the customers. Just say “I’ll decorate my cafe and I’ll also add a lovely garden!” and your cafe will thrive! FROM A SNACK BAR TO A WORLD FAMOUS CAFE!Decorate and design the place of your dreams in this cafe game! Cook tasty food to keep your customers happy - From the creators who brought you Cafeland, it’s a fun-tastic new cooking game! In Cafeland, you have dozens of different dishes; desserts, appetizers, fast food and many more which make this the perfect kitchen game! Not to mention that there are hundreds of shiny new items to decorate your place. Are you ready to be the owner of your cafe business? Then start your restaurant game in Cafeland because this place is for you, chef!BE THE CULINARY MASTER!* Serve dishes from different cuisines.* Cook on multiple stoves and serve a variety of meals.* Unlock new recipes and grow your menu.* Fill your counters with plates of yummy dishes to please your customers.* Choose from a variety of food categories.* Make the best burger in chef town.* Deliver quality seafood.* Spread the dough for a crispy pizza.* Bake a moist chocolate cake.* Prepare a zesty stew.* Bake, boil, fry or saute; every dish will come out as perfect!DESIGN YOUR DREAM CAFE!* Choose from hundreds of fancy decorations.* Build special items to boost your income.* Cover your walls and the floor with only one click!* Open up a deli.* Design a hip bistro.* Manage a seafood restaurant.* Own a fancy venue.* Entertain VIPs at a celebrity lounge.* Become the owner of luxury dining.* Take over the city!* Design and decorate a world famous cafe!ATTRACT CELEBRITIES AND WIN GIFTS!* Invite celebrities to your place from all around the world.* Prepare your cafe to host them.* Get good remarks and win mystery gifts!RULE THE CATERING BUSINESS!* Race against time to prepare catering orders.* Fill catering boxes with different categories of food.* Deliver gourmet meals for special customers.* Get help from your friends!* Earn money and great prizes for finishing catering orders!BE A 5 STAR CHEF!* Become the master of this cafe world!* Listen to your customers and find out about the good and the bad.* Keep the place clean.* Expand to have more room!* Increase your capacity.* Fill those vending machines!* Decorate to your heart's desire!* And make it fun for everyone!PLAY WITH FRIENDS AND BECOME A SOCIAL BUTTERFLY!* Visit your friends and help them out.* Send mystery gifts to each other.* Ask for help in your catering business.* Join the community and meet new chefs!TACKLE THE QUESTS OF THE KITCHEN!* Meet the Cafeland crew and let them guide you along the way.* Complete the tasks hand in hand with Eva!* Let Katie help you out with supervisor tasks.* Ask for Chris when there is an item to build.* Join Grandpa Tony in trying out his new recipes!Facing issues while playing Cafeland or have suggestions/feedback? We would love to hear from you!Use the Contact button in settings while you are in the game or e-mail us at: cafelandmobile@gamegos.com©2016 Gamegos - All Rights Reserved

descriptionHTML:
Get ready to join Swampy, Allie, and Cranky on their NEXT exciting adventure!

The sequel to the most addicting physics-based puzzler from Disney has finally arrived. Where’s My Water? 2 launches with three brand new locations including the Sewer, the Soap Factory, the Beach. Best of all, the puzzles are all free! Cut through dirt, and guide fresh water, purple water, and steam to help Swampy and his friends!

Key Features:
• Play 100+ levels and challenges with a brand new look in the Gator universe featuring Swampy, Allie, Cranky, and Mystery Duck!
• Introducing ‘Challenge Modes’ to replay the levels in explosive new ways!
• Dig as fast as you can and get as many duckies as possible in ‘Duck Rush’ levels!
• ‘Tri-ducking’ is now faster, better and more fun with boosts, such as Vacuum, Dropper, and Absorber! Small fees may be required for these additional boosts.
• Connect through Facebook and see if you can beat your pals on the adventure!
• Experience fun mechanics that are uniquely designed for each character!
• Complete achievements and earn special themed duckies such as gladiator-duckie, astronaut-duckie, hula-duckie, and many more!
• Stuck on a level? Use hints to help you solve the puzzles!

Where’s My Water? is a multiple Game of the Year award-winning puzzle game. The Where's My... franchise has received hundreds of millions of downloads to date. Check out Where’s My Mickey? and Where's My Perry? for more refreshing water-physics fun!

Visit Facebook.com/DisneyMobileGames for cool game tips, news and more!

comments: Its Cool but there is a lot of Flaws,  like the Gem system? 9.9  I can't update my special if I don't use Gem?   Upgrade system,  cost a lot and I earn little per completing stages so?  Gg!    More like play to win game!  Then every stage,  has 5sec adds..  I can't even have option to say NO?..  So 4 star coz it made me like it!  It has potential but it needs major changes tho~

Could of been 5 star. But Jesus the ads! You spend 40% of your time outside a match watching adverts! Didn't these people make Deep Town? and that's done very well... Also you hit a pay wall at the ice area where you have to pay to win. Unless you log on every day and collect the 1 gem, then you can upgrade in about 2 months...

The time for upgrades only increments when the game is running and the phone is unlocked. That is ridiculous.  Upgrades take too long and the gold to buy them is gained too slowly during game play.  If I go check my mail, talk on the phone, dock the phone for the night, etc, no time passes on the upgrades. If there is 6 hours left on the upgrade when I go to sleep, there is still 6 hours left when I go back and check the game in the morning.

Terrible game. Set up horribly. Plenty of room for more towers and easier gameplay. Little room for personal strategy which in turn guides you to purchase crystals with real money to beat the game... another garbage excuse tor a tower defense

Great game overall, I haven't spent a $ on it and beat the game in under 2 weeks all stages 3 stars but 3 challenges that I need to still upgrade my towers to get 3 stars.   The one downside I see to this game so far is not enough maps or stages to do. Once you have completed all stages you kinda have to replay the survival endless maps over and over again to get gold... just adding new stages would make this game a 5 stars for me.

As with others, it has its appeal but there's no getting away from its flawed gameplay, rather than heading toward victory, achievement, accomplishments, success, and all those positive responses of older TDG's; we're led toward spending to succeed. It utterly avoids the aspects that made TD so appealing to users. I found it impossible to feel good winning as a result which defeated its purpose to an extent.  Overall, two 🌟, for entertainment.

comments: An interesting game, it gives the planes a slightly paper feel when viewing them. However, the actual controls are smooth although they can be slightly twitchy at times. The addition of game modes recently was a welcome change to the game and has helped me through many hours of boredom. This game overall is very good and I advise you download it.

Sensitive and strange controls. You pay for no ads and they still offer you a free life if you watch an ad. If you do decide to watch the ad you don't even get the life. Zoom levels on the challenges are unreasonable.  Great concept for a game, terrible UX, and dishonest marketing.

description: Race, train and breed your way into becoming the number one horse racing manager! Rise through the ranks by winning derbies and cups to obtain the Ultimate Championship. Compete in contests against other jockeys online everyday with new and exciting events constantly galloping in. FEATURESRACE: • Ride your way to the top by competing in the local derby or circuit to win earnings and make your way toward the Ultimate Championship. • Races can be viewed in the intense and suspenseful manner just like a real-life derby or through quick results to get back to business. • Stunning 3D graphics and realistic photo finishes make Horse Racing Manager 2018 the best virtual horse racing simulation experience around! • Move through a realistic and immersive calendar of races. TRAIN: • Set regiments to prepare your horse for major upcoming matches. • Boost horse performance stats with food, rest and physical training. • Maintain and upgrade stats through a variety of training methods or breed horses to create the strongest and fiercest of bloodlines. • Exercise routines can vary in surface conditions, exertion levels and more. • Only the best of the best racing horse owners know how to keep their horses in peak form, well rested and at an optimal weight. • Need your horse to pack on a few pounds? Try treating it to a handful of sugar cubes! • Unlock additional stable slots to bolster an even more impressive roster of horse racing stars. CUSTOMIZE: • Choose a unique look for your jockey and horse with an assortment options. • Adjust the outfits, emblem and colors that suit your own personal taste.• Bond with every horse in your stable by giving them individual names. • Customize a nurturing environment for your horses to flourish!  BREED: • Buy, sell and breed horses to participate competitions and create a powerhouse stable full of speedy candidates. • Match two horses with favorable traits to inherit special attributes and stats. • Rare breeds can be unlocked with special genetic traits such as zebra stripes or super speed.• Be sure to breed carefully because unique skills can only be obtained through breeding and not trained.• Participate in a slew of events that can affect special Breeding Rights.• Stunning 3D visuals showcase an impressive variety of unique colors, patterns, and traits acquired through breeding.  Stop just watching the horse races and take part in the action. Saddle up cowboys, because the number one horse racing management sim is here! Can you be a world-class horse racing manager talked about from Kentucky to Epsom!? Become a horse racing legend now! * PLEASE NOTE! Horse Racing Manager 2018 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.Meet other players and find out more about Horse Racing Manager:* Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/horseracingmanager2018* Twitter: @HRM_2018 (http://twitter.com/HRM_2018)* Privacy Policy: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimePRIVACY* Terms of Service: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimeTOS

Thx btw Edit: but my only question is what for ticket needed for the game? Its just show 0 and never changing

THIS IS SO GOOD AND ADDICTING. But I hope more songs will be added, like atleast one song per week? Or even once every two weeks you have a new song 😭😭. And also I hope it don't just crash once in a while. But keep up the good updates! Fighting!

Absolutely beautiful! I don't know if this is possible but if you can, maybe add a chat room? It gets kinda boring when I'm all alone because Im the only one who plays this game in my group of friends. I would also like to chat to the people who I'm competing with and see what they think! It doesn't have to be like you can choose who. Maybe the same ppl you are in the league with. But overall a gorgeous game!

comments: Great Effort but can't give 5 star rating as the game only gives you very little time to check the spelling of many words. While it should have been like 15-20 seconds for checking each of the words spelling & then the next. 10 to 15 words can comprise each level and the words going to be harder as one goes up in the levels. This will be fun for sure. Other wise in current context folks will get disheartened sooner than expected and would cease to play it and that I suppose should be amended ASAP. Thank you.

You need to make up your mind if you are using British English or US English. Seems Americans don't realize the past tense of 'spell' is either 'spelt' or 'spelled' in the US you don't often see it spelled 'spelt' (LOL) although both SPELT AND SPELLED ARE CORRECT. You do this with other words with US & UK spelling differences.  You forget both are correct. It was British English a thousand years before it was American English. Americans have been BUTCHERING English for about 300 years now.
Hey @Daffy Duck! Maybe its you thats spelling things wrong. Spelt??? Shouldn't that be spelled?? Just saying....
This game is highly amusing and thoroughly addictive but more importantly a positive brain training exercise for individual or family use.  Impossible to become bored.. 👋
It's great for spelling. There are a lot of misspelled words though. And also, way too many ads.
At 23 words it gets hard to finish before the clock runs out. Challenging.
description: Test your spelling skills and challenge people from all around the world in our newest English spelling word game called Spelling Challenge! Are you good enough in spelling to be able to make it into TOP20 global highscores?Spelling Challenge is a new educational English spelling game that will check your spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game contains hundreds of misspelled English words, addicting and original gameplay, global leaderboards and a lot of other features that will improve your spelling skills in an original and enjoyable way! You will never fail in spelling test at school again! How to play: There will be shown a word on a screen and your task is to decide if the word is spelled correctly or not! You must answer correctly a number of words that equals to "TODO" number to be able to progress to the next level! Watch out, in each level you can make max 5 mistakes. Also watch out for level limit shown under the word. If you lose the level, you can play it again (max three times), then you must start over. Scoring: Your score depends on your speed and number of mistakes you make. There is also an overall score = total score from all games you ever played, so more times you play = better score you get!Features:* Educational and challenging English vocabulary spelling game not only for kids but for all ages* Thousands of most misspelled words included* Great way to improve your spelling skills, grammar and vocabulary knowledge* Global leaderboards included - submit your score and compare it with other people all around the world* Share your score with your friends via facebook, google+, WhatsApp, twitter and other social networks* Review your spelling progress and words in which you made mistakes* A must game for all the spelling bee game fans* Simple to play, no need to read instructions* 100% free full version + no In-App purchases* From a creator of 5+ popular spelling gamesHave fun and if you find any bug or if you have any idea to improve the game, please let us know! (If you enjoy the game, please leave a rating and some comment, it helps us a lot in adding new and mainly free features.)Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/Email: littlebigplay@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay

The game contains hundreds of misspelled English words, addicting and original gameplay, global leaderboards and a lot of other features that will improve your spelling skills in an original and enjoyable way! Also watch out for level limit shown under the word. If you lose the level, you can play it again (max three times), then you must start over.

comments: Awesome game. Good graphics, great sound and music, intricate leveling up system and character build, easy controls, variety in enemies, lots of replay value, lots of gear to find, and doesn't take much data space. Reminds me of a Diablo type game. The developer's really do deserve a lot of praise for creating such a quality game and not making it a p2w. This is an example of doing it right. I can tell that a lot of thought and care was put into it. Absolutely brilliant. I can't praise enough. A rare gem on the play store, and completely free. Just awesome. 6 out of 5 rating. Thank you so much for such a great game.:) Edit: Thanks for the update. You guys rock.

Greetings Making Fun,  Let me start off by saying that I absolutely love this game. It's entertaining, challenging and addictive. The storyline is engrossing and the graphics are spectacular as well. You can easily tell how addictive a game is by the amount of time you spend playing it at a stretch. Let me just say that I've been playing this game ever since I installed it. Whenever I sit down with my device, I start playing it and I keep on playing for at least two hours before I divert my attention to other matters. It's a really lovely and delightful game. Making Fun seems like the most suitable title of the developers because they've made something that is really a lot of fun. Well done. I highly recommend this game. DOWNLOAD IT TODAY.

Good looking game plays very smoothly. Fun to play and not too hard or too easy. Nice little details like the way your hero talks and has other party members. These things help make the single player game seem less lonely. I don't know if I am going to hit a pay wall or loose interest. The story is engaging enough. I just don't give out 5 star reviews.

The gameplay is the best ive seen for an android RPG Diablo type game. Slick graphics, awesome sound track and effects, no slowdown and you can play offline!! Absolutely love the game. Only down side is the worry of repetitivness of the game but i guess only time will tell

Incredible game. Very intuitive and unique with the swipe to cast system. The graphics are quite nice and the amount of memory the game uses is very acceptable for the quality you get. Music is very relaxing and well done. Level and NPC design are great, really feel like I'm playing an old school medieval RPG. Absolutely 0 need to buy gems, the game gives them to you for just killing normal monsters. My only gripe would be to maybe add a fourth class? If not more in future updates. Otherwise, fantastic game, well put together, well written story, great opening scene and whoever did that voice over should be looking to do more! Thank you for making a true RPG for true RPG fans, keep it up!

It had been almost 3 years since the last time I gamed. I looked at a couple games throughout that period of time, neither really jumped out at me. I tip my hat to the creators of a game that literally brought me back from the brink, no interest whatsoever in gaming. Absolutely love game. I look forward to seeing more of your work in the near future.
description: Eternium is an amazingly fun and beautifully crafted Action RPG, reminiscent of the great classics.Eternium stands out from other mobile Action RPGs by its effortless “tap to move” and innovative “swipe to cast” controls, and its player-friendly “no paywalls, never pay to win” philosophy.With the exception of a couple of online-only features, the game can also be played offline after the content download completes.Drawing signs to cast spells is easy and rewarding. The tap-to-move control is more natural and relaxing than thumbsticks, and it’s also truer to the vintage point-and-click Action RPG experience.The game can be really played for free, as more than 90% of our players do. Purchases are completely optional. Gems, the game’s main currency, can be collected from enemies and quests. There is no limiting stamina or energy. The best things in the game are obtained by playing, not paying.Eternium has been launched in 2014, and is actively being improved by the original development team. Through years of polishing, and feedback from millions of players, the quality of the game has steadily increased, making it now one of the highest rated games on all app stores.As of fall 2017, major new features are in advanced stages of development, including real-time multiplayer, town portal, and a fourth world.Enjoy the visceral satisfaction of responsive, fast-paced combat, with spectacular special effects, pleasing sounds, rewarding damage numbers, all set against immersive backdrops and atmospheric, inspiring music scores.Play as a Mage, Warrior or Bounty Hunter, wielding a sword, axe, staff or gun. Level up to learn new abilities and increase your attributes.Battle skeletons, zombies, automatons, aliens, demons, dragons and many other creatures, across three beautifully hand-crafted worlds, or in endless generated levels.Venture into dark caves and dungeons, explore forests, villages and graveyards, lay siege to demon controlled castles, brave snowy mountain peaks, travel to the moon to slay strange creatures among craters and canyons, and beyond, to the deserts, pyramids and jungles of the red planet.Open treasure chests to loot gold, gemstones and battle gear. Equip shiny breastplates, menacing helmets and hoods, spiked shoulder pads, mysterious cloaks or capes. Protect yourself with a shield, or choose to wield two weapons as a warrior.Rescue your tank, healer and ranger companions who will join you in battle. Use their abilities together with yours to create rewarding and powerful tactical combos.Experience a refreshing storyline, filled with interplanetary intrigue and seasoned with funny characters. Hunt your arch-enemy, Ragadam, across the worlds, while trying to uncover and undo his twisted plans.Progress from common to rare, epic and legendary gear. Find gemstones that fit in your armor’s sockets. Craft socketed rings and amulets, and fuse three of them into a higher quality one.Unleash awesome offensive abilities, such as Whirlwind, Shockwave, Arc Lightning or Blizzard, control the enemy crowd with Frost Nova, Vortex, Silence, or sneak and assassinate with Smokescreen, Traps and Snipe.Each hero class has access to about 20 abilities (skills or spells), and each of your three companions has four more. The game starts simple, but culminates in a flurry of tactical possibilities at high levels.Once your hero reaches level 70, your experience points go into Champion Levels, which are unlimited and yield steady stat upgrades. Champion Levels are also inherited by your new heroes, so they will have an easier time growing up.Aside from the three story acts, an endless progression of beautiful, randomly generated levels awaits in the Trials of Valor game mode.Eternium is crafted with passion by a small band of old-school RPG fans, who love making the game they always wanted to play.
descriptionHTML:
Eternium is an amazingly fun and beautifully crafted Action RPG, reminiscent of the great classics.

Eternium stands out from other mobile Action RPGs by its effortless “tap to move” and innovative “swipe to cast” controls, and its player-friendly “no paywalls, never pay to win” philosophy.

With the exception of a couple of online-only features, the game can also be played offline after the content download completes.

Drawing signs to cast spells is easy and rewarding. The tap-to-move control is more natural and relaxing than thumbsticks, and it’s also truer to the vintage point-and-click Action RPG experience.

The game can be really played for free, as more than 90% of our players do. Purchases are completely optional. Gems, the game’s main currency, can be collected from enemies and quests. There is no limiting stamina or energy. The best things in the game are obtained by playing, not paying.

Eternium has been launched in 2014, and is actively being improved by the original development team. Through years of polishing, and feedback from millions of players, the quality of the game has steadily increased, making it now one of the highest rated games on all app stores.

As of fall 2017, major new features are in advanced stages of development, including real-time multiplayer, town portal, and a fourth world.

Enjoy the visceral satisfaction of responsive, fast-paced combat, with spectacular special effects, pleasing sounds, rewarding damage numbers, all set against immersive backdrops and atmospheric, inspiring music scores.

Play as a Mage, Warrior or Bounty Hunter, wielding a sword, axe, staff or gun. Level up to learn new abilities and increase your attributes.

Battle skeletons, zombies, automatons, aliens, demons, dragons and many other creatures, across three beautifully hand-crafted worlds, or in endless generated levels.

Venture into dark caves and dungeons, explore forests, villages and graveyards, lay siege to demon controlled castles, brave snowy mountain peaks, travel to the moon to slay strange creatures among craters and canyons, and beyond, to the deserts, pyramids and jungles of the red planet.

Open treasure chests to loot gold, gemstones and battle gear. Equip shiny breastplates, menacing helmets and hoods, spiked shoulder pads, mysterious cloaks or capes. Protect yourself with a shield, or choose to wield two weapons as a warrior.

Rescue your tank, healer and ranger companions who will join you in battle. Use their abilities together with yours to create rewarding and powerful tactical combos.

Experience a refreshing storyline, filled with interplanetary intrigue and seasoned with funny characters. Hunt your arch-enemy, Ragadam, across the worlds, while trying to uncover and undo his twisted plans.

Progress from common to rare, epic and legendary gear. Find gemstones that fit in your armor’s sockets. Craft socketed rings and amulets, and fuse three of them into a higher quality one.

Unleash awesome offensive abilities, such as Whirlwind, Shockwave, Arc Lightning or Blizzard, control the enemy crowd with Frost Nova, Vortex, Silence, or sneak and assassinate with Smokescreen, Traps and Snipe.

Each hero class has access to about 20 abilities (skills or spells), and each of your three companions has four more. The game starts simple, but culminates in a flurry of tactical possibilities at high levels.

Once your hero reaches level 70, your experience points go into Champion Levels, which are unlimited and yield steady stat upgrades. Champion Levels are also inherited by your new heroes, so they will have an easier time growing up.

Aside from the three story acts, an endless progression of beautiful, randomly generated levels awaits in the Trials of Valor game mode.

Eternium is crafted with passion by a small band of old-school RPG fans, who love making the game they always wanted to play.
developerAddress:
Making Fun, Inc.
4096 Piedmont Ave Ste 944
Oakland, CA 94611
summary: A tribute to classic RPGs, made with passion, not greed, by old-school gamers.
title: Eternium

comments: It is a normal car racing game with a very good graphics. There are four types of challenges. Elimination, one v/s one, test match and classic (6 people). The most hard task is to earn points so as to colour, repair and buy new cars. It takes so many gameplay for buying a higher model car with better class(C, B, A, S). It is a good game but it can't be completed without investing money. It's a good one for time pass and learning drift and nitro skills

A very good for racers. The controls are butter smooth. Enjoyed while playing. But the main problem is that I was promised that I would get 20 gems after reviewing but promise wasn't kept. It's really difficult to earn gems/diamonds and also on the other hand most of the purchases are based on this. So...... Look into this.

The multiplayer option is not working I am also not able to log in using my Google account. Very difficult to unlock cars as it is very hard to earn gold only option is to buy it. Don't feel like playing it any more.

Warning! DUMBEST GAME EVER it will say rate for 20 gems then when you have rated it nothing will appear. Graphics bad, controls bad, and worse you can't even upgrade your cars cause its hard to earn money. Nice try suckers

Most of the Cars are so costly and 80% of cars you can't buy with gold but with gems...and its very difficult to collect 18 gems while they ask for 1800 for a single car.. Game is good but when you loose races just because of unavailability of good cars at gold then its good to uninstall it at that moment..please give more cars at less gold so that players can enjoy

Excellent game for older smartphones. Just lacks a pause button. However, In app purchases are outrageously expensive & don't get you very far in the game (i.e. you have to keep spending if you want to progress). There is NO WAY I would ever spend 30$+ on a mobile app, especially as you would have to invest several times as the levels increase.

comments: This is a very fun game. It got me hooked for hours. However, there are still some things that need improvement. For example, when walking sideways along fences you can get over them. This is an issue as once i did this and fell into the water not being able to get back on. Also, the spikes do not seem to have an effect on the shark so they are useless. I do believe that the developer needs to continue to work on this game and introduce new items and uses for them.

It's honestly a pretty good game, it's fun, even though there's no real end goal and a lack of side quests. Although many improvements can be made to the game, the worst part is the ads, it's really bad, and it's insulting as a player that they try to milk this much out of us. You have constant random ads that take over your game at any moment. 5 ads per chest you craft to unlock each slot, ads when you switch to the map, floating treasure chests that require ads to open, even more pointless ads at every crafting bench, and the list goes on. I would gladly even pay to play an ad free version, but this is just ridiculous.
I never get any mission do to. Give me an update plz
When will there be quests?  I'm up to level 10 and have a badass raft but there is nothing to do and I can't build the chemistry table. I have no way to get mortar and pedestal.

Please update the game.i just died and couldn't watch a video to revive and had no dablooms.i was very very far in the game.my raft was all metal with metal walls.i had alot of stuff.im very pissed that i had to start over.please fix the video system.or make it so if you die you can just revive,that simple.not start over completely.love the game just not some functions.please fix and update asap.thanks

You cannot walk on wooden fundations and you cannot walk on single or double foundations. Please fix this it is very annoying and im not able to play the game, because when the shark attacks in a corner you cannot hit him with your spear. This is the same for the zombie. I built a little house on the raft and it spawned behind the wall of my house. Please fix it

🌗 Great plans

No two worlds are alike: you can generate completely new and randomized world at any time in the survival free.

Survivor app has treacherous weather conditions that allow to enjoy sunny days and beware of stormy ones. If you’d like to get new skills in survive games, try raft games!

Raft building games offer the chance to craft new weapons and equipments. Search for shipwreck parts and improve your raft in survival escape. Craft a spear and protect yourself from murderous sharks that follow you everywhere.

Bearing in mind all these qualities of build and survive games, you’d not forget about your health status in the harsh conditions. Fishing and hunting is the only way to succeed and not to starve to death in raft survival in the ocean.

comments: Someone needs to be fired or at least schooled on currency exchange rates. They offer 2 packs for 5 and 20 then except for rare sales which offer 49 and 79 dollar packs everything is 100 dollars google should step in and pull this game off the google play market for a square enix licensed product they have enough backing to have actual microtransactions not be a game exclusive to rich people who use 100 dollar bills as toilet paper...

I kind of enjoy the game but would like it more if there were cheaper options to buying. After you buy some the prices jump to 99.99 and have yet to see cheaper prices. I'm not unloading that in one go. The people of this game would probably make more money if they bring cheaper prices. I would buy several different little packs that eventually add up to 100 bit you ain't getting nothing otherwise. Also wish you could buy more things with the gold you purchased. Like have a choice to spend loyalty or gold

I started this game when it first came out. There were hardly any game advantages and everyone was having fun and on the same playing field. As more and more packages got released into the game it became a pay to win situation. I personally do not think spending $100+ on a phone game is a wise investment. Thus I enjoyed the game by taking advantage of their events and the prizes within the game. However, it has become dominated by people who payed to be the big guy and the little people get absolutely demolished. It has taken the fun out of playing, which really dissapoints me as it was a fun game to play.

This game has potential to be fun but it's completely ruined because IT'S COMPLETELY PAY-TO-WIN which sucked the fun out of the game that I quit. Don't get me wrong, Final Fantasy is highly respected RPG franchise because it's full of great games in the series. But no this one.  However, I might come back if the game developers make it not as pay-to-win as it is now. Right now, it's a complete money bucket!

This game is great and fun, I love spending my time playing this game. One problem though, what is going on with the packages? Why is it every time a package is bought all the packages go from 20 to 100 dollars ? We should be able to buy the 20 dollar packages more than once! Is that fixable? Please cuz i do want to keep playing but 100 dollars is too much.

The game is very addictive and fun to play. Some of the people playing the game are wonderful and fun to game with. Graphics are very good for a on line game played on phone, tablet or computer. The quests are challenging at best. BUT!!! BE WARNED... This game is not for young children as there is explicit language and cut throat people playing the game. After all it is a war game and nothing more. Now down to the nitty-gritty of the game. Yes it's free, but that only get you so far before you will need to buy packs in the game to advance and unlock the two new characters. The game quests are designed for people to spend if you want to get ahead fast. Large amounts of  $$$$$$ Cash are needed to play this game. $$$$$$ Personal note, I know people who have spent thousands on this game. Over all the game is great for young adults on up. PG-15

comments: I totally like the game and all but there must be balance between different robots especially..... some robots have a big advantage like the haechi with 3 medium slots and its dash ability.. its like u cant even aim at it......  Also please remove the components so that everyone is able to buy newer robots... u can make them available in gold or silver or even workshop points

This game was great until about 5 days ago, that is when it started to take 4 to 5 minutes loading time for each game mode to start. Now my attention span prevents me from waiting that long to play one game. What happened game developers?.... !!UPDATE!! Okay it must have just been the servers. Because they're back up and running at 32 seconds loading time for a war. This game is great. I can dig it can you dig it

They have fine a great job with this game. The dynamics, the playability, the graphics, and it feels as if you could never stop growing. Every bot is beast with a certain load out and play style.  Update! After playing for over 3 years, and over many different platforms this game rocks. It's definitely not the mech its the pilot kinda game. The balance is good so if you spend money and level quickly you'll be placed on your mechs rating(mech level + weapon level) so take your time and learn some tactics. Every gun has its purpose but it takes a good pilot to make them work.

Game is designed to milk money out of its players. Fun to play. But $200 for a pretend robot or $100 for a single gun. Lower prices. You might be shocked more people can afford 20 than 200......reply- you think giving someone 15 pieces of a random bot that takes 2 games to earn if you place first out of the 10000 you need. Only real option they give is purchas. Don't be fooled. This is a pay to win game.

A great game that brings back the old Mech warrior days. One of the few good theme fps shooters on this platform that is "FREE". You can pay to win but it will cost you alot. Investing afew tens to smoother the growth? But you can still have plenty of fun without spending a dime.  Until it slowly draws you in deeper.....

I like how the game has gotten better over past year in many ways.. But could you guys quit making the puzzle peice stuff to get newest goodies? I get you added lots of cool ways to get extras that's cool and all.. But who wants 7 puzzle pieces out of 7,000? Not worth the effort. Keep it gold and silver guys!!
description: War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors! "If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won’t cost you anything." - Droid Gamers"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it’s such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android PoliceIt's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!MAIN FEATURES:– 31 battle robots with different strengths;– more than 20 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?– many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;– create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;– join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;– complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!Want to talk about the game or find allies?Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_PixonicWatch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.Enjoy the game!
descriptionHTML:
War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors!

"If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won’t cost you anything." - Droid Gamers

"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it’s such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines

"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android Police

It's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!

MAIN FEATURES:
– 31 battle robots with different strengths;
– more than 20 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?
– many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;
– create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;
– join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;
– complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.

Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!

Want to talk about the game or find allies?
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_Pixonic
Watch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS
Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/

Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.
Enjoy the game!

descriptionHTML:
If you like space shooting and survival games and like to simulate sky shooting in for glory and duty, then Galaxy Space Invader is the one you should be shooter playing.
To accomplish this task, you must have the courage and wisdom.
In this bullet hell shooter game, you will be faced with an increasingly large number of projectiles and enemies. As the game progresses, you will earn the right to upgrade your spacecraft to bring it to full lethal capacity. Press screen to move, destroy enemies in your adventure!
Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its evil enemies.
Aboard your spacecraft, you will have to get rid of a large number of enemies while dodging their attacks. Will you be skilled enough to understand your enemies strategy and attack patterns?
In this "bullet hell" shooter game, you will be faced with an increasingly large number of projectiles and enemies. As the game progresses, you will earn the right to upgrade your spacecraft to bring it to full lethal capacity.
FEATURES

* Amazing Lighting and Special Effects
* Precision controls
* charming sound and music, with HD graphics .
* 12 different weapons .

descriptionHTML:
The wildly popular Toca Kitchen is back! With new guests to cook for, more tools to play with and new food combinations to test out, Toca Kitchen 2 invites all chefs to get messy and start playing!

GET CREATIVE
Who said dishes have to be pretty and tasty? In Toca Kitchen 2 you can cook however you want! Juice tomatoes, boil the salad or make a burger. Come up with your very own recipes and treat your guests to something special.

MAKE A MESS
With six different kitchen tools to choose from, you have the perfect setup for preparing fun foods! Load up with your favorite ingredients, add a squeeze of messiness and finish off with a pinch of weirdness. Time to let your guest have a bite! Was it a winner?

WATCH THEIR REACTIONS
Discover your guests’ preferences by watching their reactions. Oven-baked fish head with fried leftovers and lettuce juice coming right up! Oh, they didn’t like it? Try adding some salt. It’s fun to get the “ew”!

We added a whole lot of fun stuff! You can now enjoy cooking:

New foods!
- Chicken
- Prawn
- Pineapple
- Corn
- Peach
- Strawberry
- Watermelon
- Onion
- Octupus leg
- Spaghetti
- Rice

New condiments!
- Ketchup
- Dressing
- Soy

Watch the characters react on burning hot sauce, sour lemon and laugh at loud burps.

At last but not least, we added more levels of grossness to the characters. Have fun!

Features:
- New ingredients in the fridge
- New characters to feed
- Stronger character reactions
- New juicer and oven
- Deep fryer! You can now deep fry anything. Get your crust on.
- No rules or stress - just open-ended, kid-directed fun!
- No third-party advertising
- No in-app purchases

***

Subscribe to our YouTube channel!
http://bit.ly/YouTube_GooglePlay

***

ABOUT TOCA BOCA
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 130 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy

description: Come and play the most exciting Coach bus driving game where your bus driving skills will be put to test! Complete challenging missions, pick and drop passengers and upgrade your bus for better driving.Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 gives you a realistic bus driving experience in big open world city!Play the latest coach bus driving simulator game - Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018.Coach Bus Driving Simulator 2018 is an exciting, action packed bus driving simulator game.Detailed coach buses, realistic interiors and a beautiful open world city environment will make you feel like you are driving a real bus!
